77  /**
78   * Install grouper
79   * @author mchyzer
80   *
81   */
82  public class GrouperInstaller {
83  
84    /**
85     * location of where grouper is an find all the files within
86     */
87    private GrouperDirectories grouperDirectories = new GrouperDirectories();
88    
89    /**
90     * structure and logic to locate where grouper is installed (or will be?)
91     */
92    public static class GrouperDirectories {
93  
94      /**
95       * which type of install are we
96       */
97      public static enum GrouperInstallType {
98  
99        /**
100        * installed Grouper env
101        */
102       installed,
103       
104       /**
105        * source Grouper env
106        */
107       source;
108       
109     }
110 
111     /**
112      * are we an installed directory or source directory
113      */
114     private GrouperInstallType grouperInstallType;
115 
116     
117     /**
118      * are we an installed directory or source directory
119      * @return the grouperInstallType
120      */
121     public GrouperInstallType getGrouperInstallType() {
122       return this.grouperInstallType;
123     }
124 
125     
126     /**
127      * are we an installed directory or source directory
128      * @param grouperInstallType1 the grouperInstallType to set
129      */
130     public void setGrouperInstallType(GrouperInstallType grouperInstallType1) {
131       this.grouperInstallType = grouperInstallType1;
132     }
133 
134     
135     
136   }
137   
138   /**
139    * default ip address to listen for stuff
140    */
141   private String defaultIpAddress = null;
142   
143 
144   /**
145    * if we should continue or not
146    * @return if should continue
147    * @param autorunPropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
148    */
149   private static boolean shouldContinue(String autorunPropertiesKey) {
150     return shouldContinue(null, null, autorunPropertiesKey);
151   }
152   
153   /**
154    * if we should continue or not
155    * @param hint 
156    * @param exitHint 
157    * @param autorunPropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
158    * @return if should continue
159    */
160   private static boolean shouldContinue(String hint, String exitHint, String autorunPropertiesKey) {
161     if (hint == null) {
162       hint = "Do you want to continue ";
163     }
164     if (!hint.endsWith(" ")) {
165       hint += " ";
166     }
167     System.out.print(hint + "(t|f)? [f] ");
168     boolean shouldContinue = readFromStdInBoolean(false, autorunPropertiesKey);
169     if (!shouldContinue) {
170       if (exitHint == null) {
171         exitHint = "OK, will not continue, exiting...";
172       }
173       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(exitHint)) {
174         System.out.println(exitHint);
175       }
176     }
177     return shouldContinue;
178   }
179   
180   /**
181    * read a string from stdin
182    * @param defaultBoolean null for none, or true of false for if the input is blank
183    * @param autorunPropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
184    * @return the string
185    */
186   private static boolean readFromStdInBoolean(Boolean defaultBoolean, String autorunPropertiesKey) {
187     int i=100;
188     //keep trying until we get it
189     while(true) {
190       String input = readFromStdIn(autorunPropertiesKey);
191       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(input) && defaultBoolean != null) {
192         return defaultBoolean;
193       }
194       try {
195         boolean inputBoolean = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(input);
196         return inputBoolean; 
197       } catch (Exception e) {
198         if (defaultBoolean != null) {
199           System.out.print("Expecting t or f or <blank> but received: '" + input + "', please try again: ");
200         } else {
201           System.out.print("Expecting t or f but received: '" + input + "', please try again: ");
202         }
203       }
204       if (i-- < 0) {
205         throw new RuntimeException("Too many tries for finding a boolean!");
206       }
207     }
208   }
209   
210   /**
211    * read a string from stdin
212    * @param autorunPropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
213    * @return the string
214    */
215   private static String readFromStdIn(String autorunPropertiesKey) {
216     
217     String str = null;
218     
219     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesContainsKey(autorunPropertiesKey)) {
220 
221       str = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue(autorunPropertiesKey, false);
222       
223       System.out.println("<using autorun property " + autorunPropertiesKey + ">: '" + str + "'");
224       
225     } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.autorun.useDefaultsAsMuchAsAvailable", false, false)) {
226       
227       System.out.println("<using default which is blank due to grouperInstaller.autorun.useDefaultsAsMuchAsAvailable and " + autorunPropertiesKey + ">: ");
228       
229     } else {
230 
231       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.print.autorunKeys", false, false)) {
232         System.out.print("<" + autorunPropertiesKey + ">: ");
233       }
234       
235       try {
236         BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
237         str = in.readLine();
238       } catch (Exception e) {
239         throw new RuntimeException("Problem", e);
240       }
241 
242     }
243     
244     return GrouperInstallerUtils.trim(str);
245     
246   }
247 
248   /**
249    * download a file, delete the local file if it exists
250    * @param url
251    * @param localFileName
252    * @param autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value if download exists, default true
253    */
254   private static void downloadFile(String url, String localFileName, String autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey) {
255     downloadFile(url, localFileName, false, null, autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey);
256   }
257 
258   /**
259    * download a file, delete the local file if it exists
260    * @param url
261    * @param localFileName
262    * @param allow404
263    * @param prefixFor404 print message prefix if 404
264    * @param autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value if download exists, default true
265    * @return true if downloaded, false if not
266    */
267   private static boolean downloadFile(final String url, final String localFileName, final boolean allow404, 
268       final String prefixFor404, final String autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey) {
269 
270     boolean useLocalFile = false;
271 
272     final File localFile = new File(localFileName);
273 
274     if (localFile.exists()) {
275       System.out.print("File exists: " + localFile.getAbsolutePath() + ", should we use the local file (t|f)? [t]: ");
276       useLocalFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey);
277     }
278     
279     if (useLocalFile) {
280       return true;
281     }
282 
283     if (allow404 && GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.useLocalFilesOnlyForDevelopment", false, false)) {
284       return false;
285     }
286 
287     final boolean[] result = new boolean[1];
288     
289     Runnable runnable = new Runnable() {
290       
291       public void run() {
292         result[0] = downloadFileHelper(url, localFileName, allow404, prefixFor404, autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey);
293       }
294     };
295     
296     GrouperInstallerUtils.threadRunWithStatusDots(runnable, true);
297     
298     return result[0];
299   }
300   
301   /**
302    * download a file, delete the local file if it exists
303    * @param url
304    * @param localFileName
305    * @param allow404
306    * @param prefixFor404 print message prefix if 404
307    * @param autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value if download exists, default true
308    * @return true if downloaded, false if not
309    */
310   private static boolean downloadFileHelper(String url, String localFileName, boolean allow404, 
311       String prefixFor404, String autorunUseLocalFilePropertiesKey) {
312 
313     final File localFile = new File(localFileName);
314 
315     HttpClient httpClient = new HttpClient();
316 
317     //see if we are working with local files:
318     {
319       File localFileFromUrl = new File(url);
320       if (localFileFromUrl.exists()) {
321         System.out.println("Copying local file: " + url + " to file: " + localFileName);
322         
323         if (localFile.exists()) {
324           
325           System.out.println("File exists: " + localFile.getAbsolutePath() + ", deleting");
326           
327           if (!localFile.delete()) {
328             throw new RuntimeException("Cant delete file: " + localFile.getAbsolutePath() + "!!!!!");
329           }
330         }
331         
332         try {
333           FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(localFile);
334           FileInputStream fileInputStream = new FileInputStream(localFileFromUrl);
335   
336           GrouperInstallerUtils.copy(fileInputStream, fileOutputStream);
337   
338           return true;
339         } catch (Exception exception) {
340           String errorMessage = "Error copying file: " + url;
341           System.out.println(errorMessage);
342           throw new RuntimeException(errorMessage, exception);
343         }
344 
345       }
346       
347       //if it doesnt exist, see if the parent dir exists
348       if (localFileFromUrl.getParentFile().exists()) {
349 
350         //the dir is there but no file...   hmmmm
351         if (allow404) {
352           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(prefixFor404)) {
353             prefixFor404 = "File not found: ";
354           }
355           System.out.println(prefixFor404 + url);
356           return false;
357         }
358 
359         //weve got a problem
360         
361       }
362     }
363     
364     GetMethod getMethod = null;
365     try {
366       
367       getMethod = new GetMethod(url);
368       
369       int result = httpClient.executeMethod(getMethod);
370       
371       if (allow404 && result == 404) {
372         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(prefixFor404)) {
373           prefixFor404 = "File not found: ";
374         }
375         System.out.println(prefixFor404 + url);
376         return false;
377       }
378       
379       System.out.println("Downloading from URL: " + url + " to file: " + localFileName);
380 
381       if (result != 200) {
382         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting 200 but received: " + result);
383       }
384       
385       InputStream inputStream = getMethod.getResponseBodyAsStream();
386 
387       if (localFile.exists()) {
388         
389         System.out.println("File exists: " + localFile.getAbsolutePath() + ", deleting");
390         
391         if (!localFile.delete()) {
392           throw new RuntimeException("Cant delete file: " + localFile.getAbsolutePath() + "!!!!!");
393         }
394       }
395       
396       if (!localFile.getParentFile().exists()) {
397         GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(localFile.getParentFile());
398       }
399       
400       FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(localFile);
401 
402 
403       GrouperInstallerUtils.copy(inputStream, fileOutputStream);
404 
405       return true;
406 
407     } catch (Exception exception) {
408       String errorMessage = "Error connecting to URL: " + url;
409       System.out.println(errorMessage);
410       throw new RuntimeException(errorMessage, exception);
411     }
412   }
413 
414   /**
415    * 
416    * @param ehcacheBaseFile
417    */
418   public void convertEhcacheBaseToProperties(File ehcacheBaseFile) {
419     //File ehcacheBaseBakFile = this.bakFile(ehcacheBaseFile);
420     //GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(existingFile, bakFile, true);
421     //System.out.println("Backing up: " + existingFile.getAbsolutePath() + " to: " + bakFile.getAbsolutePath());
422     
423     NodeList nodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(ehcacheBaseFile, "/ehcache/cache");
424     
425     Set<String> usedKeys = new HashSet<String>();
426     
427     for (int i=0;i<nodeList.getLength();i++) {
428       
429       Element element = (Element)nodeList.item(i);
430 
431       //  <cache  name="edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao.hib3.Hib3MemberDAO.FindBySubject"
432       //      maxElementsInMemory="5000"
433       //      eternal="false"
434       //      timeToIdleSeconds="5"
435       //      timeToLiveSeconds="10"
436       //      overflowToDisk="false"  
437       //      statistics="false"
438       //  />
439 
440       
441       String name = element.getAttribute("name");
442       Integer maxElementsInMemory = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("maxElementsInMemory"), true);
443       Boolean eternal = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("eternal"));
444       Integer timeToIdleSeconds = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("timeToIdleSeconds"), true);
445       Integer timeToLiveSeconds = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("timeToLiveSeconds"), true);
446       Boolean overflowToDisk = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("overflowToDisk"));
447       Boolean statistics = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("statistics"));
448 
449       //any attributes we dont expect?
450       NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = element.getAttributes();
451       //see which attributes are new or changed
452       for (int j=0;j<configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength();j++) {
453         Node configuredAttribute = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(j);
454         if (!configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("name")
455             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("maxElementsInMemory")
456             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("eternal")
457             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("timeToIdleSeconds")
458             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("timeToLiveSeconds")
459             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("overflowToDisk")
460             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("statistics")) {
461           throw new RuntimeException("Cant process attribute: '" + configuredAttribute.getNodeName() + "'");
462         }
463       }
464       
465       String key = convertEhcacheNameToPropertiesKey(name, usedKeys);
466       
467       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.name = edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao.hib3.Hib3GroupDAO
468       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.maxElementsInMemory = 500
469       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.eternal = false
470       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.timeToIdleSeconds = 1
471       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.timeToLiveSeconds = 1
472       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.overflowToDisk = false
473       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.statistics = false
474       
475       System.out.println("cache.name." + key + ".name = " + name);
476       if (maxElementsInMemory != null) {
477         System.out.println("cache.name." + key + ".maxElementsInMemory = " + maxElementsInMemory);
478       }
479       if (eternal != null) {
480         System.out.println("cache.name." + key + ".eternal = " + eternal);
481       }
482       if (timeToIdleSeconds != null) {
483         System.out.println("cache.name." + key + ".timeToIdleSeconds = " + timeToIdleSeconds);
484       }
485       if (timeToLiveSeconds != null) {
486         System.out.println("cache.name." + key + ".timeToLiveSeconds = " + timeToLiveSeconds);
487       }
488       if (overflowToDisk != null) {
489         System.out.println("cache.name." + key + ".overflowToDisk = " + overflowToDisk);
490       }
491       if (statistics != null) {
492         System.out.println("cache.name." + key + ".statistics = " + statistics);
493       }
494       System.out.println("");
495     }
496 
497   }
498 
499   /**
500    * convert a name like: edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao.hib3.Hib3GroupDAO
501    * to: edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO
502    * @param ehcacheName 
503    * @param usedKeys
504    * @return the key
505    */
506   private static String convertEhcacheNameToPropertiesKey(String ehcacheName, Set<String> usedKeys) {
507     
508     StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();
509 
510     //strip off this beginning to get the keys a little smaller
511     if (ehcacheName.startsWith("edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.")) {
512       ehcacheName = ehcacheName.substring("edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.".length());
513     }
514     
515     for (int i=0; i<ehcacheName.length(); i++) {
516       
517       char curChar = ehcacheName.charAt(i);
518       
519       if (Character.isLetter(curChar) || Character.isDigit(curChar)) {
520         result.append(curChar);
521       } else {
522         result.append("_");
523       }
524       
525     }
526 
527     String resultString = result.toString();
528     if (!usedKeys.contains(resultString)) {
529       return resultString;
530     }
531     
532     for (int i=2;i<100;i++) {
533       String newResult = resultString + "_" + i;
534       if (!usedKeys.contains(newResult)) {
535         return newResult;
536       }
537     }
538     
539     throw new RuntimeException("Cant find name for " + ehcacheName);
540   }
541   
542   /**
543    * @param args
544    */
545   public static void main(String[] args) {
546 
547     GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller = new GrouperInstaller();
548 
549     grouperInstaller.mainLogic();
550 
551     //new GrouperInstaller().convertEhcacheBaseToProperties(new File("/Users/mchyzer/git/grouper_v2_3/grouper/conf/ehcache.example.xml"));
552 
553 //    GrouperInstaller.downloadFile("https://github.com/Internet2/grouper/archive/GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH.zip",
554 //        "C:\\app\\grouperInstallerTarballDir\\GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH.zip", false, null, 
555 //        "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist", true
556 //        );
557 
558 //    GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller = new GrouperInstaller();
559 //
560 //    grouperInstaller.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = "C:\\app\\grouper_2_1_installer\\grouper.ui-2.1.5\\dist\\grouper\\";
561 //  
562 //    grouperInstaller.grouperBaseBakDir = "C:\\app\\grouperInstallerTarballDir\\bak_UI_2014_10_26_15_06_19_957\\";
563 //      
564 //    grouperInstaller.copyFiles("C:\\app\\grouperInstallerTarballDir\\grouper.ui-2.2.1\\dist\\grouper\\",
565 //        "C:\\app\\grouper_2_1_installer\\grouper.ui-2.1.5\\dist\\grouper\\",
566 //        GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("WEB-INF/lib", "WEB-INF/web.xml", "WEB-INF/classes"));
567 
568     
569    // copyFiles();
570     
571 //    
572 //    
573 //    grouperInstaller.dbUrl = "jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper";
574 //    grouperInstaller.dbUser = "sa";
575 //    grouperInstaller.dbPass = "";
576 //    grouperInstaller.giDbUtils = new GiDbUtils(grouperInstaller.dbUrl, grouperInstaller.dbUser, grouperInstaller.dbPass);
577 //    grouperInstaller.untarredApiDir = new File("c:/mchyzer/grouper/trunk/grouper-installer/grouper.apiBinary-2.0.2");
578 //    grouperInstaller.grouperInstallDirectoryString = "C:/mchyzer/grouper/trunk/grouper-installer/";
579 //    
580 //    grouperInstaller.version = "2.0.2";
581 //    grouperInstaller.grouperSystemPassword = "myNewPass";
582 //    
583 //    grouperInstaller.addDriverJarToClasspath();

588 ////      
589 ////      grouperInstaller.addQuickstartSubjects();
590 ////      grouperInstaller.addQuickstartData();
591 //    
592 ////    File uiDir = grouperInstaller.downloadUi();
593 ////    File unzippedUiFile = unzip(uiDir.getAbsolutePath());
594 ////    grouperInstaller.untarredUiDir = untar(unzippedUiFile.getAbsolutePath());
595 //

597 ////
598 //      File antDir = grouperInstaller.downloadAnt();

601 ////

605 //    File unzippedTomcatFile = unzip(tomcatDir.getAbsolutePath());
606 //    grouperInstaller.untarredTomcatDir = untar(unzippedTomcatFile.getAbsolutePath());
607 //
608 //    grouperInstaller.configureTomcat();
609 //    
610 ////    grouperInstaller.configureTomcatUiWebapp();
611 ////    
612 //    grouperInstaller.tomcatConfigureGrouperSystem();
613 //    
614 ////    grouperInstaller.tomcatBounce("restart");
615 //
616 //    File wsDir = grouperInstaller.downloadWs();
617 //
618 //    File unzippedWsFile = unzip(wsDir.getAbsolutePath());
619 //    grouperInstaller.untarredWsDir = untar(unzippedWsFile.getAbsolutePath());
620 //    grouperInstaller.configureWs();
621 //    grouperInstaller.buildWs();
622 //    
623 //    grouperInstaller.configureTomcatWsWebapp();
624 //    grouperInstaller.tomcatBounce("restart");
625 //
626 //    File clientDir = grouperInstaller.downloadClient();
627 //    
628 //    File unzippedClientFile = unzip(clientDir.getAbsolutePath());
629 //    grouperInstaller.untarredClientDir = untar(unzippedClientFile.getAbsolutePath());
630 //    grouperInstaller.configureClient();
631 //
632 //    grouperInstaller.addGrouperSystemWsGroup();
633 //    
634 //    grouperInstaller.runClientCommand();
635 //    
636 //    //CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand("cmd /c cd");
637 //    //String result = commandResult.getOutputText();
638 //    //
639 //    //System.out.println(result);
640 //
641 //
642 //    //editPropertiesFile(new File("C:\\mchyzer\\grouper\\trunk\\grouper-installer\\grouper.apiBinary-2.1.0\\conf\\grouper.hibernate.properties"), 
643 //    //    "hibernate.connection.password", "sdf");
644       
645     //if started hsql, then we need to exit since that thread will not stop
646     System.exit(0);
647   }
648 
649   /** e.g. 2.1.0 */
650   private String version;
651   
652   /**
653    * @param isInstallNotUpgrade install will bounce tomcat, configure, etc
654    * 
655    */
656   private void buildUi(boolean isInstallNotUpgrade) {
657     
658     File grouperUiBuildToDir = new File(this.grouperUiBuildToDirName());
659     
660     boolean rebuildUi = true;
661     
662     if (grouperUiBuildToDir.exists()) {
663       boolean defaultRebuild = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.ui.rebuildIfBuilt", true, false);
664       System.out.print("The Grouper UI has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [" 
665           + (defaultRebuild ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
666       rebuildUi = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultRebuild, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildUiAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
667     }
668     
669     if (!rebuildUi) {
670       return;
671     }
672 
673     if (isInstallNotUpgrade) {
674       //stop tomcat
675       try {
676         tomcatBounce("stop");
677       } catch (Exception e) {
678         System.out.println("Couldnt stop tomcat, ignoring...");
679       }
680     }
681     
682     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
683     
684     addAntCommands(commands);
685     commands.add("dist");
686     
687     System.out.println("\n##################################");
688     System.out.println("Building UI with command:\n" + this.untarredUiDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
689         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
690     
691     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
692         true, true, null, this.untarredUiDir, null, true);
693     
694     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
695       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
696     }
697     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
698       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
699     }
700     
701     if (isInstallNotUpgrade) {
702       System.out.print("Do you want to set the log dir of UI (t|f)? [t]: ");
703       boolean setLogDir = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setLogDirOfUi");
704       
705       if (setLogDir) {
706         
707         ////set the log dir
708         //C:\apps\grouperInstallerTest\grouper.ws-2.0.2\grouper-ws\build\dist\grouper-ws\WEB-INF\classes\log4j.properties
709         //
710         //${grouper.home}logs
711   
712         String defaultLogDir = this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "logs" + File.separator + "grouperUi";
713         System.out.print("Enter the UI log dir: [" + defaultLogDir + "]: ");
714         String logDir = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.uiLogDir");
715         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(logDir, defaultLogDir);
716         
717         //lets replace \\ with /
718         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logDir, "\\\\", "/");
719         //lets replace \ with /
720         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logDir, "\\", "/");
721   
722         File log4jFile = new File(grouperUiBuildToDirName() + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes"
723             + File.separator + "log4j.properties");
724   
725         System.out.println("Editing file: " + log4jFile.getAbsolutePath());
726   
727         //log4j.appender.grouper_event.File = c:/apps/grouperInstallerTest/grouper.apiBinary-2.0.2/logs/grouper_event.log
728         editFile(log4jFile, "log4j\\.\\S+\\.File\\s*=\\s*([^\\s]+logs)/grouper_[^\\s]+\\.log", null, 
729             null, logDir, "UI log directory");
730   
731         File logDirFile = new File(defaultLogDir);
732         if (!logDirFile.exists()) {
733           System.out.println("Creating log directory: " + logDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
734           GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(logDirFile);
735         }
736         //test log dir
737         File testLogDirFile = new File(logDirFile.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "testFile" + GrouperInstallerUtils.uniqueId() + ".txt");
738         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(testLogDirFile, "test");
739         if (!testLogDirFile.delete()) {
740           throw new RuntimeException("Cant delete file: " +  testLogDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
741         }
742         System.out.println("Created and deleted a test file successfully in dir: " + logDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
743       }
744     }    
745 
746     
747     System.out.println("\nEnd building UI");
748     System.out.println("##################################\n");
749 
750     
751   }
752 
753   /** sh command */
754   private String shCommand;
755   
756   /**
757    * 
758    * @return the sh command in unix
759    */
760   private String shCommand() {
761     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
762       throw new RuntimeException("This is windows, why are you looking for sh???");
763     }
764     
765     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.shCommand)) {
766       return this.shCommand;
767     }
768     
769     String[] attempts = new String[]{
770         "bash", "/bin/bash", 
771         "/sbin/bash", "/usr/local/bin/bash", 
772         "/usr/bin/bash", "/usr/sbin/bash", 
773         "/usr/local/sbin/bash", "sh", "/bin/sh", 
774         "/sbin/sh", "/usr/local/bin/sh", 
775         "/usr/bin/sh", "/usr/sbin/sh", 
776         "/usr/local/sbin/sh"}; 
777     
778     for (String attempt : attempts) {
779     
780       try {
781         CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
782             attempt, 
783             new String[]{"-version"}, true);
784         String shResult = commandResult.getOutputText();
785         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(shResult)) {
786           shResult = commandResult.getErrorText();
787         }
788   
789         //if we get a result, thats good
790         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(shResult)) {
791           this.shCommand = attempt;
792           System.out.println("Using shell command: " + attempt);
793           return this.shCommand;
794         }
795         
796       } catch (Exception e) {
797         //this is ok, keep trying
798       }
799     }
800     //ok, we couldnt find it, 
801     System.out.print("Couldn't find the command 'sh'.  Enter the path of 'sh' (e.g. /bin/sh): ");
802     this.shCommand = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.pathOfShCommandIfNotFound");
803 
804     try {
805       CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
806           this.shCommand, 
807           new String[]{"-version"}, true);
808       String shResult = commandResult.getOutputText();
809       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(shResult)) {
810         shResult = commandResult.getErrorText();
811       }
812 
813       //if we get a result, thats good
814       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(shResult)) {
815         return this.shCommand;
816       }
817       
818     } catch (Exception e) {
819       throw new RuntimeException("Error: couldn't run: " + this.shCommand + " -version!", e);
820     }
821 
822     throw new RuntimeException("Error: couldn't run: " + this.shCommand + " -version!");
823     
824   }
825 
826   /**
827    * 
828    * @param commands
829    */
830   private void addGshCommands(List<String> commands) {
831     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
832       commands.add("cmd");
833       commands.add("/c");
834       commands.add(gshCommand());
835     } else {
836       //if you add this it messes up when args have spaces
837       //commands.add(shCommand());
838       commands.add(gshCommand());
839     }
840   }
841 
842   /**
843    * 
844    * @param commands
845    */
846   private void addAntCommands(List<String> commands) {
847     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
848       commands.add("cmd");
849       commands.add("/c");
850       commands.add(this.untarredAntDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "ant.bat");
851     } else {
852       commands.add(shCommand());
853       commands.add(this.untarredAntDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "ant");
854     }
855   }
856 
857   /**
858    * 
859    * @param commands
860    */
861   private void addMavenCommands(List<String> commands) {
862     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
863       commands.add("cmd");
864       commands.add("/c");
865       commands.add(this.untarredMavenDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "mvn.bat");
866     } else {
867       commands.add(shCommand());
868       commands.add(this.untarredMavenDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "mvn");
869     }
870   }
871 
872 //  /**
873 //   * @param arg  stop, start, etc
874 //   * 
875 //   */
876 //  private void bounceTomcat(String arg) {
877 //    
878 //    List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
879 //    
880 //    commands.add("cmd");
881 //    commands.add("/c");
882 //    commands.add("start");
883 //    commands.add("/b");
884 //    commands.add(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "catalina.bat");
885 //    commands.add(arg);
886 //    
887 //    System.out.println("\n##################################");
888 //    System.out.println("Tomcat " + arg + " with command:"
889 //        + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");

891 //    DOESNT WORK WITH ENV VARS!!!!!
892 //    CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
893 //        true, true, new String[]{"CATALINA_HOME=" + this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath(), 
894 //        "JAVA_HOME=" + GrouperInstallerUtils.javaHome(),
895 //        "LOGGING_CONFIG=" + this.untarredTomcatDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "logging.properties"}, 
896 //        new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin"));
897 //

899 //    System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
900 //    System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
901 //    
902 //    System.out.println("\nEnd tomcat " + arg );
903 //    System.out.println("##################################\n");
904 //
905 //    
906 //  }
907   
908   /**
909    * @param arg
910    * 
911    */
912   private void tomcatBounce(String arg) {
913     
914     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("start", arg) && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("stop", arg) && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("restart", arg)) {
915       throw new RuntimeException("Expecting arg: start|stop|restart but received: " + arg);
916     }
917     
918     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("restart", arg)) {
919       
920       tomcatBounce("stop");
921       tomcatBounce("start");
922       return;
923     }
924     
925     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("stop", arg)) {
926       
927       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(this.tomcatHttpPort, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
928         System.out.println("Tomcat is supposed to be listening on port: " + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", port not listening, assuming tomcat is not running...");
929         if (!shouldContinue("Should we " + arg + " tomcat anyway?", "", "grouperInstaller.autorun." + arg + "TomcatAnyway")) {
930           return;
931         }
932       }
933 
934       
935     } else {
936       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(this.tomcatHttpPort, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
937         System.out.println("Tomcat is supposed to be listening on port: " + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", port is already listening!!!!  Why is this????");
938         if (!shouldContinue("Should we " + arg + " tomcat anyway?", "", "grouperInstaller.autorun." + arg + "TomcatAnyway")) {
939           return;
940         }
941       }
942       
943     }
944     
945     final List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
946     
947 //    <java jar="${tomcat.home}/bin/bootstrap.jar" fork="true">
948 //    03          <jvmarg value="-Dcatalina.home=${tomcat.home}"/>
949 //    04      </java>
950 //    05  </target>
951 //    06   
952 //    07  <target name="tomcat-stop">
953 //    08      <java jar="${tomcat.home}/bin/bootstrap.jar" fork="true">
954 //    09          <jvmarg value="-Dcatalina.home=${tomcat.home}"/>
955 //    10          <arg line="stop"/>
956 //    11      </java>
957     
958     commands.add(GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand());
959     commands.add("-XX:MaxPermSize=150m");
960     commands.add("-Xmx640m");
961     
962     commands.add("-Dcatalina.home=" + this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath());
963     //commands.add("-Djava.util.logging.config.file=" + this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "logging.properties");
964     
965     commands.add("-jar");
966     commands.add(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "bootstrap.jar");
967     
968     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("stop", arg)) {
969       commands.add("stop");
970     }
971     
972     System.out.println("\n##################################");
973     
974     String command = "start".equals(arg) ? "startup" : "shutdown";
975     
976     System.out.println("Tomcat " + arg + " with command (note you need CATALINA_HOME and JAVA_HOME set):\n  "
977         + this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + command
978         + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows() ? ".bat" : ".sh") + "\n");
979     
980     //dont wait
981     boolean waitFor = GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("stop", arg) ? true : false;
982     
983     if (waitFor) {
984       try {
985         CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
986             true, true, null, 
987             new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin"), null, true);
988         
989         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
990           System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
991         }
992         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
993           System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
994         }
995       } catch (Throwable e) {
996         e.printStackTrace();
997         if (!shouldContinue("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterTomcatError")) {
998           return;
999         }
1000       }
1001     } else {
1002       //start in new thread
1003       Thread thread = new Thread(new Runnable() {
1004         
1005         @Override
1006         public void run() {
1007           GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
1008               true, true, null, 
1009               new File(GrouperInstaller.this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin"), 
1010               GrouperInstaller.this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "logs" + File.separator + "catalina", false);
1011         }
1012       });
1013       thread.setDaemon(true);
1014       thread.start();
1015 
1016     }
1017     
1018     System.out.println("\nEnd tomcat " + arg + " (note: logs are in " + this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "logs)");
1019     System.out.println("##################################\n");
1020 
1021     System.out.print("Should we check ports to see if tomcat was able to " + arg + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
1022     
1023     boolean shouldCheckTomcat = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun." + arg + "TomcatCheckPorts");
1024     
1025     if (shouldCheckTomcat) {
1026       System.out.print("Waiting for tomcat to " + arg +  "...");
1027       boolean success = false;
1028       for (int i=0;i<60;i++) {
1029         GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(1000);
1030         //check port
1031         boolean portAvailable = GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(this.tomcatHttpPort, this.defaultIpAddress);
1032         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("start", arg)) {
1033           if (!portAvailable) {
1034             success = true;
1035             System.out.println("\nTomcat listening on port: " + this.tomcatHttpPort);
1036             break;
1037           }
1038         } else {
1039           if (portAvailable) {
1040             success = true;
1041             System.out.println("\nTomcat not listening on port: " + this.tomcatHttpPort);
1042             break;
1043           }
1044         }
1045         System.out.print(".");
1046       }
1047       if (!success) {
1048         throw new RuntimeException("Trying to " + arg + " tomcat but couldnt properly detect " + arg + " on port " + this.tomcatHttpPort);
1049       }
1050     } else {
1051       System.out.println("Waiting 10 seconds for tomcat to " + arg + "...");
1052       GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(10000);
1053     }
1054   }
1055   
1056   /**
1057    * 
1058    */
1059   private void addDriverJarToClasspath() {
1060     String jarName = this.giDbUtils.builtinJarName();
1061     
1062     File driverJar = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator + jarName);
1063     GrouperInstallerUtils.classpathAddFile(driverJar);
1064   }

1066   /** db url */
1067   private String dbUrl;
1068 
1069   /** db user */
1070   private String dbUser;
1071 
1072   /** db pass */
1073   private String dbPass;
1074 
1075   /** untarred dir */
1076   private File untarredApiDir;
1077 
1078   /** untarred dir */
1079   private File untarredUiDir;
1080 
1081   /** untarred dir */
1082   private File untarredWsDir;
1083 
1084   /** untarred dir */
1085   private File untarredAntDir;
1086 
1087   /** untarred dir */
1088   private File untarredMavenDir;
1089 
1090   /** untarred dir */
1091   private File untarredTomcatDir;
1092 
1093   /** main install dir, must end in file separator */
1094   private String grouperTarballDirectoryString;
1095   
1096   /** main install dir, must end in file separator */
1097   private String grouperInstallDirectoryString;
1098   
1099   /** base bak dir for backing up files that are upgraded, ends in File separator */
1100   private String grouperBaseBakDir;
1101   
1102   /** grouper system password */
1103   private String grouperSystemPassword;
1104   
1105   /**
1106    * 
1107    */
1108   private void tomcatConfigureGrouperSystem() {
1109     
1110     while (true) {
1111       System.out.print("Enter the GrouperSystem password: ");
1112       this.grouperSystemPassword = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.grouperSystemPassword");
1113       this.grouperSystemPassword = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(this.grouperSystemPassword);
1114       
1115       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.grouperSystemPassword)) {
1116         break;
1117       }
1118       System.out.println("The GrouperSystem password cannot be blank!");
1119     }
1120 
1121     System.out.print("Do you want to set the GrouperSystem password in " + this.untarredTomcatDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "tomcat-users.xml? [t]: ");
1122     boolean setGrouperSystemPassword = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setGrouperSystemPasswordInTomcatUsers");
1123     if (setGrouperSystemPassword) {
1124 
1125       //write to the tomcat_users file
1126       //get the password
1127       File tomcatUsersXmlFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "tomcat-users.xml");
1128       String existingPassword = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(tomcatUsersXmlFile, "tomcat-users/user[@username='GrouperSystem']", "password");
1129       
1130       System.out.println("Editing file: " + tomcatUsersXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
1131 
1132       NodeList existingRole = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(tomcatUsersXmlFile, "tomcat-users/role");
1133       
1134       //<role rolename="grouper_user"/>
1135       //<user username="GrouperSystem" password="chang3m3" roles="grouper_user"/>
1136 
1137       
1138       if (existingPassword == null) {
1139 
1140         addToXmlFile(tomcatUsersXmlFile, ">",  new String[]{"<tomcat-users"}, "<user username=\"GrouperSystem\" password=\"" 
1141             + this.grouperSystemPassword + "\" roles=\"grouper_user\"/>", "Tomcat user GrouperSystem");
1142          
1143       } else {
1144         
1145         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingPassword, this.grouperSystemPassword)) {
1146           System.out.println("  - password is already set to that value, leaving file unchanged...");
1147 
1148         } else {
1149           
1150           editFile(tomcatUsersXmlFile, "password=\"([^\"]*)\"", new String[]{"<user", "username=\"GrouperSystem\""}, 
1151               null, this.grouperSystemPassword, "Tomcat password for user GrouperSystem");
1152           
1153         }
1154         
1155       }
1156 
1157       if (existingRole == null || existingRole.getLength() == 0) {
1158         
1159         //add the role
1160         addToXmlFile(tomcatUsersXmlFile, ">",  new String[]{"<tomcat-users"}, "<role rolename=\"grouper_user\"/>", "Tomcat role grouper_user");
1161         
1162       }
1163     }
1164     
1165   }
1166   
1167   /**
1168    * 
1169    */
1170   private void configureUi() {
1171     //build properties file
1172     File buildPropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "build.properties");
1173     if (!buildPropertiesFile.exists()) {
1174       File buildPropertiesTemplateFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "build.properties.template");
1175       System.out.println("Copying file: " + buildPropertiesTemplateFile.getAbsolutePath() + " to file: " + buildPropertiesFile);
1176       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(buildPropertiesTemplateFile, buildPropertiesFile, true);
1177     }
1178     
1179     //set the grouper property
1180     System.out.println("Editing " + buildPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ": ");
1181     String apiDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath(),"\\\\", "/");
1182     apiDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(apiDir, "\\", "/");
1183     editPropertiesFile(buildPropertiesFile, "grouper.folder", apiDir, false);
1184     editPropertiesFile(buildPropertiesFile, "should.copy.context.xml.to.metainf", "false", false);
1185     
1186   }
1187   
1188   /**
1189    * 
1190    */
1191   private void configureWs() {
1192     //build properties file
1193     File buildPropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator 
1194         + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build.properties");
1195     if (!buildPropertiesFile.exists()) {
1196       File buildPropertiesTemplateFile = new File(this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() 
1197           + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build.example.properties");
1198       System.out.println("Copying file: " + buildPropertiesTemplateFile.getAbsolutePath() + " to file: " + buildPropertiesFile);
1199       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(buildPropertiesTemplateFile, buildPropertiesFile);
1200     }
1201     
1202     //set the grouper property
1203     System.out.println("Editing " + buildPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ": ");
1204     String apiDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath(),"\\\\", "/");
1205     apiDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(apiDir, "\\", "/");
1206     editPropertiesFile(buildPropertiesFile, "grouper.dir", apiDir, false);
1207     
1208   }
1209 
1210   /**
1211    * main function of grouper installer
1212    */
1213   public static enum GrouperInstallerMainFunction {
1214     
1215     /** install grouper */
1216     admin {
1217 
1218       @Override
1219       public void logic(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
1220         
1221         grouperInstaller.mainAdminLogic();
1222 
1223       }
1224     },
1225 
1226     /** install grouper */
1227     install {
1228 
1229       @Override
1230       public void logic(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
1231         
1232         grouperInstaller.mainInstallLogic();
1233 
1234       }
1235     },
1236     
1237     /** upgrade grouper */
1238     upgrade {
1239 
1240       @Override
1241       public void logic(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
1242         
1243         grouperInstaller.mainUpgradeLogic();
1244 
1245       }
1246     },
1247     
1248     /** create patch */
1249     createPatch {
1250 
1251       @Override
1252       public void logic(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
1253         
1254         grouperInstaller.mainCreatePatchLogic();
1255 
1256       }
1257     },
1258     
1259     /** see if there are patches available for grouper */
1260     patch {
1261 
1262       @Override
1263       public void logic(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
1264         
1265         grouperInstaller.mainPatchLogic();
1266 
1267       }
1268     };
1269 
1270     /**
1271      * run the logic for the installer function
1272      * @param grouperInstaller
1273      */
1274     public abstract void logic(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
1275     
1276     /**
1277      * convert a string to the enum
1278      * @param theString
1279      * @param exceptionOnInvalid
1280      * @return the enum
1281      */
1282     public static GrouperInstallerMainFunction valueOfIgnoreCase(String theString, boolean exceptionOnInvalid) {
1283       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerMainFunction.class, theString, false, exceptionOnInvalid);
1284     }
1285   }
1286 
1287   /**
1288    * 
1289    */
1290   private void verifyJava() {
1291     //check that java7+
1292     String versionString = System.getProperty("java.version");
1293     // 1.7.03
1294     int dotPos = versionString.indexOf('.');
1295     if (dotPos <= 0) {
1296       throw new RuntimeException("Expecting something like 1.7.03 but was: '" + versionString + "'");
1297     }
1298     //get the second dot
1299     dotPos = versionString.indexOf('.', dotPos+1);
1300     if (dotPos <= 0) {
1301       throw new RuntimeException("Expecting something like 1.7.03 but was: '" + versionString + "'");
1302     }
1303     versionString = versionString.substring(0, dotPos);
1304     double versionDouble = GrouperInstallerUtils.doubleValue(versionString);
1305     if (versionDouble < 1.7) {
1306       System.out.println("ERROR: grouperInstaller requires to be invoked with at least Java 1.7, but was: " + versionString);
1307       System.exit(1);
1308     }
1309     
1310     //we need a JAVA_HOME of at least java7 too...
1311     String javaHome = System.getenv("JAVA_HOME");
1312     
1313     boolean javaHomeError = false;
1314     
1315     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(javaHome)) {
1316       System.out.println("Non-fatal ERROR: you should have the environment variable JAVA_HOME set to a 1.7+ JDK (currently not set)");
1317       System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue...");
1318       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.javaInvalid");
1319       javaHomeError = true;
1320     }
1321 
1322     String command = null;
1323     
1324     if (!javaHomeError) {
1325       command = javaHome + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "java";
1326       javaHomeError = verifyJavaOutput(command, "the environment variable JAVA_HOME", false, false);
1327     }
1328     
1329     if (!javaHomeError) {
1330       command = javaHome + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "javac";
1331       javaHomeError = verifyJavaOutput(command, "the environment variable JAVA_HOME", true, false);
1332     }
1333 
1334     javaHomeError = false;
1335     command = "java";
1336     verifyJavaOutput(command, "java command in the PATH", false, true);
1337 
1338     if (!javaHomeError) {
1339       command = "javac";
1340       verifyJavaOutput(command, "javac command in the PATH", true, true);
1341     }
1342   }
1343 
1344   /**
1345    * take a java command (e.g. java, or javac, or %JAVA_HOME%/bin/java and make sure version is valid
1346    * @param what
1347    * @param command
1348    * @param jdkTest 
1349    * @param fatal
1350    * @return if error
1351    */
1352   private boolean verifyJavaOutput(String command, String what, boolean jdkTest, boolean fatal) {
1353     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
1354     
1355     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
1356       commands.add(command);
1357     } else {
1358       commands.add(command);
1359     }
1360     
1361     commands.add("-version");
1362       
1363     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
1364         true, true, null, null, null, true);
1365     
1366     //note this is printed view stderr not stdout
1367     String output = commandResult.getErrorText();
1368     
1369     Pattern javaVersionPattern = Pattern.compile(".*?[^\\d]+(\\d+\\.\\d+).*", Pattern.DOTALL);
1370     Matcher javaVersionMatcher = javaVersionPattern.matcher(output);
1371     if (!javaVersionMatcher.matches()) {
1372       output = commandResult.getOutputText();
1373       javaVersionMatcher = javaVersionPattern.matcher(output);
1374       
1375       if (!javaVersionMatcher.matches()) {
1376         if (jdkTest) {
1377           System.out.println((fatal ? "" : "Non-fatal ") + "Error: can't find 'javac' command in " + what + ", Java needs to be a JDK not a JRE!");
1378         }
1379         System.out.println((fatal ? "" : "Non-fatal ") + "Error trying to check java output, make sure you have " + what 
1380             + " set to Java JDK (not JRE) 1.7+\n"
1381             + "" + commandResult.getErrorText() + "\n" + commandResult.getOutputText());
1382         if (!fatal) {
1383           System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue...");
1384           readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.javaInvalid");
1385           return true;
1386         }
1387         System.exit(1);
1388       }
1389     }
1390     
1391     String versionString = javaVersionMatcher.group(1);
1392     
1393     double versionDouble = GrouperInstallerUtils.doubleValue(versionString);
1394     if (versionDouble < 1.7) {
1395       System.out.println((fatal ? "" : "Non-fatal ") + "ERROR: " + what + " requires to be invoked with Java 1.7+ JDK (not JRE), but was: " + versionString);
1396       if (!fatal) {
1397         System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue...");
1398         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.javaInvalid");
1399         return true;
1400       }
1401       System.exit(1);
1402     }
1403     return false;
1404   }
1405   
1406   /**
1407    * 
1408    */
1409   private void mainLogic() {
1410     
1411     this.verifyJava();
1412     
1413     this.grouperInstallerMainFunction = this.grouperInstallerMainFunction();
1414     
1415     this.grouperInstallerMainFunction.logic(this);
1416     
1417   }
1418   
1419   /**
1420    * what are we doing
1421    */
1422   private GrouperInstallerMainFunction grouperInstallerMainFunction;
1423   
1424   /**
1425    * 
1426    */
1427   private void reportOnConflictingJars() {
1428     
1429     System.out.println("\n##################################");
1430     System.out.println("Looking for conflicting jars\n");
1431 
1432     //look for conflicting jars
1433     List<File> allLibraryJars = findAllLibraryFiles();
1434     
1435     Set<String> alreadyProcessed = new HashSet<String>();
1436     
1437     for (File jarFile : allLibraryJars) {
1438       
1439       String baseName = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFileBaseName(jarFile.getName());
1440       
1441       //dont print multiple times
1442       if (alreadyProcessed.contains(baseName)) {
1443         continue;
1444       }
1445       
1446       alreadyProcessed.add(baseName);
1447       
1448       List<File> relatedFiles = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFindJar(allLibraryJars, jarFile.getName());
1449       
1450       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relatedFiles) > 1) {
1451         System.out.println("There is a conflicting jar: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.toStringForLog(relatedFiles));
1452         System.out.println("You should probably delete one of these files (oldest one?) or consult the Grouper team.");
1453         System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue...");
1454         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.conflictingJarContinue");
1455       }
1456       
1457       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relatedFiles) == 0) {
1458         System.out.println("Why is jar file not found??? " + jarFile.getAbsolutePath());
1459       }
1460       
1461     }
1462   }
1463   
1464   /**
1465    * which app is being upgraded
1466    */
1467   private AppToUpgrade appToUpgrade;
1468 
1469   /**
1470    * patch grouper
1471    */
1472   private void mainCreatePatchLogic() {
1473 
1474     //####################################
1475     //Find out what directory to upgrade to.  This ends in a file separator
1476     this.grouperTarballDirectoryString = grouperUpgradeTempDirectory();
1477 
1478     //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
1479     this.appToUpgrade = grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch("create a patch for");
1480     
1481     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
1482       throw new RuntimeException("Cant create patches for client, just put the client patch files in an API patch");
1483     }
1484     
1485     String branchToCreatePatchFor = null;
1486     {
1487       String defaultBranchToCreatePatchFor = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.branchToCreatePatchFor", false);
1488       
1489       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultBranchToCreatePatchFor)) {
1490         //grouper.version = 2.2.1
1491         // convert to GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH
1492         String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
1493 
1494         grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
1495 
1496         Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("(\\d+_\\d+_)\\d+");
1497         Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(grouperVersion);
1498         if (matcher.matches()) {
1499           String majorMinor = matcher.group(1);
1500           defaultBranchToCreatePatchFor = "GROUPER_" + majorMinor + "BRANCH";
1501         }
1502 
1503         
1504       }
1505       
1506       System.out.print("What branch do you want to create a patch for (e.g. GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH)? [" + defaultBranchToCreatePatchFor + "]: ");
1507       branchToCreatePatchFor = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.branchToCreatePatchFor");
1508       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(branchToCreatePatchFor)) {
1509         branchToCreatePatchFor = defaultBranchToCreatePatchFor;
1510       }
1511     }
1512 
1513     String branchForPspToCreatePatchFor = null;
1514 
1515     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.PSP) {
1516       String defaultBranchForPspToCreatePatchFor = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.branchForPspToCreatePatchFor", false);
1517       
1518       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultBranchForPspToCreatePatchFor)) {
1519         //grouper.version = 2.2.1
1520         // convert to PSP_2_2_BRANCH
1521         String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
1522 
1523         grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
1524 
1525         Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("(\\d+_\\d+_)\\d+");
1526         Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(grouperVersion);
1527         if (matcher.matches()) {
1528           String majorMinor = matcher.group(1);
1529           defaultBranchForPspToCreatePatchFor = "PSP_" + majorMinor + "BRANCH";
1530         }
1531       }
1532       
1533       System.out.print("What PSP branch do you want to create a patch for (e.g. GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH)? [" + defaultBranchForPspToCreatePatchFor + "]: ");
1534       branchForPspToCreatePatchFor = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.branchForPspToCreatePatchFor");
1535       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(branchForPspToCreatePatchFor)) {
1536         branchForPspToCreatePatchFor = defaultBranchForPspToCreatePatchFor;
1537       }
1538       
1539     }
1540     
1541     int nextPatchIndex = -1;
1542     
1543     {
1544       String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
1545   
1546       grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
1547   
1548       nextPatchIndex = this.downloadPatches(this.appToUpgrade, grouperVersion);
1549     }
1550     
1551     //see if dir is there: e.g. grouper_v2_2_1_ui_patch_0
1552     String patchName = null;
1553     
1554     {
1555       String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
1556 
1557       grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
1558 
1559       patchName = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + this.appToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + nextPatchIndex;
1560     }
1561  
1562     {
1563       System.out.println("Next patch index for " + this.appToUpgrade + " is " + nextPatchIndex + ". ok (" + patchName + ")? (t|f)? [t]:");
1564       boolean continueOn = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.patchIndexIsOk");
1565       if (!continueOn) {
1566         System.out.println("Patch index is not ok");
1567         throw new RuntimeException("Patch index is not ok");
1568       }
1569     }
1570     
1571     downloadAndUnzipGrouperSource(branchToCreatePatchFor);
1572 
1573     File sourceTagDir = null;
1574 
1575     {
1576       String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
1577       String grouperTag = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
1578       System.out.println("Using Grouper tag: " + grouperTag);
1579       downloadAndUnzipGrouperSource("GROUPER_" + grouperTag);
1580       
1581       sourceTagDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "GROUPER_" + grouperTag
1582           + File.separator + "grouper-GROUPER_" + grouperTag);
1583       
1584     }
1585     
1586     //grouper is in downloadDir/GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH/grouper-GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH
1587     File sourceDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + branchToCreatePatchFor
1588         + File.separator + "grouper-" + branchToCreatePatchFor);
1589 
1590     if (!sourceDir.exists()) {
1591       throw new RuntimeException("Why does source dir not exist??? " + sourceDir);
1592     }
1593 
1594     //grouper is in downloadDir/GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH/grouper-GROUPER_2_2_BRANCH
1595     File pspSourceDir = null;
1596     File pspSourceTagDir = null;
1597 
1598     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.PSP) {
1599       downloadAndUnzipPspSource(branchForPspToCreatePatchFor);
1600 
1601       pspSourceDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + branchForPspToCreatePatchFor
1602           + File.separator + "grouper-psp-" + branchForPspToCreatePatchFor);
1603 
1604       if (!pspSourceDir.exists()) {
1605         throw new RuntimeException("Why does PSP source dir not exist??? " + pspSourceDir);
1606       }
1607 
1608       String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
1609       System.out.println("Using PSP tag: " + grouperVersion);
1610       downloadAndUnzipPspSource(grouperVersion);
1611 
1612       pspSourceTagDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + grouperVersion
1613           + File.separator + "grouper-psp-" + grouperVersion);
1614 
1615       if (!pspSourceTagDir.exists()) {
1616         throw new RuntimeException("Why does PSP source tag dir not exist??? " + pspSourceTagDir);
1617       }
1618     }
1619     
1620     //get ant and maven
1621     this.downloadAndUnzipAnt();
1622     this.downloadAndUnzipMaven();
1623 
1624     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.API) {
1625       //have to build client first
1626       this.buildClient(new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"));
1627       this.buildClient(new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"));
1628       
1629       //build subject api
1630       this.buildSubjectApi(new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "subject"));
1631       this.buildSubjectApi(new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "subject"));
1632     }
1633     
1634     //lets build grouper (always)
1635     this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1636     this.buildGrouperApi(new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper"));
1637     this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1638     this.buildGrouperApi(new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper"));
1639     
1640     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.UI) {
1641       //lets build the UI
1642       this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1643       this.untarredUiDir = new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper-ui");
1644       this.configureUi();
1645       this.buildUi(false);
1646 
1647       this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1648       this.untarredUiDir = new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper-ui");
1649       this.configureUi();
1650       this.buildUi(false);
1651 
1652     }
1653     
1654     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.WS) {
1655       //lets build the WS
1656       this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1657       this.untarredWsDir = new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper-ws");
1658       this.configureWs();
1659       this.buildWs(false);
1660 
1661       this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1662       this.untarredWsDir = new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper-ws");
1663       this.configureWs();
1664       this.buildWs(false);
1665     }    
1666     
1667     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.PSPNG) {
1668       this.untarredPspngDir = new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng");
1669       this.buildPspng(this.untarredPspngDir);
1670 
1671       this.untarredPspngDir = new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng");
1672       this.buildPspng(this.untarredPspngDir);
1673     }    
1674 
1675     if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.PSP) {
1676       this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1677       this.buildPsp(pspSourceDir);
1678 
1679       this.untarredApiDir = new File(sourceTagDir + File.separator + "grouper");
1680       this.buildPsp(pspSourceTagDir);
1681     }    
1682 
1683     //lets index files
1684     Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfFiles = new TreeMap<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile>();
1685     Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfTagFiles = new TreeMap<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile>();
1686 
1687     patchCreateIndexFiles(indexOfFiles, sourceDir, pspSourceDir);
1688     patchCreateIndexFiles(indexOfTagFiles, sourceTagDir, pspSourceTagDir);
1689 
1690     Set<GrouperInstallerIndexFile> grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch = new HashSet<GrouperInstallerIndexFile>();
1691     
1692     //lets get the files from the user
1693     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
1694       
1695       if (i==9) {
1696         throw new RuntimeException("You need to enter valid files!");
1697       }
1698 
1699       //if subsequent pass, then start fresh
1700       grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.clear();
1701       
1702       System.out.println("Enter the comma separated list of files (dont use .class, use .java) to make a patch from: [required]\n");
1703       String filesToMakePatchFromCommaSeparated = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchFilesCommaSeparated");
1704       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(filesToMakePatchFromCommaSeparated)) {
1705         System.out.println("This is a required field!");
1706         continue;
1707       }
1708       
1709       Set<String> fileKeys = new HashSet<String>(GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(
1710           GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList(filesToMakePatchFromCommaSeparated, ",")));
1711 
1712       for (String fileKey : fileKeys) {
1713         
1714         if (fileKey.endsWith(".class")) {
1715           System.out.println("Do not specify .class files, only .java files (will be compiled): '" + fileKey + "'!!!  please re-enter the list");
1716           continue OUTER;
1717         }
1718         
1719         GrouperInstallerIndexFile grouperInstallerIndexFile = indexOfFiles.get(fileKey);
1720         if (grouperInstallerIndexFile == null) {
1721           grouperInstallerIndexFile = indexOfTagFiles.get(fileKey);
1722           //see if we are deleting
1723           if (grouperInstallerIndexFile == null) {
1724             System.out.println("Cant find file: '" + fileKey + "'!!!  please re-enter the list");
1725             continue OUTER;
1726           }
1727         }
1728         
1729         if (grouperInstallerIndexFile.isHasMultipleFilesBySimpleName()
1730             && GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(fileKey, grouperInstallerIndexFile.getSimpleName())) {
1731           System.out.println("This name is in the index multiple times, please be more specific: '" 
1732               + fileKey + "'");
1733           continue OUTER;
1734         }
1735         
1736         if (grouperInstallerIndexFile.isHasMultipleFilesByRelativePath()
1737             && GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(fileKey, grouperInstallerIndexFile.getRelativePath())) {
1738           System.out.println("This relative path is in the index multiple times, please be more specific: '" 
1739               + fileKey + "'");
1740           continue OUTER;
1741         }
1742 
1743         if (grouperInstallerIndexFile.isHasMultipleFilesByPath()
1744             && GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(fileKey, grouperInstallerIndexFile.getPath())) {
1745           System.out.println("This path is in the index multiple times, please be more specific: '" 
1746               + fileKey + "'");
1747           continue OUTER;
1748         }
1749         
1750         grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.add(grouperInstallerIndexFile);
1751       }
1752       break OUTER;
1753     }
1754     
1755     //ok, we have our list of files
1756     //lets go from java to class
1757     for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile grouperInstallerIndexFile : new HashSet<GrouperInstallerIndexFile>(grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch)) {
1758 
1759       if (grouperInstallerIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".java")) {
1760         
1761         String relativePathJava = grouperInstallerIndexFile.getRelativePath();
1762         String relativePathPrefix = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringBeforeLast(relativePathJava, ".");
1763         String relativePathClass = relativePathPrefix + ".class";
1764 
1765         GrouperInstallerIndexFile grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile = indexOfFiles.get(relativePathClass);
1766         
1767         //this will happen in a delete
1768         if (grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile == null) {
1769           continue;
1770         }
1771         
1772         //this shouldnt happen
1773         if (grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile.isHasMultipleFilesByRelativePath()) {
1774           throw new RuntimeException("Class file has multiple files by relative path???? " + relativePathClass);
1775         }
1776 
1777         //found class file
1778         grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.add(grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile);
1779         
1780         //lets get all the inner classes
1781         File parentFile = grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile.getFile().getParentFile();
1782         
1783         //with slash if needed, not sure why a class wouldnt have a package, but handle the case anyways
1784         String parentRelativePathWithSlash = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringBeforeLast(grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile.getRelativePath(), "/") + "/";
1785         if (!grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile.getRelativePath().contains("/")) {
1786           parentRelativePathWithSlash = "";
1787         }
1788         String fileNameInnerClassPrefix = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringBeforeLast(
1789             grouperInstallerIndexFileClassFile.getFile().getName(), ".") + "$";
1790         for (File siblingFile : parentFile.listFiles()) {
1791           if (siblingFile.getName().endsWith(".class") && GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(siblingFile.getName(),fileNameInnerClassPrefix)) {
1792             //this is an inner class
1793             String innerClassRelativePath = parentRelativePathWithSlash + siblingFile.getName();
1794             GrouperInstallerIndexFile innerClassIndexFile = indexOfFiles.get(innerClassRelativePath);
1795             if (innerClassIndexFile == null) {
1796               throw new RuntimeException("Cant find inner class index file??? " + innerClassRelativePath);
1797             }
1798             if (innerClassIndexFile.isHasMultipleFilesByRelativePath()) {
1799               throw new RuntimeException("Inner class file has multiple files by relative path??? " + innerClassRelativePath);
1800             }
1801             //found class file
1802             grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.add(innerClassIndexFile);
1803           }
1804         }
1805       }
1806     }
1807 
1808     File patchDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "patches" + File.separator + patchName);
1809     
1810     if (patchDir.exists()) {
1811       if (patchDir.isFile()) {
1812         throw new RuntimeException("Why is patch directory a file???? " + patchDir.getAbsolutePath());
1813       }
1814       
1815       System.out.println("Local patch dir exists, is it ok to be automatically deleted? (t|f)? [t]:");
1816       boolean continueOn = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.deleteLocalPatchFile");
1817       if (!continueOn) {
1818         System.out.println("Cant continue if not deleting patch dir: " + patchDir.getAbsolutePath());
1819         throw new RuntimeException("Cant continue if not deleting patch dir: " + patchDir.getAbsolutePath());
1820       }
1821       
1822       //delete this dir
1823       GrouperInstallerUtils.deleteRecursiveDirectory(patchDir.getAbsolutePath());
1824       
1825     }
1826 
1827     
1828     //lets look for dependencies
1829     Set<String> dependencyPatchNames = new TreeSet<String>();
1830     
1831     //keep track of files to put in the "old" dir
1832     Map<GrouperInstallerIndexFile, File> indexFileToOldFile = new HashMap<GrouperInstallerIndexFile, File>();
1833     
1834     //go from most recent to oldest
1835     for (int i=nextPatchIndex-1;i>=0;i--) {
1836       
1837       //lets find the patch dir
1838       String currentPatchName = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringBeforeLast(patchName, "_") + "_" + i;
1839       
1840       File currentPatchDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "patches" + File.separator + currentPatchName);
1841 
1842       Iterator<GrouperInstallerIndexFile> iterator = grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.iterator();
1843       
1844       while (iterator.hasNext()) {
1845         
1846         GrouperInstallerIndexFile indexFileToAdd = iterator.next();
1847         
1848         //dont check twice
1849         if (indexFileToOldFile.containsKey(indexFileToAdd)) {
1850           continue;
1851         }
1852         
1853         GrouperInstallerIndexFile indexFileToAddFromBranch = indexOfFiles.get(indexFileToAdd.getRelativePath());
1854         
1855         //note the old file will be in the patch's new directory
1856         File oldFile = new File(currentPatchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator 
1857             + "new" + File.separator + indexFileToAdd.getPatchFileType().getDirName()
1858             + File.separator + GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(indexFileToAdd.getRelativePath(), "/", File.separator));
1859         if (oldFile.exists() && oldFile.isFile()) {
1860 
1861           if (indexFileToAddFromBranch != null && GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(indexFileToAdd.getFile(), oldFile)) {
1862             System.out.println("New file is same as old file: " + indexFileToAdd.getFile().getAbsolutePath() + ", " 
1863                 + oldFile.getAbsolutePath());
1864             System.out.println("This file will not be included in patch");
1865             //remove from patch
1866             iterator.remove();
1867           } else {
1868 
1869             //this is now a dependency
1870             dependencyPatchNames.add(currentPatchName);
1871             
1872             //link this with the installer index file
1873             indexFileToOldFile.put(indexFileToAdd, oldFile);
1874           }          
1875         }
1876         
1877       }
1878       
1879     }
1880     
1881     {
1882       String patchNameDependenciesString = null;
1883       
1884       OUTER: for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
1885         if (i==9) {
1886           throw new RuntimeException("Invalid patch names!");
1887         }
1888         if (dependencyPatchNames.size() == 0) {
1889           
1890           System.out.println("No dependency patches are detected, enter any patch names that are "
1891               + "dependencies that you know of (comma separated), or blank for none:\n");
1892           patchNameDependenciesString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchNameDependenciesCommaSeparated");
1893           
1894         } else {
1895     
1896           System.out.println("These " + dependencyPatchNames.size() + " patches are detected: " 
1897               + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(dependencyPatchNames.iterator(), ", "));
1898           System.out.println("Enter any patch names that are dependencies that you know of (comma separated), or blank for none:\n");
1899           patchNameDependenciesString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchNameDependenciesCommaSeparated");
1900     
1901         }
1902         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(patchNameDependenciesString)) {
1903           List<String> patchNameDependeciesFromUser = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList(patchNameDependenciesString, ",");
1904           for (String currentPatchName : patchNameDependeciesFromUser) {
1905             if (!patchNameValid(currentPatchName)) {
1906               System.out.println("Invalid patch name! '" + currentPatchName + "', enter them again!");
1907               continue OUTER;
1908             }
1909           }
1910           dependencyPatchNames.addAll(patchNameDependeciesFromUser);
1911         }
1912         break;
1913       }
1914       
1915     }    
1916 
1917     //find old files from the tag
1918     Iterator<GrouperInstallerIndexFile> iterator = grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.iterator();
1919     
1920     while (iterator.hasNext()) {
1921       GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile = iterator.next();
1922       //see if its covered in another patch
1923       if (indexFileToOldFile.containsKey(currentIndexFile)) {
1924         continue;
1925       }
1926       
1927       //dont have old files from java or classes, thats only for other patches to do
1928       if (currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".class") || currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".java")) {
1929         continue;
1930       }
1931 
1932       GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFileFromBranch = indexOfFiles.get(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath());
1933       
1934       //look for the old file
1935       GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFileFromTag = indexOfTagFiles.get(currentIndexFile.getPath());
1936       if (currentIndexFileFromTag == null) {
1937         currentIndexFileFromTag = indexOfTagFiles.get(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath());
1938       }
1939       if (currentIndexFileFromTag != null) {
1940         if (currentIndexFileFromTag.isHasMultipleFilesByPath()) {
1941           throw new RuntimeException("Why multiple paths???? " + currentIndexFile + ", " + currentIndexFile.getPath());
1942         }
1943         if (currentIndexFileFromBranch != null && GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(currentIndexFileFromTag.getFile(), currentIndexFile.getFile())) {
1944           System.out.println("New file is same as old file: " + currentIndexFile.getFile().getAbsolutePath() + ", " 
1945               + currentIndexFileFromTag.getFile().getAbsolutePath());
1946           System.out.println("This file will not be included in patch");
1947           //remove from patch
1948           iterator.remove();
1949         } else {
1950           //add this as an old file
1951           indexFileToOldFile.put(currentIndexFile, currentIndexFileFromTag.getFile());
1952         }
1953       }
1954     }
1955     
1956     if (grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch.size() == 0) {
1957       throw new RuntimeException("There are no files to put in patch!");
1958     }
1959     
1960 
1961     //# will show up on screen so user knows what it is
1962     //description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
1963     System.out.print("\nEnter a description for this patch, e.g. GRP-123: fixes a problem with such and such: [required]\n");
1964     String patchDescription = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchDescription");
1965
