1966     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(patchDescription)) {
1967       throw new RuntimeException("Cant have a blank description!");
1968     }
1969 
1970     //# (note, will try to get this from patch description, if its there, this can be blank)
1971     Matcher patchJiraKeyMatcher = Pattern.compile(".*(GRP-\\d+).*").matcher(patchDescription);
1972     String defaultPatchJiraKey = "";
1973     if (patchJiraKeyMatcher.matches()) {
1974       defaultPatchJiraKey = patchJiraKeyMatcher.group(1);
1975     }
1976     System.out.print("\nEnter a Jira key (e.g. GRP-123) for this patch: [required] " 
1977         + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultPatchJiraKey) ? "" : ("[" + defaultPatchJiraKey + "]")) + "\n");
1978     String patchJiraKey = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchJiraKey");
1979     
1980     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(patchJiraKey)) {
1981       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultPatchJiraKey)) {
1982         patchJiraKey = defaultPatchJiraKey;
1983       } else {
1984         throw new RuntimeException("Cant have a blank jira key!");
1985       }
1986     }
1987     
1988     if (!Pattern.compile("^GRP-\\d+$").matcher(patchJiraKey).matches()) {
1989       throw new RuntimeException("Patch jira key must be valid: '" + patchJiraKey + "'");
1990     }
1991 
1992     String patchRiskLevel = null;
1993     
1994     {
1995       //# low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
1996       //risk = low
1997       System.out.println("Enter the risk level for the patch: (low|medium|high): [required] ");
1998       String patchRiskLevelInput = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchRiskLevel");
1999       
2000       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase("low", patchRiskLevelInput)) {
2001         patchRiskLevel = "low";
2002       } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase("medium", patchRiskLevelInput)) {
2003         patchRiskLevel = "medium";
2004       } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase("high", patchRiskLevelInput)) {
2005         patchRiskLevel = "high";
2006       } else {
2007         throw new RuntimeException("Invalid risk level: '" + patchRiskLevelInput + "', expecting low|medium|high");
2008       }
2009       
2010     }
2011     
2012     //# is this is a security patch (true or false)
2013     //security = false
2014     System.out.println("Is this a security patch? (t|f): [t] ");
2015     boolean securityPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.patchSecurity");
2016 
2017     boolean requiresRestart = false;
2018     for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch) {
2019       if (currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".jar")
2020           || currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".java")) {
2021         requiresRestart = true;
2022       }
2023     }
2024     //# if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
2025     //requiresRestart = false
2026     if (requiresRestart) {
2027       System.out.println("It is detected that your patch requires restart");
2028     } else {
2029       System.out.println("It is NOT detected that your patch requires restart, please confirm this, does it require restart (t|f)? [f] ");
2030       requiresRestart = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.overrideDoesntRequireRestart");
2031       
2032       if (requiresRestart) {
2033         System.out.println("Perhaps the maintainer of the Grouper Installer can use this feedback to make a better guess on restart, let them know");
2034         GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(2000);
2035       }
2036     }
2037     //at this point we can build the patch dir and file and put files in there
2038     
2039     //# patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
2040     //dependencies = 
2041 
2042     //create the dir
2043     GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(patchDir);
2044     
2045     {
2046       String patchPropertiesContents = "# will show up on screen so user knows what it is\n"
2047           + "description = " + patchDescription + "\n"
2048           + "\n"
2049           + "# patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)\n"
2050           + "dependencies = " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(dependencyPatchNames.iterator(), ", ") + "\n"
2051           + "\n"
2052           + "# low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch\n"
2053           + "risk = " + patchRiskLevel + "\n"
2054           + "\n"
2055           + "# is this is a security patch (true or false)\n"
2056           + "security = " + securityPatch + "\n"
2057           + "\n"
2058           + "# if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)\n"
2059           + "requiresRestart = " + requiresRestart + "\n";
2060       String patchPropertiesFileName = patchDir + File.separator + patchDir.getName() + ".properties";
2061       GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(new File(patchPropertiesFileName), patchPropertiesContents);
2062     }
2063     
2064     //lets do old files
2065     //start with old files
2066     if (indexFileToOldFile.size() > 0) {
2067       GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old"));
2068       for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : indexFileToOldFile.keySet()) {
2069 
2070         File oldFile = new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old" + File.separator
2071             + currentIndexFile.getPatchFileType().getDirName() + File.separator
2072             + GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath(), "/", File.separator));
2073         
2074         GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(oldFile.getParentFile());
2075         
2076         System.out.println("Copying old file from " + indexFileToOldFile.get(currentIndexFile).getAbsolutePath()
2077             + "\n   to: " + oldFile.getAbsolutePath());
2078         
2079         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(indexFileToOldFile.get(currentIndexFile), oldFile);
2080         
2081       }
2082     }
2083 
2084     //now put new files in place
2085     {
2086       GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new"));
2087       for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch) {
2088 
2089         //is it a delete? then there is no new file
2090         if (!indexOfFiles.containsKey(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath())) {
2091           continue;
2092         }
2093         
2094         File newFile = new File(patchDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new" + File.separator
2095             + currentIndexFile.getPatchFileType().getDirName() + File.separator
2096             + GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(currentIndexFile.getRelativePath(), "/", File.separator));
2097         
2098         GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(newFile.getParentFile());
2099         
2100         System.out.println("Copying new file from " + currentIndexFile.getFile().getAbsolutePath()
2101             + "\n   to: " + newFile.getAbsolutePath());
2102         
2103         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(currentIndexFile.getFile().getAbsoluteFile(), newFile);
2104         
2105       }
2106     }
2107 
2108     {
2109       //generate the wiki markup
2110       //    <tr>
2111       //      <td>
2112       //        <p>
2113       //          <a href="https://software.internet2.edu/grouper/release/2.2.1/patches/grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_1.tar.gz">grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_1</a>
2114       //        </p>
2115       //      </td>
2116       //      <td>
2117       //        <p>
2118       //          <a href="https://bugs.internet2.edu/jira/browse/GRP-1096">GRP-1096: Use threads for 2.2 upgrade to decrease time of upgrade</a>
2119       //        </p>
2120       //      </td>
2121       //      <td>
2122       //        <p>classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/internal/dao/hib3/Hib3StemSetDAO.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/MigrateLegacyAttributes.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/AddMissingGroupSets.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/SyncPITTables.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/misc/SyncStemSets.java <br class="atl-forced-newline"/> classes/grouper.base.properties</p>
2123       //      </td>
2124       //    </tr>
2125       String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
2126 
2127       String wikiMarkup = "    <tr>\n"
2128         + "      <td>\n"
2129         + "        <p>\n"
2130         + "          <a href=\"https://software.internet2.edu/grouper/release/" + grouperVersion + "/patches/" + patchName + ".tar.gz\">" + patchName + "</a>\n"
2131         + "        </p>\n"
2132         + "      </td>\n"
2133         + "      <td>\n"
2134         + "        <p>\n"
2135         + "          <a href=\"https://bugs.internet2.edu/jira/browse/" + patchJiraKey + "\">" + patchDescription + "</a>\n"
2136         + "        </p>\n"
2137         + "      </td>\n"
2138         + "      <td>\n"
2139         + "        <p>";
2140       
2141       boolean isFirst = true;
2142       for (GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentIndexFile : grouperInstallerIndexFilesToAddToPatch) {
2143         
2144         //just do java files
2145         if (currentIndexFile.getSimpleName().endsWith(".class")) {
2146           continue;
2147         }
2148         
2149         //classes/edu/internet2/middleware/grouper/internal/dao/hib3/Hib3StemSetDAO.java 
2150         //<br class=\"atl-forced-newline\"/>
2151 
2152         if (!isFirst) {
2153           wikiMarkup += "<br class=\"atl-forced-newline\"/>";
2154         }
2155         wikiMarkup += currentIndexFile.getPatchFileType().getDirName() + "/" 
2156             + currentIndexFile.getRelativePath();
2157 
2158         isFirst = false;
2159         
2160       }
2161       wikiMarkup += "</p>\n      </td>\n"
2162         + "    </tr>\n";
2163     
2164       System.out.println("Here is the wiki markup for the release notes page, copy and paste that into confluence using the <> button:");
2165       System.out.println("\n" + wikiMarkup + "\n");
2166       System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue.");
2167       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchContinueAfterWikiMarkup");
2168     }
2169     
2170     // tar this up
2171     File tarfile = new File(patchDir.getParentFile() + File.separator + patchName + ".tar");
2172     GrouperInstallerUtils.tar(patchDir, tarfile);
2173     
2174     System.out.println("\nDo you want to name this file as a test version so you can test it without affecting other users? (t|f) [t]: ");
2175     boolean patchUseTestFileName = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.patchNameFileAsTestVersion");
2176 
2177     File gzipfile = new File(patchDir.getParentFile() + File.separator + patchName + (patchUseTestFileName ? "_test" : "") + ".tar.gz");
2178     GrouperInstallerUtils.gzip(tarfile, gzipfile);
2179 
2180     System.out.println("\nSUCCESS: your patch is here: " + gzipfile.getAbsolutePath());
2181 
2182   }
2183 
2184   /**
2185    * patch pattern
2186    */
2187   private static final Pattern patchNamePattern = Pattern.compile("^grouper_v(\\d+)_(\\d+)_(\\d+)_(api|ws|ui|psp|pspng)_patch_\\d+$");
2188 
2189   
2190   /**
2191    * see if valid patch name e.g. grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0
2192    * @param patchName
2193    * @return true for valid
2194    */
2195   private static boolean patchNameValid(String patchName) {
2196     //validate patch names
2197     return patchNamePattern.matcher(patchName).matches();
2198 
2199   }
2200   
2201   /**
2202    * index files from a source directory
2203    * @param theIndexOfFiles index of label to the index file object
2204    * @param theSourceDir to look for files in
2205    * @param thePspSourceDir is psp source dir to look for files in
2206    */
2207   private void patchCreateIndexFiles(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> theIndexOfFiles, File theSourceDir, File thePspSourceDir) {
2208     System.out.println("\nCreating file index to make patches from " + theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + "...\n");
2209     
2210     switch(this.appToUpgrade) {
2211       case CLIENT:
2212         throw new RuntimeException("No patching client, patch API instead");
2213       case API:
2214 
2215         //index the subject API
2216 // dont think we need lib from subject, only api
2217 //        this.patchCreateProcessFiles(indexOfFiles, 
2218 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2219 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "lib"),
2220 //            PatchFileType.lib);
2221 
2222         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2223             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2224             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "build"),
2225             PatchFileType.clazz);
2226 
2227         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2228             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2229             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "src"),
2230             PatchFileType.clazz);
2231 
2232         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2233             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject"),
2234             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "subject" + File.separator + "conf"),
2235             PatchFileType.clazz);
2236 
2237         //index the grouper client
2238 // dont think we need lib from client, only api
2239 //        this.patchCreateProcessFiles(indexOfFiles, 
2240 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2241 //            new File(sourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" + File.separator + "lib"),
2242 //            PatchFileType.lib);
2243 
2244         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2245             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2246             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2247                 + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "bin"),
2248             PatchFileType.clazz);
2249 
2250         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2251             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2252             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2253                 + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + "java"),
2254             PatchFileType.clazz);
2255 
2256         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2257             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2258             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2259                 + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + "ext"),
2260             PatchFileType.clazz);
2261 
2262         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2263             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient"),
2264             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouperClient" 
2265                 + File.separator + "conf"),
2266             PatchFileType.clazz);
2267 
2268         //add grouper api files
2269         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2270             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2271             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "lib"),
2272             PatchFileType.lib);
2273 
2274         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2275             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2276             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "dist" 
2277                 + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "grouper"),
2278             PatchFileType.clazz);
2279 
2280         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2281             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2282             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "conf"),
2283             PatchFileType.clazz);
2284 
2285         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2286             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper"),
2287             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "src" 
2288                 + File.separator + "grouper"),
2289             PatchFileType.clazz);
2290 
2291         break;
2292       case UI:
2293         
2294         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2295             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2296             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2297                 + File.separator + "java" + File.separator + "lib"),
2298             PatchFileType.lib);
2299         
2300         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2301             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2302             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2303                 + File.separator + "java" + File.separator + "src"),
2304             PatchFileType.clazz);
2305         
2306         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2307             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2308             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2309                 + File.separator + "conf"),
2310             PatchFileType.clazz);
2311         
2312         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2313             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2314             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2315                 + File.separator + "temp" + File.separator + "jarBin"),
2316             PatchFileType.clazz);
2317         
2318         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2319             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui"),
2320             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ui" 
2321                 + File.separator + "webapp"),
2322             PatchFileType.file);
2323         
2324         break;
2325       case WS:
2326         
2327         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2328             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2329             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2330                 + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2331             PatchFileType.lib);
2332 
2333         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2334             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2335             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2336                 + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "rampart"),
2337             PatchFileType.lib);
2338 
2339         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2340             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2341             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2342                 + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2343             PatchFileType.clazz);
2344         
2345         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2346             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2347             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2348                 + File.separator + "conf"),
2349             PatchFileType.clazz);
2350         
2351         // we need to get all the source folders except test, note, each release adds another
2352         File parentSourceDir = new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
2353             + File.separator + "src");
2354 
2355         for (File wsSourceDir : parentSourceDir.listFiles()) {
2356           if (wsSourceDir.isFile() || !wsSourceDir.getName().startsWith("grouper")) {
2357             continue;
2358           }
2359           this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2360               new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2361               new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2362                   + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + wsSourceDir.getName()),
2363               PatchFileType.clazz);
2364         }
2365 
2366         //files
2367         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2368             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"),
2369             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2370                 + File.separator + "webapp"),
2371             PatchFileType.file);
2372         
2373         break;
2374         
2375       case PSP:
2376         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2377             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2378             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "target" 
2379                 + File.separator + "dependency"),
2380             PatchFileType.lib);
2381         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2382             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2383             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "src" 
2384                 + File.separator + "main" + File.separator + "java"),
2385             PatchFileType.clazz);
2386         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2387             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2388             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "src" 
2389                 + File.separator + "main" + File.separator + "resources"),
2390             PatchFileType.clazz);
2391         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2392             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp"),
2393             new File(thePspSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" + File.separator + "target" 
2394                 + File.separator + "classes"),
2395             PatchFileType.clazz);
2396 
2397         break;
2398       case PSPNG:
2399 
2400         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2401             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng"),
2402             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng" 
2403                 + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "dependency"),
2404             PatchFileType.lib);
2405 
2406         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2407             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng"),
2408             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng" 
2409                 + File.separator + "src" + File.separator + "main" + File.separator + "java"),
2410             PatchFileType.clazz);
2411 
2412         this.patchCreateProcessFiles(theIndexOfFiles, 
2413             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng"),
2414             new File(theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-misc" + File.separator + "grouper-pspng" 
2415                 + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "classes"),
2416             PatchFileType.clazz);
2417 
2418         break;
2419     }
2420     
2421     //print out files for debugging
2422     //for (String key : theIndexOfFiles.keySet()) {
2423     //  if (key.toLowerCase().contains("mygroupsmemberships")) {
2424     //    System.out.println(key + " -> " + theIndexOfFiles.get(key));
2425     //  }
2426     //}
2427 
2428     System.out.println("\nDone creating file index to make patches from " + theSourceDir.getAbsolutePath() + "... found " + theIndexOfFiles.size() + " files\n");
2429 
2430   }
2431   
2432   /**
2433    * @param directory to look in
2434    * @param projectDirectory is the directory where the project is for the files
2435    * @param indexOfFiles the index
2436    * @param patchFileType
2437    */
2438   private void patchCreateProcessFiles(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfFiles, File projectDirectory, File directory, 
2439       PatchFileType patchFileType) {
2440     
2441     this.patchCreateProcessFilesHelper(indexOfFiles, projectDirectory, directory, patchFileType, "");
2442 
2443   }
2444 
2445   /**
2446    * @param directory to look in
2447    * @param projectDirectory is the directory where the project is for the files
2448    * @param indexOfFiles
2449    * @param relativePath in the main path to look in, helps with restrictions
2450    * @param patchFileType
2451    */
2452   private void patchCreateProcessFilesHelper(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfFiles, 
2453       File projectDirectory, File directory, 
2454       PatchFileType patchFileType, String relativePath) {
2455 
2456     try {
2457       //lets spider through directory and add files to index
2458       //get the files into a vector
2459       File[] allFiles = directory.listFiles();
2460   
2461       //loop through the array
2462       for (int i = 0; i < allFiles.length; i++) {
2463   
2464         File currentFileOrDirectory = allFiles[i];
2465         
2466         if (-1 < currentFileOrDirectory.getName().indexOf("..")) {
2467           continue; //dont go to the parent directory
2468         }
2469   
2470         //go to sub directory
2471         String newRelativePath = GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(relativePath) ? currentFileOrDirectory.getName() 
2472             : (relativePath + "/" + currentFileOrDirectory.getName());
2473   
2474         if (currentFileOrDirectory.isFile()) {
2475   
2476           boolean addFile = false;
2477           
2478           String fileRelativePath = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileRelativePath(projectDirectory, currentFileOrDirectory);
2479   
2480           switch(patchFileType) {
2481   
2482             case lib:
2483               
2484               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
2485                 addFile = true;
2486               }
2487   
2488               break;
2489             case file:
2490               addFile = true;
2491               
2492               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
2493                 addFile = false;
2494               }
2495   
2496               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".class")) {
2497                 addFile = false;
2498               }
2499   
2500               if (currentFileOrDirectory.getName().endsWith(".java")) {
2501                 addFile = false;
2502               }
2503   
2504               //these are classes not files
2505               if (GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(fileRelativePath,"WEB-INF/classes")) {
2506                 addFile = false;
2507               }
2508   
2509               //these are libs not files
2510               if (GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(fileRelativePath,"WEB-INF/lib")) {
2511                 addFile = false;
2512               }
2513   
2514               break;
2515             default: 
2516               addFile = true;
2517           }
2518   
2519           if (addFile) {
2520             GrouperInstallerIndexFile grouperInstallerIndexFile = new GrouperInstallerIndexFile();
2521             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setSimpleName(currentFileOrDirectory.getName());
2522             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setRelativePath(newRelativePath);
2523             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setFile(currentFileOrDirectory);
2524             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setPatchFileType(patchFileType);
2525             grouperInstallerIndexFile.setPath(fileRelativePath);
2526             
2527             //add by name
2528             if (patchCreateAddFileToIndex(indexOfFiles, grouperInstallerIndexFile, currentFileOrDirectory.getName())) {
2529               //different file
2530               indexOfFiles.get(currentFileOrDirectory.getName()).setHasMultipleFilesBySimpleName(true);
2531               System.out.println("Note: duplicate file by name: " + currentFileOrDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
2532             }
2533             
2534             //add by relative path
2535             if (patchCreateAddFileToIndex(indexOfFiles, grouperInstallerIndexFile, newRelativePath)) {
2536               //different file
2537               indexOfFiles.get(currentFileOrDirectory.getName()).setHasMultipleFilesByRelativePath(true);
2538               System.out.println("Note: duplicate file by relative path: " + currentFileOrDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
2539             }
2540   
2541             //add by path
2542             if (patchCreateAddFileToIndex(indexOfFiles, grouperInstallerIndexFile, grouperInstallerIndexFile.getPath())) {
2543               //different file
2544               indexOfFiles.get(currentFileOrDirectory.getName()).setHasMultipleFilesByPath(true);
2545               System.out.println("Note: duplicate file by path: " + currentFileOrDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
2546             }
2547           }
2548           
2549         } else {
2550                   
2551           patchCreateProcessFilesHelper(indexOfFiles, projectDirectory, currentFileOrDirectory, patchFileType, newRelativePath);
2552           
2553         }
2554       }
2555     } catch (Exception e) {
2556       throw new RuntimeException("Problem with directory: " + directory.getAbsolutePath(), e);
2557     }
2558     
2559   }
2560 
2561   /**
2562    * @param indexOfFiles database of files by various lookup names
2563    * @param grouperInstallerIndexFile file to add
2564    * @param key add by this key
2565    * @return true if file already there and different
2566    */
2567   private boolean patchCreateAddFileToIndex(Map<String, GrouperInstallerIndexFile> indexOfFiles, 
2568       GrouperInstallerIndexFile grouperInstallerIndexFile, String key) {
2569     
2570     //convert slashes on key
2571     key = key.replace('\\', '/');
2572     
2573     GrouperInstallerIndexFile currentFileInIndex = indexOfFiles.get(key);
2574     if (currentFileInIndex == null) {
2575       indexOfFiles.put(key, grouperInstallerIndexFile);
2576     } else {
2577       //skip these, who cares, too many dupes
2578       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(grouperInstallerIndexFile.getSimpleName(), "package-info.java")
2579           && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(grouperInstallerIndexFile.getSimpleName(), "package.html")) {
2580         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(grouperInstallerIndexFile.computeSha1(), currentFileInIndex.computeSha1())) {
2581           return true;
2582         }
2583       }
2584     }
2585     return false;
2586   }
2587   
2588   /**
2589    * build PSP
2590    * @param pspDir
2591    */
2592   private void buildPsp(File pspDir) {
2593     if (!pspDir.exists() || pspDir.isFile()) {
2594       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find psp: " + pspDir.getAbsolutePath());
2595     }
2596     
2597     File pspBuildToDir = new File(pspDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp" 
2598         + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "classes");
2599     
2600     boolean rebuildPsp = true;
2601     
2602     if (pspBuildToDir.exists()) {
2603       System.out.print("The PSP has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2604       rebuildPsp = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildPspAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2605     }
2606     
2607     if (!rebuildPsp) {
2608       return;
2609     }
2610     
2611     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2612     
2613 //    \bin\mvn compile -DskipTests
2614     addMavenCommands(commands);
2615 
2616     //put 'compile -DskipTests' in there so it wont run tests which we dont want to do
2617     // dependency:copy-dependencies package -DskipTests
2618     //not compile
2619     commands.add("dependency:copy-dependencies");
2620     commands.add("package");
2621     commands.add("-DskipTests");
2622     commands.add("-Drat.ignoreErrors=true");
2623     commands.add("-Dlicense.skip=true");
2624     
2625     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2626     System.out.println("Building PSP with command:\n" + pspDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2627         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2628     
2629     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2630         true, true, null, new File(pspDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "psp-parent"), null, true);
2631     
2632     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2633       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2634     }
2635     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2636       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2637     }
2638 
2639     System.out.println("\nEnd building PSP");
2640     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2641     
2642   }
2643 
2644   /**
2645    * build grouper API
2646    * @param grouperApiDir
2647    */
2648   private void buildGrouperApi(File grouperApiDir) {
2649 
2650     if (!grouperApiDir.exists() || grouperApiDir.isFile()) {
2651       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find grouper api: " + grouperApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
2652     }
2653     
2654     File grouperBuildToDir = new File(grouperApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "build" 
2655         + File.separator + "grouper");
2656     
2657     boolean rebuildGrouperApi = true;
2658     
2659     if (grouperBuildToDir.exists()) {
2660       System.out.print("The Grouper API has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2661       rebuildGrouperApi = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildGrouperApiAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2662     }
2663     
2664     if (!rebuildGrouperApi) {
2665       return;
2666     }
2667     
2668     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2669     
2670     addAntCommands(commands);
2671 
2672     //this will run tests which we dont want to do
2673     commands.add("dist");
2674     
2675     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2676     System.out.println("Building grouper API with command:\n" + grouperApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2677         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2678     
2679     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2680         true, true, null, grouperApiDir, null, true);
2681     
2682     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2683       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2684     }
2685     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2686       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2687     }
2688 
2689     System.out.println("\nEnd building grouper API");
2690     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2691     
2692   }
2693   
2694 
2695 
2696   /**
2697    * build subject API
2698    * @param subjectApiDir
2699    */
2700   private void buildSubjectApi(File subjectApiDir) {
2701     if (!subjectApiDir.exists() || subjectApiDir.isFile()) {
2702       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find subject api: " + subjectApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
2703     }
2704     
2705     File subjectBuildToDir = new File(subjectApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "build");
2706     
2707     boolean rebuildSubject = true;
2708     
2709     if (subjectBuildToDir.exists()) {
2710       System.out.print("The Grouper subject API has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2711       rebuildSubject = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildSubjectApiAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2712     }
2713     
2714     if (!rebuildSubject) {
2715       return;
2716     }
2717     
2718     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2719     
2720     addAntCommands(commands);
2721 
2722     //put 'compile' in there so it wont run tests which we dont want to do
2723     commands.add("compile");
2724     
2725     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2726     System.out.println("Building subject API with command:\n" + subjectApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2727         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2728     
2729     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2730         true, true, null, subjectApiDir, null, true);
2731     
2732     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2733       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2734     }
2735     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2736       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2737     }
2738 
2739     System.out.println("\nEnd building subject API");
2740     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2741     
2742     
2743     
2744   }
2745   
2746 
2747   /**
2748    * build client API
2749    * @param clientDir
2750    */
2751   private void buildClient(File clientDir) {
2752     if (!clientDir.exists() || clientDir.isFile()) {
2753       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find client: " + clientDir.getAbsolutePath());
2754     }
2755     
2756     File clientBuildToDir = new File(clientDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "bin");
2757     
2758     boolean rebuildClient = true;
2759     
2760     if (clientBuildToDir.exists()) {
2761       System.out.print("The Grouper client has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
2762       rebuildClient = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildClientAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
2763     }
2764     
2765     if (!rebuildClient) {
2766       return;
2767     }
2768 
2769     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
2770     
2771     addAntCommands(commands);
2772     
2773     System.out.println("\n##################################");
2774     System.out.println("Building client with command:\n" + clientDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
2775         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
2776     
2777     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
2778         true, true, null, clientDir, null, true);
2779     
2780     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
2781       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
2782     }
2783     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
2784       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
2785     }
2786 
2787     System.out.println("\nEnd building client");
2788     System.out.println("##################################\n");
2789     
2790   }
2791 
2792   /**
2793    * admin
2794    */
2795   private void mainAdminLogic() {
2796     
2797     this.version = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
2798     
2799     GrouperInstallerAdminAction grouperInstallerMiscAction = null;
2800     
2801     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
2802       //what do we want to do, install, revert, or get status?
2803       System.out.print("What admin action do you want to do (manage, upgradeTask)? : ");
2804       String adminAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.adminAction");
2805       try {
2806         grouperInstallerMiscAction = GrouperInstallerAdminAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(adminAction, false, true);
2807         if (grouperInstallerMiscAction != null) {
2808           break;
2809         }
2810       } catch (Exception e) {
2811         //ignore, let user try again
2812       }
2813     }
2814     
2815     switch(grouperInstallerMiscAction) {
2816       case manage:
2817         mainManageLogic();
2818         break;
2819 
2820       case upgradeTask:
2821         mainUpgradeTaskLogic();
2822         break;
2823     }
2824         
2825   }
2826 
2827   /**
2828    * admin manage
2829    */
2830   private void mainManageLogic() {
2831     
2832     //####################################
2833     //Find out what directory to install to.  This ends in a file separator
2834     this.grouperInstallDirectoryString = grouperInstallDirectory();
2835 
2836     GrouperInstallerManageAction grouperInstallerManageAction = null;
2837 
2838     while (true) {
2839       for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
2840         System.out.print("What do you want to manage (logs, services, back, exit)? : ");
2841         String manageAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.manageAction");
2842         try {
2843           grouperInstallerManageAction = GrouperInstallerManageAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(manageAction, false, true);
2844           if (grouperInstallerManageAction != null) {
2845             break;
2846           }
2847         } catch (Exception e) {
2848           //ignore, let user try again
2849         }
2850       }
2851       switch(grouperInstallerManageAction) {
2852         case logs:
2853       
2854           //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
2855           this.appToUpgrade = grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch("look at logs for");
2856 
2857           System.out.println("Find where the application is running, then find the log4j.properties in the classpath.");
2858           
2859           switch (this.appToUpgrade) {
2860             case PSP:
2861             case PSPNG:
2862               System.out.println("This runs in the API, so logging for the API will be examined.");
2863               //pass through to API
2864             case API:
2865               System.out.println("The API (generally invoked via GSH) logs to where the log4.properties specifies.");
2866               File log4jPropertiesFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator 
2867                   + "conf" + File.separator + "log4j.properties");
2868               
2869               if (!log4jPropertiesFile.exists()) {
2870                 
2871                 List<File> allFiles = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileListRecursive(new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
2872                 log4jPropertiesFile = null;
2873                 boolean multipleFound = false;
2874                 for (File file : allFiles) {
2875                   if ("log4j.properties".equals(file.getName())) {
2876                     if (log4jPropertiesFile != null) {
2877                       multipleFound = true;
2878                       log4jPropertiesFile = null;
2879                       break;
2880                     }
2881                     log4jPropertiesFile = file;
2882                   }
2883                 }
2884                 if (multipleFound || log4jPropertiesFile == null) {
2885                   System.out.print("What is the absolute path of the log4j.properties? : ");
2886                   String log4jPropertiesLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.log4jPropertiesLocation");
2887                   log4jPropertiesFile = new File(log4jPropertiesLocation);
2888                   if (!log4jPropertiesFile.exists()) {
2889                     System.out.println("Bad location: " + log4jPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
2890                     System.exit(1);
2891                   }
2892                 }
2893               }
2894               
2895               File logFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString  
2896                   + "logs" + File.separator + "grouper_error.log");
2897               String grouperHomeWithSlash = this.grouperInstallDirectoryString;
2898 
2899               if (!logFile.exists()) {
2900                 logFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator 
2901                     + "logs" + File.separator + "grouper_error.log");
2902                 grouperHomeWithSlash = this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator;
2903               }              
2904               System.out.println("By default the installer configures the log file to be: " + logFile.getAbsolutePath());
2905               
2906               
2907               analyzeLogFile(log4jPropertiesFile, grouperHomeWithSlash, null, null);
2908               break;
2909             case CLIENT:
2910               System.out.println("The client generally logs to STDOUT.  Check the grouper.client.properties or if there is a log4j.properties in the clients classpath.");
2911               break;
2912             case WS:
2913             case UI:
2914               File catalinaLogFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "logs");
2915               if (!catalinaLogFile.exists()) {
2916                 //if used the webapps dir
2917                 catalinaLogFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + ".." + File.separator + ".." + File.separator + "logs");
2918               }
2919               if (!catalinaLogFile.exists()) {
2920                 catalinaLogFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + File.separator 
2921                     + "apache-tomcat-6.0.35" + File.separator + "logs");
2922               }
2923               
2924               System.out.println("Tomcat logs STDOUT and STDERR to the catalinaErr.log "
2925                   + "and catalinaOut.log logfiles, which should be here: " + catalinaLogFile.getAbsolutePath());
2926               if (!catalinaLogFile.exists()) {
2927                 System.out.println("Warning: that directory does not exist, so you will need to locate the logs directory for tomcat.");
2928               }
2929               System.out.println("Locate the " + this.appToUpgrade + " application files.");
2930               System.out.println("By default the installer has the " + this.appToUpgrade + " running based on the tomcat server.xml, "
2931                   + "but could also run in the webapps dir.");
2932               
2933               File serverXmlFile = new File(catalinaLogFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
2934               
2935               if (!serverXmlFile.exists()) {
2936                 System.out.println("server.xml not found: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
2937               } else {
2938                 //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ws-2.3.0/grouper-ws/build/dist/grouper-ws" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
2939                 //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ui-2.3.0/dist/grouper" path="/grouper" reloadable="false"/>
2940 
2941                 System.out.println("The server.xml is located: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
2942 
2943                 String tomcatPath = this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.UI ? "grouper" : "grouper-ws";
2944 
2945                 System.out.print("What is the URL starting path? [" + tomcatPath + "]: ");
2946                 String newTomcatPath = readFromStdIn(this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.UI ? "grouperInstaller.autorun.urlPathForUi" : "grouperInstaller.autorun.urlPathForWs");
2947                 
2948                 if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newTomcatPath)) {
2949                   tomcatPath = newTomcatPath;
2950                 }
2951 
2952                 if (tomcatPath.endsWith("/") || tomcatPath.endsWith("\\")) {
2953                   tomcatPath = tomcatPath.substring(0, tomcatPath.length()-1);
2954                 }
2955                 if (tomcatPath.startsWith("/") || tomcatPath.startsWith("\\")) {
2956                   tomcatPath = tomcatPath.substring(1, tomcatPath.length());
2957                 }                  
2958                 String currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
2959                     "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + tomcatPath + "']", "docBase");
2960 
2961                 if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.UI) {
2962                   //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ui-2.3.0/dist/grouper" path="/grouper" reloadable="false"/>
2963                   System.out.println("Looking for an entry in the server.xml that looks like this:");
2964                   System.out.println("  <Context docBase=\""
2965                       + GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(currentDocBase, this.grouperInstallDirectoryString 
2966                           + "grouper.ui-" + this.version + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator 
2967                           + "grouper")
2968                       + "\" path=\"/" + tomcatPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>");
2969 
2970                 } else if (this.appToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.WS) {
2971                   //<Context docBase="/Users/mchyzer/tmp/grouperInstaller/grouper.ws-2.3.0/grouper-ws/build/dist/grouper-ws" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
2972                   System.out.println("Looking for an entry in the server.xml that looks like this:");
2973                   System.out.println("  <Context docBase=\""
2974                       + GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(currentDocBase, this.grouperInstallDirectoryString 
2975                           + "grouper.ws-" + this.version + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
2976                           + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator 
2977                           + "grouper-ws")
2978                       + "\" path=\"/" + tomcatPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>");
2979                 }
2980                 
2981                 if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(currentDocBase)) {
2982                   System.out.println("The docBase for the " + tomcatPath + " entry in the server.xml is: " + currentDocBase);
2983                 } else {
2984                   //check webapps
2985                   System.out.println("The docBase could not be found in the server.xml, check in the tomcat" 
2986                       + File.separator + "webapps directory");
2987                   currentDocBase = catalinaLogFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "webapps" + File.separator + tomcatPath;
2988                   if (!new File(currentDocBase).exists()) {
2989                     System.out.println("Cant find where grouper is linked from tomcat, looked in server.xml and the webapps directory");
2990                     currentDocBase = null;
2991                   }
2992                 }
2993                 if (currentDocBase != null) {
2994                   log4jPropertiesFile = new File(currentDocBase + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator + "log4j.properties");
2995                   
2996                   analyzeLogFile(log4jPropertiesFile, "${grouper.home}" + File.separator, new File(catalinaLogFile + File.separator + "catalinaOut.log"),
2997                       new File(catalinaLogFile + File.separator + "catalinaErr.log"));
2998                 }
2999               }
3000               
3001               break;
3002               
3003             default: 
3004               throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting appToUpgrade: " + this.appToUpgrade + "!");
3005           }
3006           
3007           System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue.");
3008           readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.logsContinue");
3009   
3010           break;
3011         case services:
3012           
3013           break;
3014         case exit:
3015           
3016           System.exit(0);
3017           
3018           break;
3019         case back:
3020           
3021           this.mainAdminLogic();
3022   
3023           break;
3024       }
3025     }
3026   }
3027 
3028   /**
3029    * 
3030    * @param log4jPropertiesFile
3031    * @param grouperHomeWithSlash
3032    * @param stdoutLocation
3033    * @param stderrLocation
3034    */
3035   private void analyzeLogFile(File log4jPropertiesFile, String grouperHomeWithSlash, File stdoutLocation, File stderrLocation) {
3036     System.out.println("The log4j.properties is located in: " 
3037         + log4jPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
3038 
3039     if (!log4jPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3040     
3041       System.out.println("Error, the log4j.properties file could not be found.");
3042 
3043     } else {
3044       
3045       System.out.println("Examine the log4j.properties to see where it is logging");
3046       
3047       Properties log4jProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(log4jPropertiesFile);
3048       
3049       //= ERROR, grouper_error")
3050       String rootLoggerValue = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.rootLogger");              
3051       
3052       System.out.println("Generally the log4j.rootLogger property shows where logs go, it is set to: " + rootLoggerValue);
3053       
3054       Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("\\s*[A-Z]+\\s*,\\s*(\\w+)\\s*");
3055       Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(rootLoggerValue);
3056       if (!matcher.matches()) {
3057         System.out.println("Examine the log4j.properties for more information");
3058       } else {
3059         String logger = matcher.group(1);
3060         System.out.println("The log4j.rootLogger property in log4j.properties is set to: " + logger);
3061         //log4j.appender.grouper_error = org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender
3062         //log4j.appender.grouper_error.File = ${grouper.home}logs/grouper_error.log
3063         String logFileName = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.appender." + logger + ".File");
3064         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(logFileName)) {
3065           System.out.println("There is a property in log4j.properties: log4j.appender." + logger + ".File = " + logFileName);
3066           if (logFileName.contains("${grouper.home}")) {
3067             logFileName = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logFileName, "${grouper.home}", grouperHomeWithSlash);
3068           }
3069           System.out.println("Grouper log should be: " + logFileName);
3070         } else {
3071           //log4j.appender.grouper_stdout = org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
3072           String appender = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.appender." + logger);
3073           //log4j.appender.grouper_stderr.Target                    = System.err
3074           String target = log4jProperties.getProperty("log4j.appender." + logger + ".Target");
3075           String targetFriendly = null;
3076           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.err")) {
3077             targetFriendly = "STDERR";
3078           } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.out")) {
3079             targetFriendly = "STDOUT";
3080           }
3081           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(appender, "org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender") && targetFriendly != null) {
3082             System.out.println("Since log4j.properties log4j.appender." + logger + " = org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender you are logging to " + targetFriendly);
3083             if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.err") && stderrLocation != null) {
3084               System.out.println("Grouper logs should be in " + stderrLocation.getAbsolutePath());
3085             } else if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(target, "System.out") && stdoutLocation != null) {
3086               System.out.println("Grouper logs should be in " + stdoutLocation.getAbsolutePath());
3087             }
3088           } else {
3089             System.out.println("Examine the log4j.properties for more information");
3090           }
3091         }
3092       }
3093     }
3094   }
3095   
3096   /**
3097    * admin
3098    */
3099   private void mainUpgradeTaskLogic() {
3100     GrouperInstallerConvertAction grouperInstallerConvertAction = null;
3101 
3102     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
3103       //what do we want to do, install, revert, or get status?
3104       System.out.print("What upgrade task do you want to do (convertEhcacheXmlToProperties)? : ");
3105       String convertAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.upgradeTaskAction");
3106       try {
3107         grouperInstallerConvertAction = GrouperInstallerConvertAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(convertAction, false, true);
3108         if (grouperInstallerConvertAction != null) {
3109           break;
3110         }
3111       } catch (Exception e) {
3112         //ignore, let user try again
3113       }
3114     }
3115     switch(grouperInstallerConvertAction) {
3116       case convertEhcacheXmlToProperties:
3117 
3118         System.out.println("Note, you need to convert the ehcache.xml file for each Grouper runtime, e.g. loader, WS, UI.");
3119         System.out.println("Note, you need to be running Grouper 2.3.0 with API patch 35 installed.");
3120         System.out.print("Enter the location of the ehcache.xml file: ");
3121         String convertEhcacheXmlLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcacheXmlLocation");
3122 
3123         File ehcacheXmlFile = new File(convertEhcacheXmlLocation);
3124         if (!ehcacheXmlFile.exists()) {
3125           System.out.println("Cant find ehcache.xml: " + ehcacheXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
3126           System.exit(1);
3127         }
3128 
3129         File grouperCacheBaseProperties = new File(ehcacheXmlFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper.cache.base.properties");
3130 
3131         {
3132           System.out.print("Enter the location of the grouper.cache.base.properties file [" + grouperCacheBaseProperties.getAbsolutePath() + "]: ");
3133           String grouperCacheBasePropertiesLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcacheBasePropertiesLocation");
3134   
3135           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(grouperCacheBasePropertiesLocation)) {
3136             grouperCacheBaseProperties = new File(grouperCacheBasePropertiesLocation);
3137           }
3138         }
3139         
3140         File grouperCacheProperties = new File(ehcacheXmlFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper.cache.properties");
3141 
3142         {
3143           System.out.print("Enter the location of the grouper.cache.properties file (to be created)  [" + grouperCacheProperties.getAbsolutePath() + "]: ");
3144           String grouperCachePropertiesLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcachePropertiesLocation");
3145   
3146           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(grouperCachePropertiesLocation)) {
3147             grouperCacheProperties = new File(grouperCachePropertiesLocation);
3148           }
3149         }
3150         
3151         try {
3152           convertEhcacheXmlToProperties(grouperCacheBaseProperties, grouperCacheProperties,
3153               ehcacheXmlFile.toURI().toURL());
3154         } catch (MalformedURLException mue) {
3155           throw new RuntimeException("Malformed url on " + convertEhcacheXmlLocation);
3156         }
3157 
3158         System.out.println("File was written: " + grouperCacheProperties.getAbsolutePath());
3159 
3160         break;
3161     }
3162 
3163   }
3164   
3165   /**
3166    * patch grouper
3167    */
3168   private void mainPatchLogic() {
3169     
3170     //####################################
3171     //Find out what directory to upgrade to.  This ends in a file separator
3172     this.grouperTarballDirectoryString = grouperUpgradeTempDirectory();
3173     
3174     //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
3175     this.appToUpgrade = grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch("patch");
3176 
3177     //get the directory where the existing installation is
3178     this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = upgradeExistingDirectory();
3179 
3180     GrouperInstallerPatchAction grouperInstallerPatchAction = null;
3181     
3182     
3183     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
3184       //what do we want to do, install, revert, or get status?
3185       System.out.print("What do you want to do with patches (install, revert, status, fixIndexFile)? [install]: ");
3186       String patchAction = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.patchAction");
3187       try {
3188         grouperInstallerPatchAction = GrouperInstallerPatchAction.valueOfIgnoreCase(patchAction, false, true);
3189         if (grouperInstallerPatchAction == null) {
3190           grouperInstallerPatchAction = GrouperInstallerPatchAction.install;
3191         }
3192         break;
3193       } catch (Exception e) {
3194         //ignore, let user try again
3195       }
3196     }
3197     
3198     switch(grouperInstallerPatchAction) {
3199       case install:
3200         
3201         fixIndexFileIfOk();
3202 
3203         //loop through applications, check patches
3204         this.appToUpgrade.patch(this);
3205 
3206         break;
3207         
3208       case revert:
3209         
3210         fixIndexFileIfOk();
3211 
3212         //look through applications, check for reverts
3213         this.appToUpgrade.revertPatch(this);
3214         break;
3215         
3216       case status:
3217         
3218         fixIndexFileIfOk();
3219 
3220         //print out status for applications
3221         this.appToUpgrade.patchStatus(this);
3222         break;
3223         
3224       case fixIndexFile:
3225         
3226         //print out status for applications
3227         this.appToUpgrade.fixIndexFile(this);
3228         break;
3229         
3230       default:
3231         throw new RuntimeException("Invalid patch action: " + grouperInstallerPatchAction);  
3232     }
3233     
3234   }
3235 
3236   /**
3237    * 
3238    */
3239   public static enum GrouperInstallerPatchAction {
3240 
3241     /** fix index file */
3242     fixIndexFile,
3243     
3244     /** install patches */
3245     install,
3246 
3247     /**
3248      * revert patches
3249      */
3250     revert,
3251     
3252     /**
3253      * get status on patches
3254      */
3255     status;
3256     
3257     /**
3258      * 
3259      * @param string
3260      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3261      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3262      * @return the action
3263      */
3264     public static GrouperInstallerPatchAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3265       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerPatchAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3266     }
3267     
3268   }
3269   
3270   /**
3271    * 
3272    */
3273   public static enum GrouperInstallerAdminAction {
3274 
3275     /** manage */
3276     manage,
3277     
3278     /** convert */
3279     upgradeTask;
3280     
3281     /**
3282      * 
3283      * @param string
3284      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3285      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3286      * @return the action
3287      */
3288     public static GrouperInstallerAdminAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3289       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerAdminAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3290     }
3291     
3292   }
3293   
3294   /**
3295    * 
3296    */
3297   public static enum GrouperInstallerMiscConvertAction {
3298 
3299     /** convert ehcache xml to properties */
3300     convertEhcacheXmlToProperties
3301     ;
3302     
3303     /**
3304      * 
3305      * @param string
3306      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3307      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3308      * @return the action
3309      */
3310     public static GrouperInstallerMiscConvertAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3311       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerMiscConvertAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3312     }
3313     
3314   }
3315   
3316   /**
3317    * 
3318    */
3319   public static enum GrouperInstallerConvertAction {
3320 
3321     /** convert */
3322     convertEhcacheXmlToProperties;
3323     
3324     /**
3325      * 
3326      * @param string
3327      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3328      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3329      * @return the action
3330      */
3331     public static GrouperInstallerConvertAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3332       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerConvertAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3333     }
3334     
3335   }
3336   
3337   /**
3338    * 
3339    */
3340   public static enum GrouperInstallerManageAction {
3341 
3342     /** logs */
3343     logs,
3344 
3345     /** back to admin */
3346     back,
3347 
3348     /** exit */
3349     exit,
3350 
3351     /** services */
3352     services;
3353     
3354     /**
3355      * 
3356      * @param string
3357      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
3358      * @param exceptionIfBlank
3359      * @return the action
3360      */
3361     public static GrouperInstallerManageAction valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfBlank, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
3362       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerManageAction.class, string, exceptionIfBlank, exceptionIfInvalid);
3363     }
3364     
3365   }
3366   
3367   /**
3368    * get the existing properties file of patches
3369    * @return the file for patches
3370    */
3371   private Properties patchExistingProperties() {
3372     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = this.patchExistingPropertiesFile();
3373     if (patchExistingPropertiesFile == null || !patchExistingPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3374       return new Properties();
3375     }
3376     return GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile);
3377    }
3378 
3379   /**
3380    * get the existing properties file of patches
3381    * @return the file for patches
3382    */
3383   private File patchExistingPropertiesFile() {
3384     
3385     //dont cache this in a variable since the upgrade existing application variable
3386     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = null;
3387     //if theres a web-inf, put it there, if not, put it in regular...
3388     if (new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF").exists()) {
3389       patchExistingPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3390           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
3391     } else {
3392       patchExistingPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3393           + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
3394     }
3395     return patchExistingPropertiesFile;
3396   }
3397   
3398   /**
3399    * 
3400    */
3401   private void mainUpgradeLogic() {
3402 
3403     System.out.println("You should backup your files and database before you start.  Press <enter> to continue.");
3404     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.backupFiles");
3405     
3406     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3407     System.out.println("Gather upgrade information\n");
3408 
3409     //####################################
3410     //Find out what directory to upgrade to.  This ends in a file separator
3411     this.grouperTarballDirectoryString = grouperUpgradeTempDirectory();
3412     
3413     //see what we are upgrading: api, ui, ws, client
3414     this.appToUpgrade = grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch("upgrade");
3415 
3416     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
3417       System.out.println("Are there any running processes using this installation?  tomcats?  loader?  psp?  etc?  (t|f)? [f]:");
3418       boolean runningProcesses = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.runningProcesses");
3419       if (runningProcesses) {
3420         break;
3421       }
3422       System.out.println("Please stop any processes using this installation...");
3423       //lets sleep for a bit to let it start
3424       GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(2000);
3425     }
3426     
3427     //get the directory where the existing installation is
3428     this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = upgradeExistingDirectory();
3429 
3430     this.version = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
3431     System.out.println("Upgrading to grouper " + this.appToUpgrade.name() + " version: " + this.version);
3432  
3433     fixIndexFileIfOk();
3434     
3435     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3436     System.out.println("Download and build grouper packages\n");
3437 
3438     //download new files
3439     this.appToUpgrade.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(this);
3440 
3441     System.out.println("End download and build grouper packages\n");
3442     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3443 
3444     this.grouperBaseBakDir = this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "bak_" + this.appToUpgrade + "_" 
3445         + new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy_MM_dd_HH_mm_ss_SSS").format(new Date()) + File.separator; 
3446 
3447     GrouperInstallerUtils.tempFilePathForJars = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
3448         + "jarToDelete" + File.separator;
3449 
3450     //when we revert patches, default should be true
3451     this.revertAllPatchesDefault = true;
3452     try {
3453       this.appToUpgrade.upgradeApp(this);
3454     } finally {
3455       this.revertAllPatchesDefault = false;
3456     }
3457 
3458     this.reportOnConflictingJars();
3459     
3460     System.out.println("\nGrouper is upgraded from " + (this.originalGrouperJarVersion == null ? null : this.originalGrouperJarVersion) 
3461         + " to " + GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true) +  "\n");
3462 
3463     //this file keeps track of partial upgrades
3464     GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile);
3465 
3466     //reset this so that patches go against new version
3467     this.grouperVersionOfJar = null;
3468     
3469   }
3470 
3471   /**
3472    * 
3473    */
3474   private void fixIndexFileIfOk() {
3475     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
3476     
3477     //see what is already there
3478     String existingDate = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty("grouperInstallerLastFixedIndexFile.date");
3479 
3480     boolean defaultToFixIndex = true;
3481     
3482     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(existingDate)) {
3483       try {
3484         Date theDate = GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.parse(existingDate);
3485         //this is when the installer was fixed to do the index file correctly
3486         if (theDate.getTime() > GrouperInstallerUtils.dateValue("20150929").getTime()) {
3487           defaultToFixIndex = false;
3488         }
3489       } catch (ParseException pe) {
3490         System.out.println("Cant parse date: " + existingDate);
3491       }
3492     }
3493 
3494     //if we are affecting 2.2.2+ then dont recommend this
3495     if (defaultToFixIndex) {
3496       
3497       //see the version
3498       String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
3499 
3500       GiGrouperVersion giGrouperVersion = GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase(grouperVersion);
3501       
3502       if (giGrouperVersion.greaterOrEqualToArg(GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.2.2"))) {
3503         defaultToFixIndex = false;
3504       }
3505       
3506     }
3507     
3508     
3509     System.out.println("Do you want to fix the patch index file (download all patches and see if they are installed?) (" + (defaultToFixIndex ? "recommended" : "not recommended") + ") (t|f)? [" + (defaultToFixIndex ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
3510     boolean fixIndexFile = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultToFixIndex, "grouperInstaller.autorun.fixIndexFile");
3511     if (fixIndexFile) {
3512       this.appToUpgrade.fixIndexFile(this);
3513     }
3514   }
3515 
3516   /**
3517    * upgrade the client
3518    */
3519   private void upgradeClient() {
3520 
3521     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3522     System.out.println("Upgrading grouper client\n");
3523 
3524     this.compareAndReplaceJar(this.grouperClientJar, new File(this.untarredClientDir + File.separator + "grouperClient.jar"), true, null);
3525 
3526     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperClientBasePropertiesFile, 
3527       new File(this.untarredClientDir + File.separator + "grouper.client.base.properties"),
3528       this.grouperClientPropertiesFile,
3529       this.grouperClientExamplePropertiesFile,
3530       GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("grouperClient.webService.client.version"),
3531       "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperClient"
3532     );
3533 
3534     
3535   }
3536 
3537 
3538   /**
3539    * upgrade the ui
3540    */
3541   private void upgradeUi() {
3542 
3543     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
3544 
3545     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
3546     this.patchRevertUi();
3547     
3548     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
3549     
3550     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3551     System.out.println("Upgrading UI\n");
3552     
3553     //copy the jars there
3554     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3555     System.out.println("Upgrading UI jars\n");
3556 
3557     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator 
3558         + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator));
3559 
3560     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3561     System.out.println("Upgrading UI files\n");
3562 
3563     //copy files there
3564     this.copyFiles(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator,
3565         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString,
3566         GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("WEB-INF/lib", "WEB-INF/web.xml", "WEB-INF/classes",
3567             "WEB-INF/bin/gsh", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.bat", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.sh"));
3568 
3569     {
3570       boolean hadChange = false;
3571       for (String gshName : new String[]{"gsh", "gsh.bat", "gsh.sh"}) {
3572         File newGshFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3573             + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" 
3574             + File.separator + gshName);
3575 
3576         File existingGshFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3577             + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + gshName);
3578 
3579         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newGshFile, existingGshFile)) {
3580           this.backupAndCopyFile(newGshFile, existingGshFile, true);
3581           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("gsh.bat", gshName)) {
3582             hadChange = true;
3583           }
3584         }
3585         
3586       }
3587       if (hadChange) {
3588         //set executable and dos2unix
3589         gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3590             + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" 
3591             + File.separator);
3592       }
3593     }
3594     
3595     upgradeWebXml(new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3596             + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"),
3597             new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
3598                 + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"));
3599     
3600     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3601     System.out.println("Upgrading UI config files\n");
3602 
3603     this.changeConfig("WEB-INF/classes/resources/grouper/nav.properties", 
3604         "WEB-INF/classes/grouperText/grouper.text.en.us.base.properties",
3605         "WEB-INF/classes/grouperText/grouper.text.en.us.properties", null, GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.2.0"), true, 
3606         "grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterNavProperties",
3607         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeOldKeysFromNavProperties");
3608 
3609     this.changeConfig("WEB-INF/classes/resources/grouper/media.properties", 
3610         "WEB-INF/classes/grouper-ui.base.properties",
3611         "WEB-INF/classes/grouper-ui.properties", null, GiGrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.2.0"), false,
3612         "grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterMediaProperties",
3613         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeOldKeysFromMediaProperties");
3614 
3615     {
3616       File newBaseOwaspFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3617           + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" 
3618           + File.separator + "Owasp.CsrfGuard.properties");
3619 
3620       File newOwaspFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3621           + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" 
3622           + File.separator + "Owasp.CsrfGuard.overlay.properties");
3623 
3624       if (this.owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile == null) {
3625         this.owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newBaseOwaspFile.getName());
3626       }
3627       
3628       if (this.owaspCsrfGuardFile == null) {
3629         this.owaspCsrfGuardFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newOwaspFile.getName());
3630       }
3631       
3632       this.backupAndCopyFile(newBaseOwaspFile, this.owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile, true);
3633 
3634       boolean editedOwaspOverlay = this.owaspCsrfGuardFile != null && this.owaspCsrfGuardFile.exists();
3635
