3636       File bakFile = this.backupAndCopyFile(newOwaspFile, this.owaspCsrfGuardFile, true);
3637 
3638       if (bakFile != null && editedOwaspOverlay) {
3639         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(this.owaspCsrfGuardFile, newOwaspFile)) {
3640           System.out.println("If you have edited the Owasp.CsrfGuard.overlay.properties please merge the changes to the new file");
3641           System.out.println("Press <enter> when done");
3642           readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterEditedOwaspCsrfGuard");
3643         }
3644       }
3645     }    
3646 
3647     //patch it
3648     this.patchUi();
3649     
3650   }
3651 
3652   /**
3653    * upgrade the psp
3654    */
3655   private void upgradePsp() {
3656 
3657     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
3658 
3659     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
3660     this.patchRevertPsp();
3661     
3662     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
3663     
3664     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3665     System.out.println("Upgrading PSP\n");
3666     
3667     //copy the jars there
3668     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3669     System.out.println("Upgrading PSP jars\n");
3670 
3671     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredPspDir + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom" + File.separator),
3672         new File(new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "custom"));
3673 
3674     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3675     System.out.println("Upgrading PSP files\n");
3676 
3677     //copy files there (this is the conf examples)
3678     this.copyFiles(this.untarredPspDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator,
3679         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator, null);
3680 
3681     //patch it
3682     this.patchPsp();
3683   }
3684 
3685   /**
3686    * upgrade the pspng
3687    */
3688   private void upgradePspng() {
3689 
3690     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
3691 
3692     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
3693     this.patchRevertPspng();
3694     
3695     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
3696     
3697     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3698     System.out.println("Upgrading PSPNG\n");
3699     
3700     //copy the jars there
3701     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3702     System.out.println("Upgrading PSPNG jars\n");
3703 
3704     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredPspngDir + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom" + File.separator),
3705         new File(new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "custom"));
3706 
3707     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3708     System.out.println("Upgrading PSPNG files\n");
3709 
3710     //copy files there (this is the conf examples)
3711     this.copyFiles(this.untarredPspngDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator,
3712         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator, null);
3713 
3714     //patch it
3715     this.patchPspng();
3716   }
3717 
3718   
3719   /**
3720    * upgrade a web.xml file
3721    * @param newWebXml
3722    * @param existingWebXml
3723    */
3724   public void upgradeWebXml(File newWebXml, File existingWebXml) {
3725     
3726     File bakFile = backupAndCopyFile(newWebXml, existingWebXml, true);
3727     
3728     if (bakFile != null) {
3729       //it existed
3730       NodeList nodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(bakFile, "/web-app/security-constraint");
3731       boolean tookOutAuthn = false;
3732       if (nodeList == null || nodeList.getLength() == 0) {
3733         //take out authn from web.xml
3734         String webXmlContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingWebXml);
3735         int startAuthnIndex = webXmlContents.indexOf("<security-constraint>");
3736         int endAuthnIndex = webXmlContents.indexOf("</security-role>");
3737         if (startAuthnIndex != -1 && endAuthnIndex != -1 && endAuthnIndex > startAuthnIndex) {
3738           endAuthnIndex = endAuthnIndex + "</security-role>".length();
3739           //authn is there
3740           webXmlContents = webXmlContents.substring(0, startAuthnIndex) + webXmlContents.substring(endAuthnIndex, webXmlContents.length());
3741           GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingWebXml, webXmlContents);
3742           tookOutAuthn = true;
3743           System.out.println("Taking out basic authentication from " + existingWebXml + " since it wasnt there before");
3744         }
3745       }
3746       System.out.println("If you customized the web.xml please merge your changes back in "
3747           + (tookOutAuthn ? "\n  Note: basic authentication was removed from the new web.xml to be consistent with the old web.xml" : "")
3748           + "\n  New file: " + existingWebXml.getAbsolutePath() + ", bak file:" + bakFile.getAbsolutePath() );
3749       System.out.println("Press the <enter> key to continue");
3750       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterMergeWebXml");
3751       
3752       if (tookOutAuthn) {
3753         GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(existingWebXml, "/web-app");        
3754       }
3755     }
3756   }
3757 
3758   
3759   /**
3760    * @param legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath legacy file we are converting from
3761    * @param propertiesFileRelativePath 
3762    * @param propertiesToIgnore
3763    * @param basePropertiesFileRelativePath
3764    * @param versionMigrationHappened
3765    * @param removeOldCopy
3766    * @param autorunPropertiesKey key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
3767    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys key in properties file to automatically fill in a value to remove old keys
3768    */
3769   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
3770   private void changeConfig(String legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath,
3771       String basePropertiesFileRelativePath,
3772       String propertiesFileRelativePath,
3773       Set<String> propertiesToIgnore,
3774       GiGrouperVersion versionMigrationHappened, boolean removeOldCopy, 
3775       String autorunPropertiesKey, String autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys) {
3776 
3777     File legacyPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath);
3778     File newBasePropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredUiDir + File.separator + "dist" 
3779         + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + basePropertiesFileRelativePath);
3780     File existingBasePropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + basePropertiesFileRelativePath);
3781     File existingPropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + propertiesFileRelativePath);
3782 
3783     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(existingBasePropertiesFile, newBasePropertiesFile, 
3784         existingPropertiesFile, null, propertiesToIgnore, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys);
3785 
3786     //look for existing properties in legacy file, and if there are properties in the base, then remove them
3787     if (legacyPropertiesFile.exists()) {
3788       
3789       Properties existingBaseProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(existingBasePropertiesFile);
3790       Properties existingProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(existingPropertiesFile);
3791       Properties legacyProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(legacyPropertiesFile);
3792       Set<String> propertyNamesToRemove = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
3793       Set<String> propertyNamesWrongValue = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
3794 
3795       for (String propertyName : (Set<String>)(Object)existingBaseProperties.keySet()) {
3796         if (legacyProperties.containsKey(propertyName)) {
3797           
3798           Object existingValue = existingProperties.containsKey(propertyName) ?
3799              existingProperties.get(propertyName) : existingBaseProperties.get(propertyName);
3800           
3801           //it might be in the override, what about other overrides?  who knows
3802           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingValue, 
3803               legacyProperties.get(propertyName))) {
3804 
3805             propertyNamesWrongValue.add(propertyName);
3806           }
3807           propertyNamesToRemove.add(propertyName);
3808         }
3809       }
3810       
3811       //if we found some, see if we can remove them
3812       if (propertyNamesToRemove.size() > 0) {
3813         
3814         if (propertyNamesWrongValue.size() > 0) {
3815 
3816           //these are properties that we different in the previous legacy file
3817           System.out.println(legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath + " has properties that have a different value than\n  the new place they are managed: "
3818               + basePropertiesFileRelativePath + ",\n  and the everride(s) which could be: " + propertiesFileRelativePath);
3819           System.out.println("Review these properties and merge the values, this could have happened due to changes in Grouper:");
3820           for (String propertyName: propertyNamesWrongValue) {
3821             System.out.println(" - " + propertyName);
3822           }
3823           System.out.println("When you are done merging press <enter>");
3824           readFromStdIn(autorunPropertiesKey);
3825 
3826         }
3827 
3828         if (removeOldCopy) {
3829           
3830           System.out.println(legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath + " is not used anymore by grouper, can it be backed up and removed (t|f)? [t]: ");
3831           boolean removeLegacy = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys);
3832           if (removeLegacy) {
3833             File backupLegacy = bakFile(legacyPropertiesFile);
3834             GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(legacyPropertiesFile, backupLegacy, true);
3835             GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(legacyPropertiesFile);
3836             System.out.println("File as removed.  Backup path: " + backupLegacy.getAbsolutePath());
3837           }
3838           
3839         } else {
3840           System.out.println(legacyPropertiesFileRelativePath + " has properties that can be removed since they are now managed in "
3841               + basePropertiesFileRelativePath);
3842           System.out.print("Would you like to have the properties automatically removed from " 
3843               + legacyPropertiesFile.getName() + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
3844           boolean removeRedundantProperties = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveOldKeys);
3845           
3846           if (removeRedundantProperties) {
3847             removeRedundantProperties(legacyPropertiesFile, propertyNamesToRemove);
3848           }
3849         }
3850       }
3851     }
3852   }
3853 
3854   
3855   /**
3856    * copy files if they are different from one place to another, print out statuses
3857    * @param fromDirString where to copy files from
3858    * @param toDirString where to copy files to
3859    * @param relativePathsToIgnore
3860    */
3861   public void copyFiles(String fromDirString, String toDirString, 
3862       Set<String> relativePathsToIgnore) {
3863     
3864     fromDirString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(fromDirString);
3865     toDirString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(toDirString);
3866 
3867     {
3868       //lets massage all the paths so they dont start or end with slash and
3869       //so they have File.separator instead of the wrong slash
3870       Set<String> tempRelativePathsToIgnore = new HashSet<String>();
3871       for (String path : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(relativePathsToIgnore)) {
3872         path = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMassagePathsNoLeadingOrTrailing(path);
3873         tempRelativePathsToIgnore.add(path);
3874       }
3875       relativePathsToIgnore = tempRelativePathsToIgnore;
3876     }
3877 
3878     int insertCount = 0;
3879     int updateCount = 0;
3880     Map<String, Boolean> relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert = new LinkedHashMap<String, Boolean>();
3881 
3882     List<File> allFiles = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileListRecursive(new File(fromDirString));
3883     for (File fileToCopyFrom : allFiles) {
3884       String relativePath = null;
3885       {
3886         //get the relative path with no leading or trailing slash
3887         String path = fileToCopyFrom.getAbsolutePath();
3888         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(path,fromDirString)) {
3889           throw new RuntimeException("Why does path not start with fromDirString: " + path + ", " + fromDirString);
3890         }
3891         relativePath = path.substring(fromDirString.length());
3892         relativePath = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMassagePathsNoLeadingOrTrailing(relativePath);
3893       }
3894       boolean ignore = false;
3895       
3896       //ignore paths passed in
3897       for (String pathToIgnore : relativePathsToIgnore) {
3898         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(relativePath,pathToIgnore)) {
3899           ignore = true;
3900           break;
3901         }
3902       }
3903       
3904       if (!ignore) {
3905         
3906         //File to copy to
3907         File fileToCopyTo = new File(toDirString + relativePath);
3908         if (fileToCopyTo.exists()) {
3909           //compare contents
3910           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(fileToCopyFrom, fileToCopyTo)) {
3911             continue;
3912           }
3913           //not equals, make backup
3914           updateCount++;
3915 
3916           relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.put(relativePath, false);
3917 
3918           this.backupAndCopyFile(fileToCopyFrom, fileToCopyTo, false);
3919 
3920           continue;
3921         }
3922         
3923         //insert
3924         insertCount++;
3925         relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.put(relativePath, true);
3926         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(fileToCopyFrom, fileToCopyTo, false);
3927         
3928       }
3929     }
3930 
3931     System.out.println("Upgrading files from: " + fromDirString + "\n  to: " + toDirString 
3932         + (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relativePathsToIgnore) == 0 ? "" : 
3933         ("\n  ignoring paths: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(relativePathsToIgnore.iterator(), ", "))));
3934     System.out.println("Compared " + allFiles.size() + " files and found " 
3935         + insertCount + " adds and " + updateCount + " updates");
3936 
3937     if (insertCount > 0 || updateCount > 0) {
3938       
3939       System.out.println((insertCount + updateCount) + " files were backed up to: " + this.grouperBaseBakDir);
3940 
3941       boolean listFiles = insertCount + updateCount <= 10;
3942       if (!listFiles) {
3943         System.out.println("Do you want to see the list of files changed (t|f)? [f]: ");
3944         listFiles = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.viewListOfFilesChangedInCopy");
3945       }
3946 
3947       if (listFiles) {
3948 
3949         for (String relativeFilePathChanged : relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.keySet()) {
3950           boolean isInsert = relativeFilePathsChangedAndIfInsert.get(relativeFilePathChanged);
3951           System.out.println(relativeFilePathChanged + " was " + (isInsert ? "added" : "updated"));
3952         }
3953       }
3954     }
3955     
3956   }
3957 
3958   /**
3959    * upgrade the api
3960    */
3961   private void upgradeApi() {
3962     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
3963 
3964     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
3965     this.patchRevertApi();
3966     
3967     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
3968   }
3969 
3970 
3971   /**
3972    * upgrade the api
3973    */
3974   private void upgradeApiPreRevertPatch() {
3975 
3976     //make sure existing gsh is executable and dos2unix
3977     gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(new File(gshCommand()).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath(), "existing");
3978     
3979     this.runChangeLogTempToChangeLog();
3980   }
3981   
3982   
3983   /**
3984    * upgrade the api
3985    */
3986   private void upgradeApiPostRevertPatch() {
3987 
3988     //revert patches
3989     this.upgradeClient();
3990 
3991     System.out.println("\n##################################");
3992     System.out.println("Upgrading API\n");
3993 
3994     //lets get the version of the existing jar
3995     this.originalGrouperJarVersionOrUpgradeFileVersion();
3996 
3997     this.compareAndReplaceJar(this.grouperJar, 
3998         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator 
3999             + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper.jar"), true, null);
4000 
4001     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4002     System.out.println("Upgrading API config files\n");
4003 
4004     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperBasePropertiesFile, 
4005       new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouper.base.properties"),
4006       this.grouperPropertiesFile,
4007       this.grouperExamplePropertiesFile, null, 
4008       "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperProperties"
4009     );
4010       
4011     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperHibernateBasePropertiesFile, 
4012         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouper.hibernate.base.properties"),
4013         this.grouperHibernatePropertiesFile,
4014         this.grouperHibernateExamplePropertiesFile, null, 
4015         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperHibernateProperties"
4016       );
4017         
4018     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperLoaderBasePropertiesFile, 
4019         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouper-loader.base.properties"),
4020         this.grouperLoaderPropertiesFile,
4021         this.grouperLoaderExamplePropertiesFile, null,
4022         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperLoaderProperties"
4023       );
4024     
4025     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.subjectBasePropertiesFile, 
4026         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "subject.base.properties"),
4027         this.subjectPropertiesFile,
4028         null, null,
4029         "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromSubjectProperties"
4030       );
4031 
4032     this.upgradeEhcacheXml();
4033     this.upgradeEhcacheXmlToProperties();
4034 
4035     this.compareAndCopyFile(this.grouperUtf8File, 
4036         new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "grouperUtf8.txt"),
4037         true,
4038         new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString)
4039         );
4040     
4041     System.out.println("\nYou should compare " + this.grouperPropertiesFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "sources.xml"
4042         + "\n  with " + this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "sources.xml");
4043     System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue after you have merged the sources.xml");
4044     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterMergingSourcesXml");
4045     
4046     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4047     System.out.println("Upgrading API jars\n");
4048 
4049     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" 
4050       + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator));
4051     if (this.appToUpgrade.isApiOrganized()) {
4052 
4053       //if we need to put the jars in the jdbcSamples dir...
4054       this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" 
4055           + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator), 
4056           new File(new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString).getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "jdbcSamples"));
4057     
4058     } else {
4059     
4060       this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" 
4061           + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator));
4062     
4063     }
4064 
4065     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4066     System.out.println("Patch API\n");
4067 
4068     //patch it
4069     this.patchApi();
4070 
4071     //make sure log4j is debugging sql statements
4072     log4jDebugSql(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + "log4j.properties");
4073     
4074     //verify that grouper.hibernate.properties doesn't have legacy properties
4075     removeLegacyHibernateProperties(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + "grouper.hibernate.properties");
4076     
4077     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4078     System.out.println("Upgrading DB (registry)\n");
4079 
4080     this.apiUpgradeDbVersion(true);
4081 
4082     this.apiUpgradeAdditionalGshScripts();
4083 
4084   }
4085 
4086   /**
4087    * run additional GSH scripts based on what we are upgrading from...
4088    */
4089   private void apiUpgradeAdditionalGshScripts() {
4090     GiGrouperVersion giGrouperVersion = this.originalGrouperJarVersionOrUpgradeFileVersion();
4091     if (giGrouperVersion == null) {
4092       System.out.println("Grouper jar file: " + (this.grouperJar == null ? null : this.grouperJar.getAbsolutePath()));
4093       System.out.println("ERROR, cannot find grouper version in grouper jar file, do you want to continue? (t|f)? [f]: ");
4094       boolean continueScript = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueAfterNoGrouperVersionFound");
4095       if (!continueScript) {
4096         System.exit(1);
4097       }
4098     }
4099 
4100     boolean lessThan2_0 = this.originalGrouperJarVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.0.0"));
4101     {
4102       String runUsduAutorun = null;
4103       if (lessThan2_0) {
4104         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.0.0, do you want to run Unresolvable Subject Deletion Utility (USDU) (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4105         runUsduAutorun = "grouperInstaller.autorun.runUsduPre2.0.0";
4106       } else {
4107         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.0.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4108             + "but do you want to run Unresolvable Subject Deletion Utility (USDU) (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4109         runUsduAutorun = "grouperInstaller.autorun.runUsduPost2.0.0";
4110       }
4111       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_0, runUsduAutorun);
4112       
4113       if (runScript) {
4114         
4115         //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
4116         //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
4117         StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
4118   
4119         //gsh 0% GrouperSession.startRootSession()
4120         //edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.GrouperSession: 6f94c99d5b0948a3be96f94f00ab4d87,'GrouperSystem','application'
4121         //gsh 1% // run USDU to resolve all the subjects with type=person
4122         //gsh 3% usdu()
4123   
4124         gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
4125         gshCommands.append("usdu();\n");
4126   
4127         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshUsdu.gsh");
4128         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
4129         
4130         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4131   
4132         addGshCommands(commands);
4133         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4134   
4135         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4136         System.out.println("Running USDU with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4137   
4138         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4139             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4140            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4141   
4142       }
4143     }
4144     
4145     {
4146 
4147       String autorunResolveGroupSubjects = null;
4148       if (lessThan2_0) {
4149         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.0.0, do you want to resolve all group subjects (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4150         autorunResolveGroupSubjects = "grouperInstaller.autorun.resolveGroupSubjectsPre2.0.0";
4151       } else {
4152         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.0.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4153             + "but do you want to resolve all group subjects (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4154         autorunResolveGroupSubjects = "grouperInstaller.autorun.resolveGroupSubjectsPost2.0.0";
4155       }
4156       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_0, autorunResolveGroupSubjects);
4157       
4158       if (runScript) {
4159         
4160         //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
4161         //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
4162         StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
4163   
4164         //gsh 5% GrouperSession.startRootSession();
4165         //edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.GrouperSession: 4163fb08b3b24922b55a14010d48e121,'GrouperSystem','application'
4166         //gsh 6% for (String g : HibernateSession.byHqlStatic().createQuery("select uuid from Group").listSet(String.class)) { subj = SubjectFinder.findByIdAndSource(g, "g:gsa", true); GrouperDAOFactory.getFactory().getMember().findBySubject(subj).updateMemberAttributes(subj, true); }
4167   
4168         gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
4169         gshCommands.append("for (String g : HibernateSession.byHqlStatic().createQuery(\"select uuid from Group\").listSet(String.class)) { subj = SubjectFinder.findByIdAndSource(g, \"g:gsa\", true); GrouperDAOFactory.getFactory().getMember().findBySubject(subj).updateMemberAttributes(subj, true); }\n");
4170   
4171         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshGroupUsdu.gsh");
4172         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
4173         
4174         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4175   
4176         addGshCommands(commands);
4177         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4178   
4179         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4180         System.out.println("Resolving group subjects with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4181 
4182         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4183             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4184            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4185       }
4186     }
4187 
4188     {
4189       boolean lessThan2_1 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.1.0"));
4190       String autorunSeeRuleCheckType = null;
4191       if (lessThan2_1) {
4192         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.1.0, do you want to "
4193             + "see if you have rules with ruleCheckType: flattenedPermission* (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4194         autorunSeeRuleCheckType = "grouperInstaller.autorun.seeRulesFlattenedPermissionsPre2.1.0";
4195       } else {
4196         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.1.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4197             + "but do you want to see if you have rules with ruleCheckType: flattenedPermission* (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4198         autorunSeeRuleCheckType = "grouperInstaller.autorun.seeRulesFlattenedPermissionsPost2.1.0";
4199       }
4200       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_1, autorunSeeRuleCheckType);
4201       
4202       if (runScript) {
4203         
4204         //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
4205         //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
4206         StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
4207     
4208         gshCommands.append("\"Count: \" + HibernateSession.bySqlStatic().select(int.class, \"SELECT count(*) FROM grouper_rules_v WHERE rule_check_type LIKE 'flattenedPermission%'\");\n");
4209   
4210         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshRuleFlattenedPermissionCount.gsh");
4211         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
4212         
4213         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4214   
4215         addGshCommands(commands);
4216         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4217   
4218         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4219         System.out.println("Counting flattenedPermission rules with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4220 
4221         CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4222           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4223           new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4224 
4225         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
4226           System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
4227         }
4228         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
4229           System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
4230         }
4231 
4232         String result = commandResult.getOutputText().trim();
4233         String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(result);
4234         {
4235           Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("^Count: ([0-9]+)$");
4236           int count = -1;
4237           for (String line : lines) {
4238             Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
4239             if (matcher.matches()) {
4240               count = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(1));
4241               break;
4242             }
4243           }
4244           if (count == -1) {
4245             System.out.println("Error getting count of rules, would you like to continue (t|f)? [t]:");
4246             if (!readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueAfterErrorCountFlattenedRules")) {
4247               System.exit(1);
4248             }
4249           } else {
4250             if (count > 0) {
4251               System.out.println("You have " + count + " flattenedPermission rules that need to be removed.  You need to look in the view grouper_rules_v and notify the owners and remove these rules.  Do you want to continue (t|f)? [t]: ");
4252               
4253               if (!readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueAfterFoundFlattenedRules")) {
4254                 System.exit(1);
4255               }
4256             }
4257           }
4258         }
4259       }
4260     }
4261 
4262     {
4263       boolean lessThan2_2_0 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.2.0"));
4264       String autorunRun2_2gshScript = null;
4265       if (lessThan2_2_0) {
4266         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.2.0, "
4267             + "do you want to run the 2.2 upgrade GSH script (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4268         autorunRun2_2gshScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2gshUpgradeScriptPre2.2.0";
4269       } else {
4270         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.2.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4271             + "but do you want to run the 2.2 upgrade GSH script (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4272         autorunRun2_2gshScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2gshUpgradeScriptPost2.2.0";
4273       }
4274       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_2_0, autorunRun2_2gshScript);
4275       
4276       if (runScript) {
4277         
4278         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "misc" + File.separator + "postGrouper2_2Upgrade.gsh");
4279         
4280         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4281   
4282         addGshCommands(commands);
4283         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4284   
4285         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4286         System.out.println("Running 2.2 upgrade GSH with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4287   
4288         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4289             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4290            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4291   
4292       }
4293       
4294     }
4295 
4296     {
4297       boolean lessThan2_2_1 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.2.1"));
4298       String autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript = null;
4299       if (lessThan2_2_1) {
4300         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.2.1, do you want to "
4301             + "run the 2.2.1 upgrade GSH script (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4302         autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2.1gshUpgradeScriptPre2.2.1";
4303       } else {
4304         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.2.1, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4305             + "but do you want to run the 2.2.1 upgrade GSH script (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4306         autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.2.1gshUpgradeScriptPost2.2.1";
4307       }
4308       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_2_1, autorunRun2_2_1gshUpgradeScript);
4309       
4310       if (runScript) {
4311         
4312         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "misc" + File.separator + "postGrouper2_2_1Upgrade.gsh");
4313         
4314         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4315 
4316         addGshCommands(commands);
4317         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4318 
4319         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4320         System.out.println("Running 2.2.1 upgrade GSH with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4321 
4322         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4323             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4324            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4325 
4326       }
4327     }
4328 
4329     {
4330       boolean lessThan2_3_0 = giGrouperVersion.lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.3.0"));
4331       String autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript = null;
4332       if (lessThan2_3_0) {
4333         System.out.println("You are upgrading from pre API version 2.3.0, do you want to "
4334             + "run the 2.3.0 upgrade GSH script (recommended) (t|f)? [t]: ");
4335         autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.3.0gshUpgradeScriptPre2.3.0";
4336       } else {
4337         System.out.println("You are upgrading from after API version 2.3.0, so you dont have to do this,\n  "
4338             + "but do you want to run the 2.3.0 upgrade GSH script (not recommended) (t|f)? [f]: ");
4339         autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript = "grouperInstaller.autorun.run2.3.0gshUpgradeScriptPost2.3.0";
4340       }
4341       boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(lessThan2_3_0, autorunRun2_3_0gshUpgradeScript);
4342       
4343       if (runScript) {
4344         
4345         File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "misc" + File.separator + "postGrouper2_3_0Upgrade.gsh");
4346         
4347         List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4348 
4349         addGshCommands(commands);
4350         commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
4351 
4352         System.out.println("\n##################################");
4353         System.out.println("Running 2.3.0 upgrade GSH with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4354 
4355         GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4356             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4357            new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4358 
4359       }
4360     }
4361 
4362   }
4363 
4364   /**
4365    * grouper version of jar
4366    */
4367   private GiGrouperVersion grouperVersionOfJar = null;
4368   
4369   /**
4370    * 
4371    * @return the version
4372    */
4373   private GiGrouperVersion grouperVersionOfJar() {
4374     if (this.grouperVersionOfJar == null) {
4375       String grouperJarVersionString = null;
4376       if (this.grouperJar != null && this.grouperJar.exists()) {
4377         grouperJarVersionString = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(this.grouperJar);
4378         
4379       } else if (this.grouperClientJar != null && this.grouperClientJar.exists()) {
4380         grouperJarVersionString = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(this.grouperClientJar);
4381         
4382       }
4383       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(grouperJarVersionString)) {
4384         this.grouperVersionOfJar = new GiGrouperVersion(grouperJarVersionString);
4385       }
4386   
4387       if (this.grouperVersionOfJar == null) {
4388         throw new RuntimeException("Cant find version of grouper! " + this.grouperJar + ", " + this.grouperClientJar);
4389       }
4390     }
4391     
4392     return this.grouperVersionOfJar;
4393   }
4394   
4395   /**
4396    * grouper jar version e.g. 2.1.5
4397    */
4398   private GiGrouperVersion originalGrouperJarVersion = null;
4399   
4400   /**
4401    * keep trac if we have found it or not
4402    */
4403   private boolean originalGrouperJarVersionRetrieved = false;
4404   
4405   /**
4406    * get the version of the grouper jar
4407    * @return the version or null if couldnt be found
4408    */
4409   private GiGrouperVersion originalGrouperJarVersionOrUpgradeFileVersion() {
4410 
4411     if (!this.originalGrouperJarVersionRetrieved) {
4412 
4413       this.originalGrouperJarVersionRetrieved = true;
4414       
4415       //lets see if an upgrade went halfway through
4416       this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "grouperUpgradeOriginalVersion.txt");
4417 
4418       this.originalGrouperJarVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar();
4419       
4420       if (this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile.exists()) {
4421         String grouperJarVersionString = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile);
4422         GiGrouperVersion fileGrouperJarVersion = new GiGrouperVersion(grouperJarVersionString);
4423         
4424         if (fileGrouperJarVersion != this.originalGrouperJarVersion) {
4425           
4426           System.out.println("It is detected that an upgrade did not complete from version " + fileGrouperJarVersion);
4427           this.originalGrouperJarVersion = fileGrouperJarVersion;
4428         }
4429       } else {
4430         GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(this.grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile, this.originalGrouperJarVersion.toString());
4431       }
4432     }
4433     
4434     return this.originalGrouperJarVersion;
4435   }
4436   
4437   /**
4438    * file where version is kept for partial upgrades
4439    */
4440   private File grouperUpgradeOriginalVersionFile;
4441   
4442   /**
4443    * @param firstTime if first time
4444    */
4445   private void apiUpgradeDbVersion(boolean firstTime) {
4446     
4447     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.api.checkDdlVersion", true, false)) {
4448       System.out.println("Not checking DDL version since grouper.installer.properties: grouperInstaller.default.api.checkDdlVersion = false");
4449       return;
4450     }
4451 
4452     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4453 
4454     addGshCommands(commands);
4455     commands.add("-registry");
4456     commands.add("-check");
4457     commands.add("-noprompt");
4458 
4459     System.out.println("\n##################################");
4460     System.out.println("Checking API database version with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4461 
4462     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4463         GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4464         new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4465     
4466     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
4467       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
4468     }
4469     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
4470       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
4471     }
4472 
4473     String result = commandResult.getErrorText().trim();
4474     
4475     // Grouper ddl object type 'Grouper' has dbVersion: 27 and java version: 28
4476     // NOTE: Grouper database schema DDL may require updates, but the temp change log must 
4477     // be empty to perform an upgrade.  To process the temp change log, start up your current 
4478     // version of GSH and run: loaderRunOneJob("CHANGE_LOG_changeLogTempToChangeLog")
4479     if (result != null && result.contains("CHANGE_LOG_changeLogTempToChangeLog")) {
4480       System.out.println("You must run the change log temp to change log before upgrading.  You can start the upgrader again and run it.");
4481       System.exit(1);
4482     }
4483     
4484     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(result);
4485     {
4486       boolean okWithVersion = false;
4487       boolean notOkWithVersion = false;
4488       for (String line : lines) {
4489         line = line.toLowerCase();
4490         //expecting stderr: NOTE: database table/object structure (ddl) is up to date
4491         if (line.contains("ddl") && line.contains("up to date") && line.contains("note:")) {
4492           okWithVersion = true;
4493         }
4494         //cant have this line
4495         if (line.contains("requires updates")) {
4496           notOkWithVersion = true;
4497         }
4498       }
4499       if (okWithVersion && !notOkWithVersion) {
4500         return;
4501       }
4502     }
4503 
4504     if (!firstTime) {
4505       System.out.println("Error: we tried to upgrade the database but it didnt work, would you like to continue skipping DDL (t|f)? ");
4506       boolean continueOn = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldContinueIfErrorUpgradingDatabase");
4507       if (continueOn) {
4508         return;
4509       }
4510     }
4511     
4512     //we need to upgrade the DDL
4513     //Grouper ddl object type 'Grouper' has dbVersion: 26 and java version: 28
4514     //Grouper database schema DDL requires updates
4515     //(should run script manually and carefully, in sections, verify data before drop statements, backup/export important data before starting, follow change log on confluence, dont run exact same script in multiple envs - generate a new one for each env),
4516     //script file is:
4517     //C:\app\grouper_2_2_0_installer\grouper.apiBinary-2.2.0\ddlScripts\grouperDdl_20141014_10_17_12_577.sql
4518     //Note: this script was not executed due to option passed in
4519     //To run script via gsh, carefully review it, then run this:
4520     //gsh -registry -runsqlfile C:\\app\\grouper_2_2_0_installer\\grouper.apiBinary-2.2.0\\ddlScripts\\grouperDdl_20141014_10_17_12_577.sql
4521 
4522     System.out.println("Review the script(s) above if there are any, do you want the upgrader to run it to upgrade the DDL for you (t|f)? [t]: ");
4523     boolean runIt = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.shouldRunDdlScript");
4524     
4525     if (runIt) {
4526 
4527       boolean foundScript = false;
4528 
4529       for (String line : lines) {
4530         if (line.contains("-registry -runsqlfile")) {
4531           
4532           String regexPattern = "^[^\\s]+\\s+-registry -runsqlfile (.*)$";
4533           Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(regexPattern);
4534           
4535           Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
4536           
4537           if (!matcher.matches()) {
4538             throw new RuntimeException("Expected " + regexPattern + " but received: " + line);
4539           }
4540 
4541           String fileName = matcher.group(1);
4542           
4543           commands = new ArrayList<String>();
4544           
4545           addGshCommands(commands);
4546           commands.add("-registry");
4547           commands.add("-noprompt");
4548           commands.add("-runsqlfile");
4549           commands.add(fileName);
4550           
4551           foundScript = true;
4552           
4553           System.out.println("\n##################################");
4554           System.out.println("Upgrading database with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
4555 
4556           commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
4557               GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
4558              new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
4559 
4560           //no out/err since printing as we go
4561           System.out.println("\nDone upgrading database");
4562           System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
4563         }
4564       }
4565       //cant find script, thats ok, just check and go
4566       if (!foundScript) {
4567         throw new RuntimeException("didnt find script to to run: " + result);
4568       }
4569 
4570       //check again to make sure ok
4571       apiUpgradeDbVersion(false);
4572     }
4573   }
4574 
4575   /**
4576    * upgrade jars from a directory
4577    * @param fromDir jars from this directory
4578    */
4579   private void upgradeJars(File fromDir) {
4580     this.upgradeJars(fromDir, new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString));
4581   }
4582   
4583   /**
4584    * upgrade jars from a directory
4585    * @param fromDir jars from this directory
4586    * @param toDir is where jars go if not there
4587    */
4588   private void upgradeJars(File fromDir, File toDir) {
4589 
4590     //for each jar in the directory
4591     if (!fromDir.exists() || !fromDir.isDirectory()) {
4592       throw new RuntimeException("Why does jar directory not exist? " + fromDir);
4593     }
4594     
4595     int changes = 0;
4596 
4597     for (File jarFile : fromDir.listFiles()) {
4598       
4599       //only do jar files
4600       if (!jarFile.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
4601         continue;
4602       }
4603       
4604       // File existingJar = this.findLibraryFile(jarFile.getName(), false);
4605 
4606       List<File> relatedJars = null;
4607       
4608       relatedJars = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFindJar(toDir, jarFile.getName());
4609       
4610       boolean foundFile = false;
4611       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relatedJars) > 0) {
4612         
4613         for (File relatedJar : relatedJars) {
4614           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(relatedJar).equals(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(jarFile))) {
4615             if (relatedJar.getName().equals(jarFile.getName())) {
4616               foundFile = true;
4617               continue;
4618             }
4619           }
4620           
4621           File bakFile = bakFile(relatedJar);
4622           
4623           System.out.println("Deleting " + relatedJar.getAbsolutePath() + ", backed up to: " + bakFile.getAbsolutePath());
4624           changes++;
4625           boolean moved = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(relatedJar, bakFile, false);
4626           if (!moved) {
4627             System.out.println("Non-fatal error: could not delete file: " + relatedJar.getAbsolutePath() 
4628                 + ",\ndelete this file when all processed are terminated.  Press <enter> to acknowledge this.");
4629             readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterCantDeleteJar");
4630           }
4631         }
4632       }
4633       if (!foundFile) {
4634         changes += this.compareAndReplaceJar(null, jarFile, false, toDir) ? 1 : 0;
4635       }
4636           
4637       
4638 //      if (existingJar == null) {
4639 //        //see if one exists by another version
4640 //        if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(relatedJars) == 1) {
4641 //          existingJar = relatedJars.get(0);
4642 //        }
4643 //      }
4644 
4645     }
4646 
4647     System.out.println("Upgraded " + changes + " jar files from: " + fromDir.getAbsolutePath()
4648         + "\n  to: " + toDir.getAbsolutePath());
4649     
4650   }
4651   
4652   /**
4653    * 
4654    */
4655   private void upgradeEhcacheXml() {
4656 
4657     //ehcache, prompt to see if do it (if difference than example, and if old example different than new example?
4658     File newEhcacheExample = new File(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "ehcache.xml");
4659 
4660     //this file is done
4661     if (!newEhcacheExample.exists()) {
4662       return;
4663     }
4664     
4665     //lets see if different
4666     String existingEhcacheContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(this.ehcacheFile);
4667     String existingExampleEhcacheContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(this.ehcacheExampleFile);
4668     String newEhcacheContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(newEhcacheExample);
4669     
4670     //if existing is the same as new...
4671     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingEhcacheContents, newEhcacheContents)) {
4672       //make sure example is up to date
4673       if (this.ehcacheExampleFile != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingExampleEhcacheContents, newEhcacheContents)) {
4674         this.backupAndCopyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheExampleFile, true);
4675       }
4676 
4677       //we are all good
4678       return;
4679     }
4680 
4681     //lets backup the example and regular file
4682     File ehcacheBakFile = bakFile(this.ehcacheFile);
4683     GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(this.ehcacheFile, ehcacheBakFile, true);
4684 
4685     boolean mergeFiles = true;
4686     
4687     if (this.ehcacheExampleFile != null) {
4688       File ehcacheExampleBakFile = bakFile(this.ehcacheExampleFile);
4689   
4690       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(this.ehcacheExampleFile, ehcacheExampleBakFile, true);
4691     } else {
4692       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheFile, true);
4693       mergeFiles = false;
4694     }
4695 
4696     if (mergeFiles) {
4697       //if the ehcache is the same as the example, lets just copy
4698       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingEhcacheContents, existingExampleEhcacheContents)) {
4699         this.backupAndCopyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheFile, false);
4700         if (this.ehcacheExampleFile != null) {
4701           this.backupAndCopyFile(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheExampleFile, false);
4702         }
4703         return;
4704       }
4705 
4706       //the ehcache file is different from the example and different from the new one, so merge it in
4707       mergeEhcacheXmlFiles(newEhcacheExample, this.ehcacheExampleFile, this.ehcacheFile);
4708     }
4709 
4710     System.out.println("Compare you old ehcache.xml with the new ehcache.xml file: " 
4711         + "\n  Old file: "
4712         + ehcacheBakFile.getAbsolutePath()
4713         + "\n  New file: " + this.ehcacheFile.getAbsolutePath()
4714         + "\n  Press <enter> when done");
4715     readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterCompareEhcache");
4716 
4717   }
4718 
4719   /**
4720    * 
4721    */
4722   private void upgradeEhcacheXmlToProperties() {
4723 
4724     //dont do this is less than 2.3.1
4725     if (new GiGrouperVersion(this.version).lessThanArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.3.1"))) {
4726       return;
4727     }
4728     
4729     //this file is done
4730     if (!this.ehcacheFile.exists()
4731         && this.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile.exists() && this.grouperCachePropertiesFile.exists()) {
4732       return;
4733     }
4734     
4735     System.out.print("Do you want to convert from ehcache.xml to grouper.cache.properties, note you need to do this to upgrade (t|f)? [t]: ");
4736     boolean convert = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.convertEhcacheXmlToProperties");
4737 
4738     if (!convert) {
4739       System.out.println("Note: grouper will not run, but whatever you want to do!!!!");
4740     }
4741     
4742     if (this.grouperCachePropertiesFile.exists()) {
4743       //see if there is anything in it
4744       Properties grouperCacheProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile);
4745       if (grouperCacheProperties.size() > 0) {
4746         this.backupAndDeleteFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile, true);
4747       } else {
4748         GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile);
4749       }
4750     }
4751 
4752     URL ehcacheXmlUrl = null;
4753     
4754     try {
4755       ehcacheXmlUrl = this.ehcacheFile.toURI().toURL();
4756     } catch (Exception e) {
4757       throw new RuntimeException("Problem with ehcache.xml: " + (this.ehcacheFile == null ? null : this.ehcacheFile.getAbsoluteFile()), e);
4758     }
4759     
4760     //convert
4761     convertEhcacheXmlToProperties(this.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile, this.grouperCachePropertiesFile, ehcacheXmlUrl);
4762     
4763     File bakFile = bakFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile);
4764     GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(this.grouperCachePropertiesFile, bakFile, true);
4765     this.backupAndDeleteFile(this.ehcacheFile, true);
4766     this.backupAndDeleteFile(this.ehcacheExampleFile, true);
4767     
4768   }
4769 
4770   /**
4771    * 
4772    * @param newFile
4773    * @param existingFile
4774    * @param printDetails
4775    * @return the bakFile
4776    */
4777   public File backupAndCopyFile(File newFile, File existingFile, boolean printDetails) {
4778     
4779     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFile, existingFile)) {
4780       
4781       File bakFile = null;
4782           
4783       boolean fileExists = existingFile.exists();
4784       if (fileExists) {
4785         bakFile = bakFile(existingFile);
4786         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(existingFile, bakFile, true);
4787         if (printDetails) {
4788           System.out.println("Backing up: " + existingFile.getAbsolutePath() + " to: " + bakFile.getAbsolutePath());
4789         }
4790       }
4791       if (printDetails) {
4792         System.out.println("Copying " + (fileExists ? "new file" : "upgraded file") + ": " + newFile.getAbsolutePath() + " to: " + existingFile.getAbsolutePath());
4793       }
4794       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFile, existingFile, false);
4795       return bakFile;
4796       
4797     }
4798 
4799     if (printDetails) {
4800       System.out.println(existingFile.getAbsolutePath() + " has not been updated so it was not changed");
4801     }
4802     
4803     return null;
4804   }
4805 
4806   /**
4807    * @param file
4808    * @param printDetails
4809    * @return the bakFile
4810    */
4811   public File backupAndDeleteFile(File file, boolean printDetails) {
4812 
4813     if (file.exists()) {
4814 
4815       File bakFile = null;
4816 
4817       bakFile = bakFile(file);
4818       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(file, bakFile, true);
4819       if (printDetails) {
4820         System.out.println("Backing up: " + file.getAbsolutePath() + " to: " + bakFile.getAbsolutePath());
4821       }
4822       if (printDetails) {
4823         System.out.println("Deleting file: " + file.getAbsolutePath());
4824       }
4825       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(file);
4826       return bakFile;
4827 
4828     }
4829 
4830     if (printDetails) {
4831       System.out.println(file + " did not exist so it was not deleted");
4832     }
4833 
4834     return null;
4835   }
4836 
4837   /**
4838    * 
4839    * @param existingFile
4840    * @return the bak file
4841    */
4842   public File bakFile(File existingFile) {
4843     String existingFilePath = existingFile.getAbsolutePath();
4844     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
4845       throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
4846           + existingFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
4847     }
4848     
4849     String bakString = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
4850         + existingFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
4851 
4852     File bakFile = new File(bakString);
4853     return bakFile;
4854   }
4855   
4856   /**
4857    * @param existingBasePropertiesFile 
4858    * @param newBasePropertiesFile 
4859    * @param existingPropertiesFile 
4860    * @param existingExamplePropertiesFile 
4861    * @param propertiesToIgnore
4862    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveRedundantProperties key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
4863    */
4864   private void compareUpgradePropertiesFile(File existingBasePropertiesFile, 
4865       File newBasePropertiesFile,
4866       File existingPropertiesFile,
4867       File existingExamplePropertiesFile,
4868       Set<String> propertiesToIgnore, String autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveRedundantProperties) {
4869 
4870     boolean hadChange = false;
4871     
4872     if (!newBasePropertiesFile.exists() || !newBasePropertiesFile.isFile()) {
4873       throw new RuntimeException("Why does this file not exist? " + newBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
4874     }
4875     
4876     //if there is an existing base properties file, compare and replace and done
4877     if (existingBasePropertiesFile != null && existingBasePropertiesFile.exists() && existingBasePropertiesFile.isFile()) {
4878       
4879       String existingBaseContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingBasePropertiesFile);
4880       String newBaseContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(newBasePropertiesFile);
4881       
4882       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingBaseContents, newBaseContents)) {
4883         
4884         String existingBasePropertiesFilePath = existingBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath();
4885         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingBasePropertiesFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
4886           throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
4887               + existingBasePropertiesFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
4888         }
4889         
4890         String bakBasePropertiesString = this.grouperBaseBakDir + existingBasePropertiesFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
4891 
4892         File bakBasePropertiesFile = new File(bakBasePropertiesString);
4893         
4894         //make sure parents exist
4895         GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakBasePropertiesFile);
4896 
4897         System.out.println(existingBasePropertiesFile.getName() + " has changes and was upgraded.\n  It is backed up to " 
4898             + bakBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
4899         
4900         hadChange = true;
4901         
4902         GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingBasePropertiesFile, bakBasePropertiesFile);
4903         
4904         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newBasePropertiesFile, existingBasePropertiesFile, true);
4905 
4906       }
4907       
4908     } else {
4909       
4910       hadChange = true;
4911       
4912       System.out.println(newBasePropertiesFile.getName() + " didn't exist and was installed.");
4913       
4914       //its null, but we dont have the path...
4915       if (existingBasePropertiesFile == null) {
4916         existingBasePropertiesFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newBasePropertiesFile.getName());
4917       }
4918       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newBasePropertiesFile, existingBasePropertiesFile, true);
4919     }
4920     
4921     // if there is an example there, it can be removed
4922     if (existingExamplePropertiesFile != null && existingExamplePropertiesFile.exists() && existingExamplePropertiesFile.isFile()) {
4923 
4924       String existingExamplePropertiesFilePath = existingExamplePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath();
4925       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingExamplePropertiesFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
4926         throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
4927             + existingExamplePropertiesFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
4928       }
4929       
4930       String bakExamplePropertiesString = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
4931           + existingExamplePropertiesFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
4932 
4933       File bakExamplePropertiesFile = new File(bakExamplePropertiesString);
4934       
4935       //make sure parents exist
4936       GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakExamplePropertiesFile);
4937 
4938       System.out.println(existingExamplePropertiesFile.getName() + " is not needed and was deleted.\n  It is backed up to " 
4939           + bakExamplePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
4940 
4941       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingExamplePropertiesFile, bakExamplePropertiesFile);
4942     
4943     }
4944 
4945     if (existingPropertiesFile != null && existingPropertiesFile.exists() && existingPropertiesFile.isFile()) {
4946       
4947       // now then, if there is a properties file, we can look for duplicate configs, and remove them...
4948       Set<String> duplicateConfigPropertyNames = configPropertyDuplicates(newBasePropertiesFile, existingPropertiesFile);
4949 
4950       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(propertiesToIgnore) > 0 && GrouperInstallerUtils.length(duplicateConfigPropertyNames) > 0) {
4951         duplicateConfigPropertyNames.addAll(propertiesToIgnore);
4952       }
4953       
4954       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(duplicateConfigPropertyNames) > 0) {
4955 
4956         hadChange = true;
4957         
4958         System.out.println(existingPropertiesFile.getName() + " has " + duplicateConfigPropertyNames.size() 
4959             + " properties that can be removed since the values are the same in "
4960             + newBasePropertiesFile.getName());
4961 
4962         System.out.println("Would you like to have the " + duplicateConfigPropertyNames.size() 
4963             + " redundant properties automatically removed from " 
4964             + existingPropertiesFile.getName() + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
4965         boolean removeRedundantProperties = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyRemoveRedundantProperties);
4966         
4967         if (removeRedundantProperties) {
4968 
4969           String existingPropertiesFilePath = existingPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath();
4970           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingPropertiesFilePath, this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
4971             throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " 
4972                 + existingPropertiesFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
4973           }
4974           
4975           String bakPropertiesString = this.grouperBaseBakDir 
4976               + existingPropertiesFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
4977 
4978           File bakPropertiesFile = new File(bakPropertiesString);
4979           
4980           //make sure parents exist
4981           GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakPropertiesFile);
4982 
4983           System.out.println(existingPropertiesFile.getName() + " had redundant properties removed after being backed up to " 
4984               + bakPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
4985 
4986           GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(existingPropertiesFile, bakPropertiesFile, true);
4987           
4988           removeRedundantProperties(existingPropertiesFile, duplicateConfigPropertyNames);
4989           
4990         }
4991       }
4992     } else {
4993       
4994       hadChange = true;
4995       
4996       //if we didnt have a properties file, create one
4997       //file is null...
4998       String contents = "\n# The " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "") 
4999           + " file uses Grouper Configuration Overlays (documented on wiki)\n"
5000           + "# By default the configuration is read from " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName() + "\n"
5001           + "# (which should not be edited), and the " +newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "") + " overlays\n"
5002           + "# the base settings.  See the " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName() + " for the possible\n"
5003           + "# settings that can be applied to the " + newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "") + "\n\n";
5004 
5005       File file = null;
5006       
5007       if (existingPropertiesFile != null) {
5008         file = existingPropertiesFile;
5009       } else if (existingBasePropertiesFile != null) {
5010         file = new File(existingBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath().replace(".base", ""));
5011 //      } else {
5012 //        String fileName =  existingPropertiesFile != null ? existingPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() : this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + newBasePropertiesFile.getName().replace(".base", "");
5013 //        file = new File(fileName);
5014       }
5015       
5016       System.out.println("Created overlay config file: " + file.getAbsolutePath());
5017       
5018       GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(file, contents);
5019     }
5020     
5021     if (!hadChange) {
5022       System.out.println("Found no changes in " + existingBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath());
5023     }
5024     
5025   }
5026 
5027   /**
5028    * remove duplicate properties
5029    * @param propertiesFile
5030    * @param duplicatePropertyNames
5031    */
5032   private static void removeRedundantProperties(File propertiesFile, Set<String> duplicatePropertyNames) {
5033     
5034     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(propertiesFile);
5035     
5036     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
5037 
5038     StringBuilder newContents = new StringBuilder();
5039 
5040     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
5041     
5042     boolean inStartComments = true;
5043     boolean inHeaderComments = false;
5044 
5045     StringBuilder captureHeader = new StringBuilder();
5046     StringBuilder propertyAndComments = new StringBuilder();
5047     
5048     for (String line: lines) {
5049       
5050       line = line.trim();
5051       
5052       boolean isBlank = GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(line);
5053       boolean isComment = line.startsWith("#");
5054       boolean isSingleComment = line.startsWith("#") && !line.startsWith("##");
5055       boolean isHeaderComment = line.contains("#####");
5056       boolean isProperty = !isBlank && !isComment;
5057       
5058       //if in header then we are done with the start comments
5059       if (isHeaderComment) {
5060         inStartComments = false;
5061       }
5062 
5063       //we want to keep the start comments
5064       if (inStartComments) {
5065         
5066         if (isBlank || isComment) {
5067           newContents.append(line).append(newline);
5068           continue;
5069         }
5070         inStartComments = false;
5071       }
5072 
5073       //we are done with headers
5074       if (isProperty || isBlank || isSingleComment) {
5075         inHeaderComments = false;
5076       }
5077 
5078       if (isHeaderComment) {
5079         //if header and in headers, then we arent in headers
5080         if (inHeaderComments) {
5081           inHeaderComments = false;
5082         } else {
5083           //if this is a header, and we arent in headers, then we are in headers
5084           inHeaderComments = true;          
5085           captureHeader.setLength(0);
5086         }
5087       }
5088 
5089       if (isHeaderComment || inHeaderComments) {
5090         propertyAndComments.setLength(0);
5091         captureHeader.append(line).append(newline);
5092         continue;
5093       }
5094       
5095       if (isProperty) {
5096         
5097         //get the property
5098         int equalsIndex = line.indexOf('=');
5099         if (equalsIndex == -1) {
5100           //uh... ignore this... 
5101           System.out.println("Invalid line removed from properties file: " + propertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ":\n  " + line);
5102           continue;
5103         }
5104         
5105         String propertyName = line.substring(0, equalsIndex).trim();
5106         //unescape colons...
5107         if (duplicatePropertyNames.contains(propertyName) || duplicatePropertyNames.contains(propertyName.replace("\\:", ":"))) {
5108           propertyAndComments.setLength(0);
5109           //remove it!
5110           continue;
5111         }
5112 
5113         //keep it
5114         propertyAndComments.append(line).append(newline);
5115 
5116         //we need a header if there is one
5117         if (captureHeader.length() > 0) {
5118           newContents.append(newline);
5119           newContents.append(captureHeader);
5120           captureHeader.setLength(0);
5121         }
5122 
5123         //append the property and contents
5124         newContents.append(propertyAndComments);
5125 
5126         propertyAndComments.setLength(0);
5127         continue;
5128       }
5129       
5130       //must be whitespace or comment...
5131       propertyAndComments.append(line).append(newline);
5132     }
5133     
5134     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(propertiesFile, newContents.toString());
5135     
5136   }
5137   
5138   /**
5139    * 
5140    * @param file1
5141    * @param file2
5142    * @return the property names which are the same
5143    */
5144   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
5145   public static Set<String> configPropertyDuplicates(File file1, File file2) {
5146     Properties file1properties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(file1);
5147     Properties file2properties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(file2);
5148     
5149     Set<String> duplicatePropertyNames = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
5150     
5151     for (String propertyName : (Set<String>)(Object)file2properties.keySet()) {
5152       
5153       String file1Value = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(file1properties.getProperty(propertyName));
5154       String file2Value = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(file2properties.getProperty(propertyName));
5155       
5156       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(file1Value, file2Value)) {
5157         duplicatePropertyNames.add(propertyName);
5158       }
5159       
5160     }
5161     return duplicatePropertyNames;
5162   }
5163   
5164   
5165   /**
5166    * the location of the existing installation, must end in file separator
5167    */
5168   private String upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
5169   
5170   /**
5171    * 
5172    */
5173   private static enum AppToUpgrade {
5174     
5175     /**
5176      * upgrading the UI
5177      */
5178     UI {
5179 
5180       @Override
5181       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5182         grouperInstaller.patchStatusUi();
5183       }
5184 
5185       @Override
5186       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5187         grouperInstaller.patchUi();
5188       }
5189 
5190       @Override
5191       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5192         grouperInstaller.patchRevertUi();
5193       }
5194 
5195       @Override
5196       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5197         //API and client are in the UI
5198         if (!API.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5199           return false;
5200         }
5201         
5202         //no need to check if it exists... its new in 2.2
5203 
5204         //grouperInstaller.mediaPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("media.properties", false);
5205 
5206         //media should be there, but not forever
5207         
5208         return true;
5209       }
5210 
5211       @Override
5212       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5213         API.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(grouperInstaller);
5214         
5215         //####################################
5216         //download and configure ui
5217         grouperInstaller.downloadAndConfigureUi();
5218 
5219         //####################################
5220         //get ant
5221         grouperInstaller.downloadAndUnzipAnt();
5222 
5223         //####################################
5224         //build UI
5225         grouperInstaller.buildUi(false);
5226 
5227         File serverXml = null;
5228         for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
5229           String defaultServerXml = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.ui.server.xml", false);
5230           System.out.println("What is the location of your tomcat server.xml for the UI?  "
5231               + "Note, if you dont use tomcat just leave it blank or type 'blank': " 
5232               + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultServerXml) ? "" : ("[" + defaultServerXml + "]: ")));
5233           String serverXmlLocation = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.locationOfTomcatServerXml");
5234           
5235           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(defaultServerXml, "blank")) {
5236             defaultServerXml = null;
5237             break;
5238           }
5239           
5240           if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(serverXmlLocation)) {
5241             if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isNotBlank(defaultServerXml)) {
5242               serverXmlLocation = defaultServerXml;
5243             } else {
5244               break;
5245             }
5246           }
5247           serverXml = new File(serverXmlLocation);
5248           if (serverXml.exists() && serverXml.isFile()) {
5249             break;
5250           }
5251           if (i != 9) {
5252             System.out.println("Error: server.xml cant be found, try again.");
5253           }
5254         }
5255         if (serverXml != null && serverXml.exists() && serverXml.isFile()) {
5256           grouperInstaller.configureTomcatUriEncoding(serverXml);
5257         }
5258                 
5259       }
5260

5264       }

5269       }
5270 
5271       @Override
5272       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5273         return false;
5274       }
5275     },
5276     
5277     /**
5278      * upgrading the API
5279      */
5280     API {
5281 
5282       @Override
5283       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5284 
5285         //client is in the API
5286         if (!CLIENT.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5287           return false;
5288         }
5289         
5290         grouperInstaller.subjectPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("subject.properties", false);
5291         grouperInstaller.subjectBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("subject.base.properties", false);
5292 
5293         grouperInstaller.grouperUtf8File = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouperUtf8.txt", false);
5294 
5295         //no need to check if it exists... its new in 2.2
5296         
5297         grouperInstaller.grouperPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.properties", false);
5298         grouperInstaller.grouperBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.base.properties", false);
5299         grouperInstaller.grouperExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.example.properties", false);
5300 
5301         if (grouperInstaller.grouperBasePropertiesFile == null 
5302             && grouperInstaller.grouperPropertiesFile == null 
5303             && grouperInstaller.grouperExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5304           return false;
5305         }
5306         
5307         grouperInstaller.grouperHibernatePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.hibernate.properties", false);
5308         grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.hibernate.base.properties", false);
5309         grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.hibernate.example.properties", false);
5310 
5311         if (grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateBasePropertiesFile == null 
5312             && grouperInstaller.grouperHibernatePropertiesFile == null 
5313             && grouperInstaller.grouperHibernateExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5314           return false;
5315         }
5316         
5317         grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-loader.properties", false);
5318         grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-loader.base.properties", false);
5319         grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper-loader.example.properties", false);
5320 
5321         if (grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderBasePropertiesFile == null 
5322             && grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderPropertiesFile == null 
5323             && grouperInstaller.grouperLoaderExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5324           return false;
5325         }
5326         
5327         grouperInstaller.grouperCachePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.cache.properties", false);
5328         grouperInstaller.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.cache.base.properties", false);
5329 
5330 //        //these must exist after 2.3.1+
5331 //        if (grouperInstaller.grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile == null 
5332 //            && grouperInstaller.grouperCachePropertiesFile == null 
5333 //            && new GiGrouperVersion(grouperInstaller.version).greaterOrEqualToArg(new GiGrouperVersion("2.3.1"))
5334 //            ) {
5335 //          return false;
5336 //        }
5337 
5338         //this must exist
5339         grouperInstaller.grouperJar = grouperInstaller.findLibraryFile("grouper.jar", false);
5340         if (grouperInstaller.grouperJar == null) {
5341           return false;
5342         }
5343 
5344         grouperInstaller.ehcacheFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("ehcache.xml", false);
5345         grouperInstaller.ehcacheExampleFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("ehcache.example.xml", false);        
5346         
5347         //all good
5348         return true;
5349       }
