5411       @Override
5412       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5413 
5414         grouperInstaller.grouperClientPropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.client.properties", false);
5415         grouperInstaller.grouperClientBasePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.client.base.properties", false);
5416         grouperInstaller.grouperClientExamplePropertiesFile = grouperInstaller.findClasspathFile("grouper.client.example.properties", false);
5417 
5418         if (grouperInstaller.grouperClientBasePropertiesFile == null 
5419             && grouperInstaller.grouperClientPropertiesFile == null 
5420             && grouperInstaller.grouperClientExamplePropertiesFile == null) {
5421           if (grouperInstaller.appToUpgrade == CLIENT) {
5422             return false;
5423           }
5424         }
5425         
5426         //this must exist
5427         grouperInstaller.grouperClientJar = grouperInstaller.findLibraryFile("grouperClient.jar", false);
5428         if (grouperInstaller.grouperClientJar == null) {
5429           if (grouperInstaller.appToUpgrade == CLIENT) {
5430             return false;
5431           }
5432         }
5433         
5434         //all good
5435         return true;
5436       }

5539       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {

5541       }

5544       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5545         grouperInstaller.patchPsp();
5546       }

5550         grouperInstaller.patchRevertPsp();

5552 
5553       @Override
5554       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5555         //API and client are in the UI
5556         if (!API.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5557           return false;
5558         }
5559         
5560         File customLibDir = new File(grouperInstaller.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator + "custom");
5561         if (!customLibDir.exists()) {
5562           return false;
5563         }
5564 
5565         //see if psp jar is there
5566         List<File> files = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFindJar(customLibDir, "psp.jar");
5567                 
5568         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(files) == 0) {
5569           return false;
5570         }
5571 
5572         return true;
5573       }

5580         //download and configure psp
5581         grouperInstaller.downloadAndBuildPsp();
5582     
5583       }

5600     /**
5601      * upgrading the UI
5602      */
5603     PSPNG {
5604     
5605       @Override
5606       public void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5607         grouperInstaller.patchStatusPspng();
5608       }
5609     
5610       @Override
5611       public void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5612         grouperInstaller.patchPspng();
5613       }
5614     
5615       @Override
5616       public void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5617         grouperInstaller.patchRevertPspng();
5618       }
5619     
5620       @Override
5621       public boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5622         //API and client are in the UI
5623         if (!API.validateExistingDirectory(grouperInstaller)) {
5624           return false;
5625         }
5626         
5627         File customLibDir = new File(grouperInstaller.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator + "custom");
5628         if (!customLibDir.exists()) {
5629           return false;
5630         }
5631     
5632         //see if psp jar is there
5633         String grouperVersion = grouperInstaller.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
5634 
5635         List<File> files = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarFindJar(customLibDir, "grouper-pspng-" + grouperVersion + ".jar");
5636 
5637         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(files) == 0) {
5638           return false;
5639         }
5640     
5641         return true;
5642       }
5643     
5644       @Override
5645       public void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5646         API.downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(grouperInstaller);
5647         
5648         //####################################
5649         //download and configure psp
5650         grouperInstaller.downloadAndBuildPspng();
5651     
5652       }
5653     
5654       @Override
5655       public void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5656         grouperInstaller.upgradePspng();
5657       }
5658     
5659       @Override
5660       public void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller) {
5661         grouperInstaller.fixIndexFilePspng();
5662       }
5663       @Override
5664       public boolean isApiOrganized() {
5665         return true;
5666       }
5667     };
5668 
5669     /**
5670      * if the organization is API organzied (e.g. has lib/jdbcSamples dir)
5671      * @return true/false
5672      */
5673     public abstract boolean isApiOrganized();
5674     
5675     /**
5676      * validate that the existing directory is valid, and find all the file paths
5677      * @param grouperInstaller 
5678      * @return true if valid, false if not
5679      */
5680     public abstract boolean validateExistingDirectory(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5681     
5682     /**
5683      * based on what is being upgraded, download and build the grouper projects
5684      * @param grouperInstaller
5685      */
5686     public abstract void downloadAndBuildGrouperProjects(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5687     
5688     /**
5689      * upgrade this app
5690      * @param grouperInstaller
5691      */
5692     public abstract void upgradeApp(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5693     
5694     /**
5695      * patch this app
5696      * @param grouperInstaller
5697      */
5698     public abstract void patch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5699     
5700     /**
5701      * revert patch this app
5702      * @param grouperInstaller
5703      */
5704     public abstract void revertPatch(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5705     
5706     /**
5707      * patch status for this app
5708      * @param grouperInstaller
5709      */
5710     public abstract void patchStatus(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5711     
5712     /**
5713      * fix index file for this app
5714      * @param grouperInstaller
5715      */
5716     public abstract void fixIndexFile(GrouperInstaller grouperInstaller);
5717     
5718     /**
5719      * 
5720      * @param string
5721      * @param exceptionOnNotFound
5722      * @return the enum of what to upgrade
5723      */
5724     public static AppToUpgrade valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionOnNotFound) {
5725       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(AppToUpgrade.class, string, exceptionOnNotFound);
5726     }
5727     
5728   }
5729 
5730   /**
5731    * patch names installed (used for dependency checking), without the file ending e.g. grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0
5732    */
5733   private Set<String> patchesInstalled = new HashSet<String>();
5734   
5735   /**
5736    * if grouper is stopped
5737    */
5738   private boolean grouperStopped = false;
5739 
5740   /**
5741    * if should revert all
5742    */
5743   private Boolean revertAllPatches = null;
5744   
5745   /**
5746    * default for revert all patches
5747    */
5748   private boolean revertAllPatchesDefault = false;
5749   
5750   /**
5751    * if should revert all
5752    */
5753   private Boolean installAllPatches = null;
5754   
5755   /**
5756    * revert patches for an app
5757    * @param thisAppToRevert
5758    * @return if reverted
5759    */
5760   private boolean revertPatches(AppToUpgrade thisAppToRevert) {
5761 
5762     if (thisAppToRevert == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
5763       throw new RuntimeException("Cant revert " + thisAppToRevert);
5764     }
5765     
5766     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
5767     
5768     String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
5769 
5770     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
5771 
5772     Map<Integer, String> patchNumberToNameBase = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, String>();
5773     
5774     boolean foundPatch = false;
5775 
5776     Map<String, Set<String>> installedPatchDependencies = new HashMap<String, Set<String>>();
5777     
5778     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = patchExistingPropertiesFile();
5779     
5780     for (int i=1000;i>=0;i--) {
5781       
5782       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
5783       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToRevert.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
5784       String key = keyBase + ".state";
5785 
5786       patchNumberToNameBase.put(i, keyBase);
5787       
5788       String value = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
5789 
5790       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(value)) {
5791         
5792         System.out.println("\n################ Checking patch " + keyBase);
5793 
5794         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(value, true, true);
5795         
5796         switch (grouperInstallerPatchStatus) {
5797           case skippedPermanently:
5798             
5799             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped permanently on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
5800             continue;
5801 
5802           case skippedTemporarily:
5803 
5804             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped termporarily on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
5805             continue;
5806 
5807           case reverted:
5808 
5809             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was removed on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
5810             continue;
5811 
5812           case error:
5813 
5814             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": had an error installing on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
5815             continue;
5816 
5817           case applied:
5818             
5819             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was applied on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date")  + "\n");
5820             this.patchesInstalled.add(keyBase);
5821             break;
5822 
5823           default:
5824             throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting: " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus);
5825         }
5826 
5827       } else {
5828         continue;
5829       }
5830 
5831       if (!this.patchesInstalled.contains(keyBase)) {
5832         System.out.println("\n");
5833         continue;
5834       }
5835 
5836       //lets see if it exists on the server
5837       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
5838       
5839       //if no more patches
5840       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
5841         System.out.print("Error: cant find directory for patch: " + keyBase + ", press <enter> to continue");
5842         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterCantFindPatchDir");
5843         continue;
5844       }
5845 
5846       //lets get the description:
5847       //  # will show up on screen so user knows what it is
5848       //  description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
5849       //
5850       //  # patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
5851       //  dependencies = 
5852       //
5853       //  # low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
5854       //  risk = low
5855       //
5856       //  # is this is a security patch (true or false)
5857       //  security = false
5858       //
5859       //  # if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
5860       //  requiresRestart = false
5861       Properties patchProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + keyBase + ".properties"));
5862 
5863       foundPatch = true;
5864 
5865       // check dependencies
5866       {
5867         List<String> dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList(patchProperties.getProperty("dependencies"), ",");
5868         Set<String> dependenciesSet = new HashSet<String>(GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(dependencies));
5869         installedPatchDependencies.put(keyBase, dependenciesSet);
5870       }
5871 
5872       boolean securityRelated = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("security"), false);
5873       boolean requiresRestart = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("requiresRestart"), true);
5874 
5875       if (this.revertAllPatches == null) {
5876         System.out.println("Would you like to revert all patches (t|f)? [" + (this.revertAllPatchesDefault ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
5877         this.revertAllPatches = readFromStdInBoolean(this.revertAllPatchesDefault, "grouperInstaller.autorun.revertAllPatches");
5878       }
5879       
5880       //print description
5881       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + " is " + patchProperties.getProperty("risk") + " risk, "
5882           + (securityRelated ? "is a security patch" : "is not a security patch"));
5883       System.out.println(patchProperties.getProperty("description"));
5884       if (!this.revertAllPatches) {
5885         System.out.print("Would you like to revert patch " + keyBase + " (t|f)? [f]: ");
5886         boolean revertPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.revertPatch");
5887 
5888         if (!revertPatch) {
5889           System.out.println("");
5890           continue;
5891         }
5892       }
5893       //check dependencies
5894       for (String patchName : installedPatchDependencies.keySet()) {
5895         
5896         Set<String> dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(installedPatchDependencies.get(patchName));
5897         
5898         if (dependencies.contains(keyBase)) {
5899           System.out.println("Error: cant revert " + keyBase + " because an installed patch is dependent on it: " + patchName);
5900           System.exit(1);
5901         }
5902       }
5903 
5904       if (requiresRestart && !this.grouperStopped) {
5905         System.out.println("This patch requires all processes that user Grouper to be stopped.\n  "
5906             + "Please stop these processes if they are running and press <enter> to continue...");
5907         this.grouperStopped = true;
5908         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterStoppingGrouperProcesses");
5909       }
5910       
5911       Map<String, String> patchDirToApplicationPath = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
5912       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("files", this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
5913       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("classes", this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
5914       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("lib", this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
5915 
5916       boolean patchHasProblem = false;
5917       
5918       //we are reverting this patch, lets see if the files are there...
5919       //this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
5920       //patchUntarredDir
5921       File newDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new");
5922       File oldDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old");
5923       {
5924 
5925         for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
5926 
5927           String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
5928 
5929           File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
5930           File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
5931           
5932           if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
5933 
5934             // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
5935             Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
5936 
5937             for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
5938               File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
5939               File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
5940 
5941               File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
5942 
5943               if (!newFileInGrouper.exists() || !newFileInGrouper.isFile() 
5944                   || (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper)
5945                       //its ok if the patch is already reverted?
5946                       && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper))) {
5947                 
5948                 System.out.print("Problem reverting patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
5949                     + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath()
5950                     + "\n  Do you want to force revert this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
5951                 
5952                 boolean forceRevertPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceRevertPatch");
5953                 
5954                 if (!forceRevertPatch) {
5955                   System.out.println("\nCannot revert patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
5956                       + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
5957                   patchHasProblem = true;
5958                 }
5959               }
5960             }
5961           }
5962         }
5963       }
5964 
5965       {
5966         //deletes
5967         for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
5968 
5969           String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
5970 
5971           File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
5972           File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
5973           
5974           if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
5975 
5976             // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
5977             Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
5978 
5979             for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
5980               File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
5981               File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
5982 
5983               //if there is a new file, then its not a delete
5984               if (newFileInPatch.exists()) {
5985                 continue;
5986               }
5987               
5988               File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
5989 
5990               if (newFileInGrouper.exists() && newFileInGrouper.isFile() 
5991                   && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper)) {
5992                 
5993                 System.out.print("Problem reverting patch since this patch file:\n  " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
5994                     + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects (shouldnt exist):\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath()
5995                     + "\n  Do you want to force revert this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
5996                 
5997                 boolean forceRevertPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceRevertPatch");
5998                 
5999                 if (!forceRevertPatch) {
6000                   System.out.println("\nCannot revert patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6001                       + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6002                   patchHasProblem = true;
6003                 }
6004               }
6005             }
6006           }
6007         }
6008       }
6009 
6010       if (patchHasProblem) {
6011         System.out.println("Cannot continue since patch has problem");
6012         System.exit(1);
6013       }
6014       
6015       //so far so good, all the new files are all good, revert the patch
6016       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6017         
6018         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6019 
6020         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6021         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6022         
6023         if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6024         
6025           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6026           Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6027           
6028           for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6029 
6030             File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6031 
6032             File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6033             
6034             if (oldFileInPatch.exists() && oldFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6035               System.out.println("Reverting file: " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6036               GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper, false);
6037             } else {
6038               System.out.println("Reverting (deleting) file: " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6039               GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(newFileInGrouper);
6040             }
6041           }
6042         }
6043       }
6044       
6045       //so far so good, revert the deletes
6046       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6047         
6048         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6049 
6050         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6051         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6052         
6053         if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6054         
6055           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6056           Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
6057           
6058           for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
6059 
6060             File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6061             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6062 
6063             if (newFileInPatch.exists()) {
6064               continue;
6065             }
6066             
6067             File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
6068             
6069             if (oldFileInPatch.exists() && oldFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6070               System.out.println("Reverting deleted file: " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6071               GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(oldFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper, false);
6072             }
6073           }
6074         }
6075       }
6076       
6077       this.patchesInstalled.remove(keyBase);
6078       installedPatchDependencies.remove(keyBase);
6079       System.out.println("Patch successfully reverted: " + keyBase);
6080 
6081       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".date", 
6082           GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), false);
6083       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6084           GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.reverted.name(), false);
6085 
6086       System.out.println("");
6087     }
6088 
6089     if (!foundPatch) {
6090       System.out.println("There are no new " + thisAppToRevert + " patches to revert\n");
6091       return false;
6092     }
6093     
6094     return true;
6095       
6096   }
6097   
6098   /**
6099    * get the patches available to apply that are not already applied
6100    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
6101    * @return if patches were installed
6102    */
6103   private boolean downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade) {
6104 
6105     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
6106       throw new RuntimeException("Cant install patches for " + thisAppToUpgrade);
6107     }
6108     
6109     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
6110 
6111     String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
6112 
6113     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
6114 
6115     Map<Integer, String> patchNumberToNameBase = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, String>();
6116     
6117     boolean foundNewPatch = false;
6118     
6119     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = patchExistingPropertiesFile();
6120     
6121     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<1000;i++) {
6122       
6123       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
6124       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
6125       System.out.println("\n################ Checking patch " + keyBase);
6126       String key = keyBase + ".state";
6127 
6128       patchNumberToNameBase.put(i, keyBase);
6129       
6130       String value = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
6131 
6132       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(value)) {
6133         
6134         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(value, true, true);
6135         
6136         switch (grouperInstallerPatchStatus) {
6137           case applied:
6138             
6139             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was applied on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6140             this.patchesInstalled.add(keyBase);
6141             
6142             continue;
6143 
6144           case skippedPermanently:
6145             
6146             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped permanently on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6147             continue;
6148 
6149           case skippedTemporarily:
6150 
6151             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped termporarily on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6152 
6153             break;
6154 
6155           case reverted:
6156 
6157             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was reverted on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6158 
6159             break;
6160 
6161           case error:
6162 
6163             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": had an error installing on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date") + "\n");
6164 
6165             break;
6166 
6167           default:
6168             throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting: " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus);
6169         }
6170         
6171       }
6172 
6173       //lets see if it exists on the server
6174       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
6175       
6176       //if no more patches
6177       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
6178         System.out.println("");
6179         break OUTER;
6180       }
6181       
6182       //lets get the description:
6183       //  # will show up on screen so user knows what it is
6184       //  description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
6185       //
6186       //  # patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
6187       //  dependencies = 
6188       //
6189       //  # low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
6190       //  risk = low
6191       //
6192       //  # is this is a security patch (true or false)
6193       //  security = false
6194       //
6195       //  # if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
6196       //  requiresRestart = false
6197       Properties patchProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + keyBase + ".properties"));
6198 
6199       foundNewPatch = true;
6200 
6201       // check dependencies
6202       {
6203         String[] dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(patchProperties.getProperty("dependencies"), ",");
6204   
6205         boolean invalidDependency = false;
6206         for (String dependency : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(dependencies, String.class)) {
6207           if (!this.patchesInstalled.contains(dependency)) {
6208             System.out.println("Cannot install patch " + keyBase + " since it is dependent on a patch which is not installed: " + dependency);
6209             invalidDependency = true;
6210           }
6211         }
6212         if (invalidDependency) {
6213           System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue");
6214           readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterPatchDependencyFails");
6215           continue OUTER;
6216         }
6217       }
6218       
6219       boolean securityRelated = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("security"), false);
6220       boolean requiresRestart = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("requiresRestart"), true);
6221       
6222       if (this.installAllPatches == null) {
6223         System.out.println("Would you like to install all patches (t|f)? [t]: ");
6224         this.installAllPatches = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installAllPatches");
6225       }
6226       
6227       //print description
6228       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + " is " + patchProperties.getProperty("risk") + " risk, "
6229           + (securityRelated ? "is a security patch" : "is not a security patch"));
6230       System.out.println(patchProperties.getProperty("description"));
6231       boolean installPatch = false;
6232       if (!this.installAllPatches) {
6233         System.out.println("Would you like to install patch " + keyBase + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
6234       }
6235       installPatch = this.installAllPatches || readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installPatch");
6236 
6237       //keep track that we skipped this in the patch properties file
6238       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".date", 
6239           GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6240 
6241       if (!installPatch) {
6242 
6243         System.out.println("Would you like to be prompted about this patch next time? (t|f)? [t]: ");
6244 
6245         boolean temporary = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.promptAboutPatchNextTime");
6246 
6247         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = null;
6248 
6249         if (temporary) {
6250           grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.skippedTemporarily;
6251         } else {
6252           grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.skippedPermanently;
6253         }
6254 
6255         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6256             grouperInstallerPatchStatus.name(), true);
6257         System.out.println("");
6258         continue OUTER;
6259       }
6260 
6261       if (requiresRestart && !this.grouperStopped) {
6262         System.out.println("This patch requires all processes that user Grouper to be stopped.\n  "
6263             + "Please stop these processes if they are running and press <enter> to continue...");
6264         this.grouperStopped = true;
6265         readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterPatchStopProcesses");
6266       }
6267       
6268       Map<String, String> patchDirToApplicationPath = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
6269       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("files", this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
6270       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("classes", this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
6271       patchDirToApplicationPath.put("lib", this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
6272 
6273       boolean patchHasProblem = false;
6274       
6275       //we are installing this patch, lets see if the files are there...
6276       //this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
6277       //patchUntarredDir
6278       File oldDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "old");
6279       File newDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new");
6280       {
6281 
6282         for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6283           
6284           String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6285 
6286           File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6287           File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6288           
6289           if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6290           
6291             // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6292             Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
6293             
6294             for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
6295               File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6296               File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6297               File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
6298   
6299               if (!oldFileInPatch.exists() || !oldFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6300                 throw new RuntimeException("Why does file not exist or not file??? " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath());
6301               }
6302               boolean deletedNewPatchFile = !newFileInPatch.exists();
6303               boolean deletedGrouperFile = !oldFileInGrouper.exists();
6304               //if both deleted thats ok
6305               if ((!deletedGrouperFile || !deletedNewPatchFile) &&
6306                  ( !oldFileInGrouper.exists() || !oldFileInGrouper.isFile() 
6307                   || (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInPatch, oldFileInGrouper)
6308                       //patch is already applied?  thats ok i guess
6309                       && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFileInPatch, oldFileInGrouper)))) {
6310                 
6311                 System.out.println("Problem applying patch since this patch old file:\n  " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6312                     + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath()
6313                     + "\n  Do you want to force install this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
6314                 
6315                 boolean forceInstallPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceInstallPatch");
6316                 
6317                 if (!forceInstallPatch) {
6318                   System.out.println("Cannot apply patch since this patch file:\n  " + oldFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6319                       + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6320                   patchHasProblem = true;
6321                 }
6322               }
6323             }
6324           }
6325         }
6326       }
6327 
6328       //lets make sure that files which are new which dont have an old version do not exist in the application
6329       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6330         
6331         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6332 
6333         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6334         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6335         
6336         if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6337         
6338           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6339           Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6340 
6341           Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) ? 
6342               GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles) : new HashSet<String>();
6343 
6344           for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6345 
6346             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6347             File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6348 
6349             if (!newFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6350               continue;
6351             }
6352             
6353             //if there wasnt a corresponding old file path
6354             if (!oldFileRelativePaths.contains(newFilePath) && !GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(oldFileInGrouper, newFileInPatch)) {
6355 
6356               //then the file shouldnt exist
6357               if (oldFileInGrouper.exists()) {
6358 
6359                 System.out.println("Problem applying patch since this file:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath() 
6360                   + "\n  should not exist yet\n  Do you want to force install this patch (t|f)? [f]: ");
6361             
6362                 boolean forceInstallPatch = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.forceInstallPatch");
6363                 
6364                 if (!forceInstallPatch) {
6365                 
6366                 
6367                   System.out.println("Cannot apply patch since this patch file:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6368                       + "\n  is supposed to be new, but it already exists:\n  " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6369                   patchHasProblem = true;
6370 
6371                 }
6372               }
6373             }
6374           }
6375         }
6376       }
6377 
6378       if (patchHasProblem) {
6379         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6380             GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.error.name(), true);
6381 
6382         continue OUTER;
6383       }
6384 
6385       //so far so good, all the old files are all good, install the patch
6386       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6387         
6388         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6389 
6390         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6391         
6392         if (newDirFiles.exists() && newDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6393         
6394           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6395           Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6396           
6397           for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6398             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6399             if (!newFileInPatch.isFile()) {
6400               continue;
6401             }
6402             File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6403             if (!oldFileInGrouper.exists() && !oldFileInGrouper.getParentFile().exists()) {
6404               GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(oldFileInGrouper.getParentFile());
6405             }
6406             System.out.println("Applying file: " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6407             GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFileInPatch, oldFileInGrouper, false);
6408           }
6409         }
6410         
6411         File oldDirFiles = new File(oldDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6412         
6413         if (oldDirFiles.exists() && oldDirFiles.isDirectory()) {
6414         
6415           // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6416           Set<String> oldFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(oldDirFiles);
6417           
6418           for (String oldFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(oldFileRelativePaths)) {
6419             File oldFileInPatch = new File(oldDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6420             File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + oldFilePath);
6421             File oldFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + oldFilePath);
6422 
6423             if (oldFileInPatch.exists() && !newFileInPatch.exists() && oldFileInGrouper.exists() && oldFileInGrouper.isFile()) {
6424 
6425               System.out.println("Deleting file: " + oldFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6426               GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDelete(oldFileInGrouper);
6427               
6428             }
6429           }
6430         }
6431       }
6432       
6433       this.patchesInstalled.add(keyBase);
6434       System.out.println("Patch successfully applied: " + keyBase);
6435       
6436       editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6437           GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied.name(), true);
6438       System.out.println("");
6439     }
6440 
6441     if (!foundNewPatch) {
6442       System.out.println("There are no new " + thisAppToUpgrade + " patches to install\n");
6443       return false;
6444     } 
6445     return true;
6446   }
6447   
6448   /**
6449    * fix the index file
6450    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
6451    */
6452   private void fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade) {
6453 
6454     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
6455       throw new RuntimeException("Cant fix index file for " + thisAppToUpgrade);
6456     }
6457     
6458     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
6459 
6460     String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
6461 
6462     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
6463 
6464     //lets download all patches
6465     int nextPatchIndex = downloadPatches(thisAppToUpgrade, grouperVersion);
6466     
6467     File patchExistingPropertiesFile = patchExistingPropertiesFile();
6468 
6469     Map<String, String> patchDirToApplicationPath = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
6470     patchDirToApplicationPath.put("files", this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
6471     patchDirToApplicationPath.put("classes", this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
6472     patchDirToApplicationPath.put("lib", this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
6473 
6474     //map of full patch file name to the patch number that is installed
6475     Map<String, Integer> fileInMoreRecentPatchMap = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
6476 
6477     boolean patchesOverallOk = true;
6478     
6479     //process patches from greatest to least
6480     for (int i=nextPatchIndex-1;i>=0;i--) {
6481       
6482       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
6483       String patchName = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
6484 
6485       String key = patchName + ".state";
6486 
6487       //see what is already there
6488       String existingState = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
6489       
6490       GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(existingState, false, true);
6491 
6492       File patchUntarredDir = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "patches" + File.separator + patchName);
6493 
6494       //keep track that we skipped this in the patch properties file
6495       //editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".date", 
6496       //    GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()));
6497       //editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, keyBase + ".state", 
6498       //    grouperInstallerPatchStatus.name());
6499 
6500       boolean patchHasProblem = false;
6501       boolean patchHasAtLeastOneFile = false;
6502       boolean patchHasAtLeastOneFileInAnotherPatch = false;
6503       Set<String> patchErrors = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
6504       
6505       //keep track of patch paths (full path in patch)
6506       Set<String> patchPaths = new HashSet<String>();
6507       
6508       //we are installing this patch, lets see if the files are there...
6509       //this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
6510       //patchUntarredDir
6511       File newDir = new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "new");
6512       //loop through lib, classes, files
6513       for (String patchDir : patchDirToApplicationPath.keySet()) {
6514 
6515         String applicationPath = patchDirToApplicationPath.get(patchDir);
6516 
6517         File newDirFiles = new File(newDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + patchDir);
6518 
6519         // relative, e.g. WEB-INF/jsp/someFile.jsp
6520         Set<String> newFileRelativePaths = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileDescendantRelativePaths(newDirFiles);
6521         // go through all files of the patches in the new dir
6522         for (String newFilePath : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(newFileRelativePaths)) {
6523 
6524           String patchPath = patchDir + File.separator + newFilePath;
6525           
6526           Integer existsInPatchVersion = fileInMoreRecentPatchMap.get(patchPath);
6527           
6528           //if this file was in a newer patch, then thats ok
6529           if (existsInPatchVersion != null) {
6530             //this file is ok, its in a more recent patch
6531             patchHasAtLeastOneFileInAnotherPatch = true;
6532             continue;
6533           }
6534 
6535           File newFileInGrouper = new File(applicationPath + newFilePath);
6536 
6537           File newFileInPatch = new File(newDirFiles.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + newFilePath);
6538           
6539           //see if the contents of the patch match those in grouper
6540           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newFileInPatch, newFileInGrouper)) {
6541 
6542             patchErrors.add("Problem in patch:\n  " + newFileInPatch.getAbsolutePath() 
6543                 + "\n  is not the same as what the patch expects:\n  " + newFileInGrouper.getAbsolutePath());
6544             patchHasProblem = true;
6545           } else {
6546 
6547             patchPaths.add(patchPath);
6548 
6549             patchHasAtLeastOneFile = true;
6550           }
6551         }
6552       }
6553         
6554       //is any file installed?  or if there are only files in other patches... hmm
6555       if (patchHasAtLeastOneFile || (patchHasAtLeastOneFileInAnotherPatch && !patchHasProblem )) {
6556         
6557         //add files in this patch to the list
6558         for (String patchPath : patchPaths) {
6559           fileInMoreRecentPatchMap.put(patchPath, i);
6560         }
6561         
6562         //one or more of the files in the patch had a problem
6563         if (patchHasProblem) {
6564           for (String patchError: patchErrors) {
6565             System.out.println(patchError);
6566           }
6567           if (grouperInstallerPatchStatus == null || (grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied
6568               && grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.error)) {
6569             patchesOverallOk = false;
6570             editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".date", 
6571                 GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6572             editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".state", 
6573                 GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied.name(), true);
6574             System.out.println("Patch " + patchName + " was listed as " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus + " but was changed to applied (even though there are files missing)");
6575             
6576           }
6577           continue;          
6578         }
6579         
6580         if (grouperInstallerPatchStatus == null || grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied) {
6581           patchesOverallOk = false;
6582           editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".date", 
6583               GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6584           editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".state", 
6585               GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied.name(), true);
6586           System.out.println("Patch " + patchName + " was listed as " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus + " but was changed to applied");
6587           
6588         }
6589         
6590       } else {
6591         if (grouperInstallerPatchStatus == null || grouperInstallerPatchStatus != GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.applied) {
6592           continue;
6593         }
6594         
6595         patchesOverallOk = false;
6596         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".date", 
6597             GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6598         editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, patchName + ".state", 
6599             GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.skippedTemporarily.name(), true);
6600         System.out.println("Patch " + patchName + " was listed as applied but was changed to skippedTemporarily");
6601         continue;
6602       }
6603 
6604     }
6605 
6606     //tell the properties file that we have fixed the index file now
6607     editPropertiesFile(patchExistingPropertiesFile, "grouperInstallerLastFixedIndexFile.date", 
6608         GrouperInstallerUtils.dateMinutesSecondsFormat.format(new Date()), true);
6609   
6610     if (patchesOverallOk) {
6611       System.out.println("Patches for " + thisAppToUpgrade + " for version " + grouperVersion + " were in the index file correctly");
6612     }
6613   }
6614   
6615   /**
6616    * get all patches
6617    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
6618    * @param grouperVersion
6619    * @return next patch index
6620    */
6621   private int downloadPatches(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade, String grouperVersion) {
6622 
6623     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
6624       throw new RuntimeException("Cant install patches for " + thisAppToUpgrade);
6625     }
6626     
6627     Map<Integer, String> patchNumberToNameBase = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, String>();
6628     
6629     int nextPatchIndex = 0;
6630 
6631     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<1000;i++) {
6632 
6633       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
6634       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
6635 
6636       patchNumberToNameBase.put(i, keyBase);
6637 
6638       //lets see if it exists on the server
6639       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
6640 
6641       //if no more patches
6642       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
6643         System.out.println("");
6644         break OUTER;
6645       }
6646 
6647       nextPatchIndex = i+1;
6648     }
6649 
6650     return nextPatchIndex;
6651 
6652   }
6653   
6654   /**
6655    * 
6656    * @param patchName e.g. grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.tar.gz
6657    * @return the directory of the unzipped patch
6658    */
6659   public File downloadAndUnzipPatch(String patchName) {
6660     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
6661     
6662     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
6663       urlToDownload += "/";
6664     }
6665     urlToDownload += "release/";
6666     
6667     //e.g. 2.2.2
6668     Matcher patchNameMatcher = patchNamePattern.matcher(patchName);
6669     if (!patchNameMatcher.matches()) {
6670       throw new RuntimeException("Invalid patch name: " + patchName);
6671     }
6672     
6673     //String grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
6674     String grouperVersion = patchNameMatcher.group(1) + "." + patchNameMatcher.group(2) + "." + patchNameMatcher.group(3);
6675     
6676     urlToDownload +=  grouperVersion + "/patches/" + patchName + ".tar.gz";
6677 
6678     File patchFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "patches" + File.separator + patchName + ".tar.gz");
6679     
6680     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.downloadPatches", true, false)) {
6681 
6682       boolean foundFile = downloadFile(urlToDownload, patchFile.getAbsolutePath(), true, "Patch doesnt exist yet (not an error): ", 
6683           "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists");
6684       
6685       if (!foundFile) {
6686 
6687         //if we are doing test patches
6688         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.useTestPatches", false, false)) {
6689           String testUrlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(urlToDownload, ".tar.gz", "_test.tar.gz");
6690           
6691           //its a test url, but download to the same file name
6692           foundFile = downloadFile(testUrlToDownload, patchFile.getAbsolutePath(), true, "Patch doesnt exist yet (not an error): ", 
6693               "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists");
6694         }
6695 
6696         if (!foundFile) {
6697           return null;
6698         }
6699       }
6700     } else {
6701       if (!patchFile.exists()) {
6702         return null;
6703       }
6704     }
6705     
6706     //####################################
6707     //unzip/untar the patch file
6708     
6709     File unzippedFile = unzip(patchFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists");
6710     File untarredDir = untar(unzippedFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPatchIfExists", null);
6711     return untarredDir;
6712   }
6713 
6714   /**
6715    * 
6716    * @param branchName
6717    * @return the directory of the unzipped source repo
6718    */
6719   public File downloadAndUnzipGrouperSource(String branchName) {
6720     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.source.url", false);
6721     
6722     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(urlToDownload)) {
6723       urlToDownload = "https://github.com/Internet2/grouper/archive/$BRANCH_NAME$.zip";
6724     }
6725     
6726     urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(urlToDownload, "$BRANCH_NAME$", branchName);
6727 
6728     String fileToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringAfterLast(urlToDownload, "/");
6729     
6730     File sourceFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + fileToDownload);
6731     
6732     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.downloadSource", true, false)) {
6733 
6734       downloadFile(urlToDownload, sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6735       
6736     } else {
6737       if (!sourceFile.exists()) {
6738         throw new RuntimeException("Cant find grouper source");
6739       }
6740     }
6741     
6742     //####################################
6743     //unzip/untar the source file
6744     File unzippedDir = unzipFromZip(sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6745     return unzippedDir;
6746   }
6747 
6748   /**
6749    * 
6750    * @param branchName
6751    * @return the directory of the unzipped source repo
6752    */
6753   public File downloadAndUnzipPspSource(String branchName) {
6754     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.pspSource.url", false);
6755     
6756     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(urlToDownload)) {
6757       urlToDownload = "https://github.com/Internet2/grouper-psp/archive/$BRANCH_NAME$.zip";
6758     }
6759     
6760     urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(urlToDownload, "$BRANCH_NAME$", branchName);
6761 
6762     String fileToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.substringAfterLast(urlToDownload, "/");
6763     
6764     File sourceFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + fileToDownload);
6765     
6766     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.downloadSource", true, false)) {
6767 
6768       downloadFile(urlToDownload, sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6769       
6770     } else {
6771       if (!sourceFile.exists()) {
6772         throw new RuntimeException("Cant find grouper psp source");
6773       }
6774     }
6775     
6776     //####################################
6777     //unzip/untar the source file
6778     File unzippedDir = unzipFromZip(sourceFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.createPatchDownloadSourceUseLocalIfExist");
6779     return unzippedDir;
6780   }
6781 
6782   /**
6783    * 
6784    */
6785   public static enum GrouperInstallerPatchStatus {
6786 
6787     /**
6788      * patch was applied
6789      */
6790     applied, 
6791     
6792     /**
6793      * patch was removed
6794      */
6795     reverted, 
6796     
6797     /**
6798      * patch was skipped temporarily, prompt again
6799      */
6800     skippedTemporarily, 
6801 
6802     /**
6803      * patch had an error applying
6804      */
6805     error, 
6806 
6807     /**
6808      * patch was skipped permanently, dont prompt again
6809      */
6810     skippedPermanently;
6811 
6812     /**
6813      * 
6814      * @param string
6815      * @param exceptionIfNotFound
6816      * @param exceptionIfInvalid
6817      * @return the patch status
6818      */
6819     public static GrouperInstallerPatchStatus valueOfIgnoreCase(String string, boolean exceptionIfNotFound, boolean exceptionIfInvalid) {
6820       return GrouperInstallerUtils.enumValueOfIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.class, string, exceptionIfNotFound, exceptionIfInvalid);
6821     }
6822     
6823   }
6824 
6825   /**
6826    * patch status api
6827    */
6828   private void patchStatusApi() {
6829     this.patchStatus(AppToUpgrade.API);
6830   }
6831 
6832 
6833   /**
6834    * patch the api
6835    */
6836   private void patchApi() {
6837     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
6838   }
6839

6842    */
6843   private void fixIndexFileApi() {
6844     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
6845   }

6848    * fix index file ui
6849    */
6850   private void fixIndexFileUi() {
6851     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.UI);
6852     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
6853   }
6854

6856    * fix index file ws
6857    */
6858   private void fixIndexFileWs() {
6859     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.WS);
6860     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
6861   }

6864    * fix index file psp
6865    */

6868     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
6869   }

6872    * fix index file psp
6873    */

6876     this.fixIndexFile(AppToUpgrade.API);
6877   }

6885   }

6893   }

6911 
6912   /**
6913    * patch the client
6914    */
6915   private void patchUi() {
6916     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
6917     boolean patchesApplied = this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.UI);
6918     if (patchesApplied && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
6919         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
6920       System.out.print("Since patches were applied, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
6921           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
6922       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteUiWorkDirectory");
6923     }
6924   }
6925   
6926   /**
6927    * patch the client
6928    */
6929   private void patchWs() {
6930     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
6931     boolean patchesApplied = this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.WS);
6932     if (patchesApplied && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
6933         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
6934       System.out.print("Since patches were applied, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
6935           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
6936       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteWsWorkDirectory");
6937     }
6938   }
6939   
6940   /**
6941    * patch the psp
6942    */
6943   private void patchPsp() {
6944     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
6945     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.PSP);
6946   }
6947

6949    * patch the pspng
6950    */
6951   private void patchPspng() {

6953     this.downloadAndInstallPatches(AppToUpgrade.PSPNG);
6954   }

6961   }
6962 
6963   /**
6964    * revert patch the client
6965    */
6966   private void patchRevertUi() {
6967     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.UI);
6968     boolean patchesReverted = this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
6969     if (patchesReverted && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
6970         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
6971       System.out.print("Since patches were reverted, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
6972           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
6973       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteUiWorkDirectory");
6974     }
6975   }
6976   
6977   /**
6978    * revert patch the client
6979    */
6980   private void patchRevertWs() {
6981     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.WS);
6982     boolean patchesReverted = this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
6983     if (patchesReverted && (this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.patch 
6984         || this.grouperInstallerMainFunction == GrouperInstallerMainFunction.upgrade)) {
6985       System.out.print("Since patches were reverted, you should delete files in your app server work directory,"
6986           + "\n  in tomcat it is named 'work'.  Hit <enter> to continue: ");
6987       readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterDeleteWsWorkDirectory");
6988     }
6989   }
6990

6996     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
6997   }

7000    * revert patch the pspng
7001    */

7004     this.revertPatches(AppToUpgrade.API);
7005   }

7007   /**
7008    * owasp csrf guard file
7009    */
7010   private File owaspCsrfGuardFile;
7011   
7012   /**
7013    * owasp csrf guard base file
7014    */
7015   private File owaspCsrfGuardBaseFile;
7016   
7017   /**
7018    * on an upgrade, compare a new jar and an existing jar and see if needs to be updated, and if so, update it
7019    * @param existingJarFile
7020    * @param newJarFile
7021    * @param printResultIfNotUpgrade
7022    * @param toDir if file not there, copy here.  If null, then go to upgrade existing lib directory string
7023    * @return true if upgraded, false if not
7024    */
7025   private boolean compareAndReplaceJar(File existingJarFile, File newJarFile, boolean printResultIfNotUpgrade, File toDir) {
7026     
7027     if (toDir == null) {
7028       toDir = new File(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
7029     }
7030     
7031     if (existingJarFile == null || !existingJarFile.exists()) {
7032       System.out.println(newJarFile.getName() + " is a new file and is being copied to the application lib dir");
7033       existingJarFile = new File(toDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + newJarFile.getName());
7034       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newJarFile, existingJarFile, true);
7035       return true;
7036     }
7037 
7038     String existingJarFilePath = existingJarFile.getAbsolutePath();
7039     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingJarFilePath,this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
7040       throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " + existingJarFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
7041     }
7042     
7043     String bakJarFileString = this.grouperBaseBakDir + existingJarFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
7044     File bakJarFile = new File(bakJarFileString);
7045     
7046     String existingVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(existingJarFile);
7047     String newVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.jarVersion(newJarFile);
7048     
7049     long existingSize = existingJarFile.length();
7050     long newSize = newJarFile.length();
7051     
7052     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingVersion, newVersion) || existingSize != newSize) {
7053 
7054       //make sure parents exist
7055       GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakJarFile);
7056       
7057       System.out.println(existingJarFile.getName() + " had version " + existingVersion + " and size " + existingSize + " bytes and is being upgraded to version "
7058           + newVersion + " and size " + newSize + " bytes.\n  It is backed up to " + bakJarFile);
7059 
7060       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingJarFile, bakJarFile);
7061       
7062       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newJarFile, existingJarFile, true);
7063       
7064       return true;
7065     }
7066     
7067     if (printResultIfNotUpgrade) {
7068       System.out.println(existingJarFile.getName() + " is up to date");
7069     }
7070     return false;
7071   }
7072 
7073   /**
7074    * on an upgrade, compare a new file and an existing file and see if needs to be updated, and if so, update it
7075    * @param existingFile
7076    * @param newFile
7077    * @param printResultIfNotUpgrade
7078    * @param toDir if file not there, copy here.  If null, then go to upgrade existing lib directory string
7079    * @return true if upgraded, false if not
7080    */
7081   private boolean compareAndCopyFile(File existingFile, File newFile, boolean printResultIfNotUpgrade, File toDir) {
7082     
7083     if (toDir == null) {
7084       throw new RuntimeException("Which dir to copy to??? " + newFile + ", " + existingFile);
7085     }
7086     
7087     if (existingFile == null || !existingFile.exists()) {
7088       System.out.println(newFile.getName() + " is a new file and is being copied to the application dir: " + toDir.getAbsolutePath());
7089       existingFile = new File(toDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + newFile.getName());
7090       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFile, existingFile, true);
7091       return true;
7092     }
7093 
7094     String existingFilePath = existingFile.getAbsolutePath();
7095     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.filePathStartsWith(existingFilePath,this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString)) {
7096       throw new RuntimeException("Why does existing path not start with upgrade path??? " + existingFilePath + ", " + this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString);
7097     }
7098     
7099     String bakFileString = this.grouperBaseBakDir + existingFilePath.substring(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString.length());
7100     File bakFile = new File(bakFileString);
7101     
7102     String existingChecksum = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(existingFile);
7103     String newChecksum = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileSha1(newFile);
7104     
7105     long existingSize = existingFile.length();
7106     long newSize = newFile.length();
7107     
7108     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(existingChecksum, newChecksum) || existingSize != newSize) {
7109 
7110       //make sure parents exist
7111       GrouperInstallerUtils.createParentDirectories(bakFile);
7112       
7113       System.out.println(existingFile.getName() + " had checksum " + existingChecksum + " and size " + existingSize + " bytes and is being upgraded to checksum "
7114           + newChecksum + " and size " + newSize + " bytes.\n  It is backed up to " + bakFile);
7115 
7116       GrouperInstallerUtils.fileMove(existingFile, bakFile);
7117       
7118       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newFile, existingFile, true);
7119       
7120       return true;
7121     }
7122     
7123     if (printResultIfNotUpgrade) {
7124       System.out.println(existingFile.getName() + " is up to date");
7125     }
7126     return false;
7127   }
7128
