7249   
7250   /**
7251    * find a classpath file on classpath by resourceName
7252    * @param resourceName resource name of file
7253    * @param exceptionIfNotFound 
7254    * @return the file or null if not exception if not found
7255    */
7256   private File findClasspathFile(String resourceName, boolean exceptionIfNotFound) {
7257     
7258     Set<String> fileNamesTried = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
7259     
7260     File file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "classes" + File.separator + resourceName);
7261     if (file.exists()) {
7262       return file;
7263     }
7264     
7265     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7266     
7267     file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator + resourceName);
7268     if (file.exists()) {
7269       return file;
7270     }
7271 
7272     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7273 
7274     //these could be in this location
7275     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("nav.properties", resourceName) 
7276         || GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("media.properties", resourceName)) {
7277       file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator 
7278           + "classes" + File.separator + "resources" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator + resourceName);
7279       if (file.exists()) {
7280         return file;
7281       }
7282       
7283       fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7284     }
7285     
7286     file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" 
7287         + File.separator + resourceName);
7288     if (file.exists()) {
7289       return file;
7290     }
7291 
7292     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7293     
7294     file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + resourceName);
7295     if (file.exists()) {
7296       return file;
7297     }
7298 
7299     fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7300     
7301     if (exceptionIfNotFound) {
7302       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find file, looked in: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(fileNamesTried.iterator(), ", "));
7303     }
7304     
7305     return null;
7306   }
7307 
7308   /**
7309    * lib dirs where libs might be in this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString
7310    */
7311   private static List<String> libDirs = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList(
7312       "lib" + File.separator, 
7313       "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator,
7314       "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator,
7315       "lib" + File.separator + "custom" + File.separator,
7316       "lib" + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator,
7317       "dist" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator,
7318       "");
7319 
7320   /**
7321    * get all library files
7322    * @return the list of files
7323    */
7324   private List<File> findAllLibraryFiles() {
7325     List<File> result = new ArrayList<File>();
7326     for (String libDir : libDirs) {
7327 
7328       File dir = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + libDir);
7329       if (dir.exists() && dir.isDirectory()) {
7330         for (File file : dir.listFiles()) {
7331           if (file.getName().endsWith(".jar")) {
7332             result.add(file);
7333           }
7334         }
7335       }
7336       
7337     }
7338     return result;
7339   }
7340   
7341   /**
7342    * find a library file on lib dir by libName
7343    * @param libName lib name of file
7344    * @param exceptionIfNotFound 
7345    * @return the file or null if not exception if not found
7346    */
7347   private File findLibraryFile(String libName, boolean exceptionIfNotFound) {
7348     
7349     Set<String> fileNamesTried = new LinkedHashSet<String>();
7350 
7351     for (String libDir : libDirs) {
7352 
7353       File file = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + libDir + libName);
7354       if (file.exists()) {
7355         return file;
7356       }
7357       
7358       fileNamesTried.add(file.getAbsolutePath());
7359       
7360     }
7361     
7362     if (exceptionIfNotFound) {
7363       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find file, looked in: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(fileNamesTried.iterator(), ", "));
7364     }
7365     
7366     return null;
7367   }
7368   
7369   /**
7370    * 
7371    */
7372   private void mainInstallLogic() {
7373     
7374     //####################################
7375     //Find out what directory to install to.  This ends in a file separator
7376     this.grouperInstallDirectoryString = grouperInstallDirectory();
7377 
7378     //Find out what directory to upgrade to.  This ends in a file separator
7379     this.grouperTarballDirectoryString = grouperUpgradeTempDirectory();
7380 
7381     //####################################
7382     //get default ip address
7383     System.out.print("Enter the default IP address for checking ports (just hit enter to accept the default unless on a machine with no network, might want to change to 127.0.0.1): [0.0.0.0]: ");
7384     this.defaultIpAddress = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.defaultIpAddressForPorts");
7385     
7386     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.defaultIpAddress)) {
7387       this.defaultIpAddress = "0.0.0.0";
7388     }
7389 
7390     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("0.0.0.0", this.defaultIpAddress)) {
7391       System.out.println("Note, you will probably need to change the hsql IP address, and tomcat server.xml IP addresses...");
7392     }
7393     
7394     //####################################
7395     //System.out.println("Grouper install directory is: " + grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath());
7396 
7397     this.version = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouper.version", true);
7398     System.out.println("Installing grouper version: " + this.version);
7399     //see if it is already downloaded
7400     
7401     //download api and set executable and dos2unix etc
7402     downloadAndConfigureApi();
7403 
7404     //####################################
7405     //ask about database
7406 
7407     File localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + "conf" 
7408         + File.separator + "grouper.hibernate.properties");
7409 
7410     Properties grouperHibernateProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile);
7411 
7412     this.dbUrl = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.url"), "jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper");
7413     this.dbUser = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.username"));
7414     this.dbPass = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(grouperHibernateProperties.getProperty("hibernate.connection.password"));
7415 
7416     boolean useHsqldb = false;
7417 
7418     if (this.dbUrl.contains(":hsqldb:")) {
7419       System.out.print("Do you want to use the default and included hsqldb database (t|f)? [t]: ");
7420       useHsqldb = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.useBuiltInHsql");
7421     }
7422 
7423     if (!useHsqldb) {
7424 
7425       System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7426       System.out.println("Example mysql URL: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/grouper");
7427       System.out.println("Example oracle URL: jdbc:oracle:thin:@server.school.edu:1521:sid");
7428       System.out.println("Example hsqldb URL: jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper");
7429       System.out.println("Example postgres URL: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/database");
7430       System.out.println("Example mssql URL: jdbc:sqlserver://localhost:3280;databaseName=grouper");
7431       System.out.print("\nEnter the database URL [" + this.dbUrl + "]: ");
7432       String newDbUrl = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.dbUrl");
7433       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newDbUrl)) {
7434         this.dbUrl = newDbUrl;
7435         if (newDbUrl.contains("postgresql") || newDbUrl.contains("sqlserver")) {
7436           System.out.println("Note: you need to change the search sql in the jdbc source in the grouperApi/conf/sources.xml... the change is in the comments in that file");
7437           for (int i=0;i<3;i++) {
7438             System.out.print("Ready to continue? (t|f)? [t] ");
7439             boolean shouldContinue = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.dbContinueAfterChangeSourcesXmlForPostgresSqlServer");
7440             if (shouldContinue) {
7441               break;
7442             }
7443           }
7444         }
7445       }
7446       System.out.print("Database user [" + this.dbUser + "]: ");
7447       String newDbUser = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.dbUser");
7448       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newDbUser)) {
7449         this.dbUser = newDbUser;
7450       }
7451       System.out.print("Database password (note, you aren't setting the pass here, you are using an existing pass, this will be echoed back) [" 
7452           + GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfEmpty(this.dbPass, "<blank>") + "]: ");
7453       String newDbPass = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.dbPass");
7454       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newDbPass)) {
7455         this.dbPass = newDbPass;
7456       }
7457     }
7458 
7459     this.giDbUtils = new GiDbUtils(this.dbUrl, this.dbUser, this.dbPass);
7460 
7461     //####################################
7462     //change the config file
7463     //get the config file
7464 
7465     //lets edit the three properties:
7466     System.out.println("Editing " + localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ": ");
7467     editPropertiesFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile, "hibernate.connection.url", this.dbUrl, false);
7468     editPropertiesFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile, "hibernate.connection.username", this.dbUser, false);
7469     editPropertiesFile(localGrouperHibernatePropertiesFile, "hibernate.connection.password", this.dbPass, false);
7470 
7471     //####################################
7472     //check to see if listening on port?
7473 
7474     //####################################
7475     //lets get the java command
7476     validateJavaVersion();
7477 
7478     //#####################################
7479     //add driver to classpath
7480     this.addDriverJarToClasspath();
7481 
7482     //####################################
7483     //start database if needed (check on port?  ask to change port?)
7484     if (this.dbUrl.contains("hsqldb")) {
7485       //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.apiBinary-2.1.0
7486       startHsqlDb();
7487     }
7488     
7489     //####################################
7490     //check connection to database
7491     checkDatabaseConnection();
7492     
7493     //####################################
7494     // patch the API
7495     this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
7496     this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7497         + "conf" + File.separator;
7498     this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7499         + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator;
7500     patchApi();
7501 
7502     //make sure log4j is debugging sql statements
7503     log4jDebugSql(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString + "log4j.properties");
7504     
7505     //####################################
7506     //ask then init the DB
7507     initDb();
7508     addQuickstartSubjects();
7509     addQuickstartData();
7510     
7511     //####################################
7512     //download and configure ui
7513     System.out.print("Do you want to install the user interface (t|f)? [t]: ");
7514     boolean installUi = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installUi");
7515     if (installUi) {
7516       downloadAndConfigureUi();
7517     }
7518     
7519     //####################################
7520     //get ant
7521     downloadAndUnzipAnt();
7522     
7523     //####################################
7524     //look for or ask or download tomcat
7525     File tomcatDir = downloadTomcat();
7526     File unzippedTomcatFile = unzip(tomcatDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
7527     this.untarredTomcatDir = untar(unzippedTomcatFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc", 
7528         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
7529 
7530     //####################################
7531     //ask for tomcat port
7532     configureTomcat();
7533 
7534     File apiPatchStatusFile = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(
7535         this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath()) + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
7536 
7537     //####################################
7538     //build UI
7539     if (installUi) {
7540 
7541       buildUi(true);
7542 
7543       //####################################
7544       //configureTomcatUiWebapp
7545       configureTomcatUiWebapp();
7546   
7547       //####################################
7548       //copy api patch level to ui
7549       File uiPatchStatusFile = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(
7550           this.grouperUiBuildToDirName()) + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
7551       System.out.println("Copying applied API patch status to UI:");
7552       System.out.println("  - from: "  + apiPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7553       System.out.println("  - to: "  + uiPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7554       GrouperInstallerMergePatchFiles.mergePatchFiles(
7555           apiPatchStatusFile, uiPatchStatusFile, true);
7556 
7557       //####################################
7558       // patch the ui
7559       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperUiBuildToDirName());
7560       this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperUiBuildToDirName())
7561           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator ;
7562       this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperUiBuildToDirName())
7563           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator;
7564       this.patchUi();
7565     }
7566     
7567     //####################################
7568     //set the GrouperSystem password
7569     tomcatConfigureGrouperSystem();
7570 
7571     if (installUi) {
7572       //####################################
7573       //bounce tomcat
7574       tomcatBounce("restart");
7575       
7576       //####################################
7577       //tell user to go to url
7578       System.out.println("##################################\n");
7579       System.out.println("Go here for the Grouper UI (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "/");
7580       System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7581     }
7582     
7583     System.out.print("Do you want to install web services (t|f)? [t]: ");
7584     boolean installWs = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installWs");
7585     
7586     if (installWs) {
7587       this.downloadAndConfigureWs();
7588       
7589       //####################################
7590       //build WS
7591       buildWs(true);
7592       
7593       //####################################
7594       //copy to tomcat
7595       configureTomcatWsWebapp();
7596   
7597       //####################################
7598       //copy api patch level to ui
7599       File wsPatchStatusFile = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(
7600           this.grouperWsBuildToDirName()) + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "grouperPatchStatus.properties");
7601       System.out.println("Copying applied API patch status to WS:");
7602       System.out.println("  - from: "  + apiPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7603       System.out.println("  - to: "  + wsPatchStatusFile.getAbsolutePath());
7604       GrouperInstallerMergePatchFiles.mergePatchFiles(
7605           apiPatchStatusFile, wsPatchStatusFile, true);
7606   
7607       //####################################
7608       // patch the ws
7609       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName());
7610       this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName())
7611           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator ;
7612       this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName())
7613           + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator;
7614   
7615       this.patchWs();
7616   
7617       //####################################
7618       //bounce tomcat
7619       tomcatBounce("restart");
7620   
7621       //####################################
7622       //tell user to go to url
7623       System.out.println("This is the Grouper WS URL (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "/");
7624     }
7625     
7626     System.out.print("Do you want to install the web services client (t|f)? [t]: ");
7627     boolean installClient = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installClient");
7628     
7629     if (installClient) {
7630       //download and build client
7631       this.downloadAndBuildClient();
7632   
7633       //####################################
7634       //configure where WS is
7635       this.configureClient();
7636       
7637       if (installWs) {
7638         //####################################
7639         //add grouper system to WS group
7640         this.addGrouperSystemWsGroup();
7641         
7642         //####################################
7643         //run a client command
7644         this.runClientCommand();
7645       }
7646     }
7647 
7648     //####################################
7649     //install pspng
7650     System.out.print("Do you want to install the provisioning service provider next generation (t|f)? [t]: ");
7651     boolean installPspng = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installPspng");
7652     if (installPspng) {
7653       downloadAndBuildPspng();  
7654       
7655       //copy jars
7656       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyDirectory(new File(this.untarredPspngDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom"), 
7657           new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom"));
7658       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyDirectory(new File(this.untarredPspngDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist"), 
7659           new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "custom"));
7660 
7661       //####################################
7662       // patch the PSP
7663       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
7664       this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7665           + "conf" + File.separator;
7666       this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7667           + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator;
7668       patchPspng();
7669             
7670     }
7671 
7672 
7673     if (!installPspng) {
7674       //####################################
7675       //install psp
7676       System.out.print("Do you want to install the provisioning service provider (t|f)? [t]: ");
7677       if (readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.installPsp")) {
7678         downloadAndBuildPsp();              
7679         GrouperInstallerUtils.copyDirectory(this.untarredPspDir, this.untarredApiDir);
7680   
7681         //####################################
7682         // patch the PSP
7683         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath());
7684         this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7685             + "conf" + File.separator;
7686         this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7687             + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator;
7688         patchPsp();
7689               
7690       }
7691     }
7692     
7693     reportOnConflictingJars();
7694 
7695     //#####################################
7696     //start the loader
7697     startLoader();
7698 
7699     //#####################################
7700     //success
7701     System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7702 
7703     System.out.println("\nInstallation success!");
7704 
7705 
7706     System.out.println("\nRun the installer's 'admin' function to get information and manage about your installation (db, tomcat, logs, etc)");
7707     
7708     if (installUi) {
7709       System.out.println("\nGo here for the Grouper UI (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "/");
7710       
7711     }
7712     if (installWs) {
7713       System.out.println("\nThis is the Grouper WS URL (change hostname if on different host): http://localhost:" + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "/");
7714     }
7715     System.out.println("\n##################################\n");
7716 
7717   }
7718 
7719   /**
7720    * 
7721    */
7722   private void downloadAndBuildPsp() {
7723     File pspDir = downloadPsp();
7724     File unzippedPspFile = unzip(pspDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspDownloadTarEtc");
7725     this.untarredPspDir = untar(unzippedPspFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspDownloadTarEtc", 
7726         null);
7727 
7728   }
7729   
7730   /**
7731    * 
7732    */
7733   private void downloadAndBuildPspng() {
7734     File pspngDir = downloadPspng();
7735     File unzippedPspngFile = unzip(pspngDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspngDownloadTarEtc");
7736     this.untarredPspngDir = untar(unzippedPspngFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspngDownloadTarEtc", 
7737         null);
7738 
7739   }
7740   
7741   /** untarred psp dir file */
7742   private File untarredPspDir;
7743   
7744   /** untarred pspng dir file */
7745   private File untarredPspngDir;
7746   
7747   /**
7748    * 
7749    */
7750   public void downloadAndUnzipAnt() {
7751     File antDir = downloadAnt();
7752     File unzippedAntFile = unzip(antDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
7753     this.untarredAntDir = untar(unzippedAntFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc", null);
7754   }
7755

7757    * 
7758    */
7759   public void downloadAndUnzipMaven() {
7760     File mavenDir = downloadMaven();
7761     File unzippedMavenFile = unzip(mavenDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
7762     this.untarredMavenDir = untar(unzippedMavenFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc", null);
7763   }

7765   /**
7766    * 
7767    */
7768   public void downloadAndConfigureWs() {
7769 
7770     //####################################
7771     //download the ws
7772     File wsDir = downloadWs();
7773 
7774     //####################################
7775     //unzip/untar the ws file
7776     File unzippedWsFile = unzip(wsDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalWsDownloadTarEtc");
7777     this.untarredWsDir = untar(unzippedWsFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalWsDownloadTarEtc", 
7778         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
7779 
7780     //####################################
7781     //configure where api is
7782     this.configureWs();
7783 
7784   }
7785 
7786   /**
7787    * 
7788    */
7789   public void downloadAndConfigureUi() {
7790     //####################################
7791     //get UI
7792     File uiDir = downloadUi();
7793     
7794     //####################################
7795     //unzip/untar the ui file
7796     File unzippedUiFile = unzip(uiDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalUiDownloadTarEtc");
7797     this.untarredUiDir = untar(unzippedUiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalUiDownloadTarEtc", 
7798         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
7799 
7800     //####################################
7801     //configure UI
7802     configureUi();
7803   }
7804 
7805   /**
7806    * 
7807    */
7808   public void downloadAndConfigureApi() {
7809     File apiFile = downloadApi();
7810     
7811     //####################################
7812     //unzip/untar the api file
7813     
7814     File unzippedApiFile = unzip(apiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
7815     File theUntarredApiDir = untar(unzippedApiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc", 
7816         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
7817     
7818     File theGrouperJar = new File(GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(theUntarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath())
7819         + "dist" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper.jar");
7820     
7821     gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(theUntarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator);
7822 
7823     //these might be set from UI or WS
7824     if (this.untarredApiDir == null) {
7825       this.untarredApiDir = theUntarredApiDir;
7826     }
7827     
7828     if (this.grouperJar == null) {
7829       this.grouperJar = theGrouperJar;
7830     }
7831   }
7832 
7833   /**
7834    * @param binDirLocation which includes trailing slash
7835    */
7836   public void gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(String binDirLocation) {
7837     gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(binDirLocation, null);
7838   }
7839 
7840   /**
7841    * run dos2unix on a file
7842    * @param file
7843    * @param fileNameInPrompt 
7844    * @param configSuffixAutorun 
7845    */
7846   public static void dos2unix(File file, String fileNameInPrompt, String configSuffixAutorun) {
7847     dos2unix(GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet(file), fileNameInPrompt, configSuffixAutorun);
7848   }
7849 
7850   /**
7851    * run dos2unix on a file
7852    * @param files
7853    * @param fileNameInPrompt e.g. gsh.sh
7854    * @param configSuffixAutorun suffix after grouperInstaller.autorun.dos2unix in properties file
7855    */
7856   public static void dos2unix(Collection<File> files, String fileNameInPrompt, String configSuffixAutorun) {
7857 
7858     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
7859 
7860       System.out.print("Do you want to run dos2unix on " + fileNameInPrompt + " (t|f)? [t]: ");
7861       boolean dos2unixRunOnFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.dos2unix" + configSuffixAutorun);
7862       
7863       if (dos2unixRunOnFile) {
7864 
7865         for (File file : files) {
7866           
7867           if (!file.exists()) {
7868             continue;
7869           }
7870           
7871           List<String> commands = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList("dos2unix", 
7872               file.getAbsolutePath());
7873     
7874           System.out.println("Making sure " + file.getName() + " is in unix format: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
7875           String error = null;
7876           CommandResult commandResult = null;
7877           boolean didntWork = false;
7878           Throwable throwable = null;
7879           try {
7880             commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
7881                 GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
7882                 file.getParentFile(), null, false, true, false);
7883 
7884             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
7885               System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
7886             }
7887             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
7888               System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
7889             }
7890             continue;
7891           } catch (Throwable t) {
7892             didntWork = true;
7893             error = t.getMessage();
7894             throwable = t;
7895           }
7896           
7897           if (didntWork) {
7898             try {
7899               //lets try the java way?
7900               String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
7901               if (fileContents.contains("\r\n")) {
7902                 System.out.println("Problem with command 'dos2unix'.   Is it installed?  Converting to unix via java replacing \\r\\n with \\n: " + file.getAbsolutePath());
7903                 fileContents = fileContents.replaceAll("\r\n", "\n");
7904                 GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(file, fileContents);
7905               }
7906               continue;
7907             } catch (Throwable t) {
7908               t.printStackTrace();
7909             }
7910           }
7911           
7912           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
7913             System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
7914           }
7915           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
7916             System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
7917           }
7918           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(error)) {
7919             if (throwable != null) {
7920               throwable.printStackTrace();
7921             }
7922             System.out.println("Error: " + error);
7923             System.out.println("NOTE: you might need to run this to convert newline characters to mac/unix:\n\n" +
7924                 "cat " + file.getAbsolutePath()
7925                 + " | col -b > " + file.getAbsolutePath() + "\n");
7926           }
7927         }
7928       }
7929 
7930     }
7931   }
7932   
7933   /**
7934    * @param binDirLocation which includes trailing slash
7935    * @param specify if specifying location
7936    */
7937   public void gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(String binDirLocation, String specify) {
7938     //lts make sure gsh is executable and in unix format
7939 
7940     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
7941 
7942       specify = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(specify);
7943       
7944       if (specify.length() > 0) {
7945         specify += " ";
7946       }
7947       
7948       System.out.print("Do you want to set " + specify + "gsh script to executable (t|f)? [t]: ");
7949       boolean setGshFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setGshScriptsToExecutable");
7950       
7951       if (setGshFile) {
7952       
7953         binDirLocation = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(binDirLocation);
7954         
7955         List<String> commands = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList("chmod", "+x", 
7956             binDirLocation + "gsh.sh");
7957   
7958         System.out.println("Making sure gsh.sh is executable with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
7959   
7960         CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
7961             GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
7962             new File(binDirLocation), null, true);
7963         
7964         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
7965           System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
7966         }
7967         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
7968           System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
7969         }
7970 
7971         if (new File(binDirLocation + "gsh").exists()) {
7972           commands = GrouperInstallerUtils.toList("chmod", "+x", 
7973               binDirLocation + "gsh");
7974     
7975           System.out.println("Making sure gsh is executable with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
7976     
7977           commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
7978               GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
7979               new File(binDirLocation), null, true);
7980           
7981           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
7982             System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
7983           }
7984           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
7985             System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
7986           }
7987         }
7988         
7989         dos2unix(GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet(new File(binDirLocation + "gsh.sh"), new File(binDirLocation + "gsh")), "gsh.sh", "OnGsh");
7990 
7991       }
7992       
7993     }
7994   }
7995   
7996   /**
7997    * if we are debugging sql in log4j
7998    */
7999   private Boolean log4jDebugSql = null;
8000   
8001   /**
8002    * if this file has been taken care of for a while
8003    */
8004   private Set<File> log4jDebugDone = new HashSet<File>();
8005   
8006   /**
8007    * if this file has been taken care of for a while
8008    */
8009   private Set<File> removeLegacyHibernatePropertiesDone = new HashSet<File>();
8010   
8011   /**
8012    * @param hibernateFileLocation
8013    */
8014   public void removeLegacyHibernateProperties(String hibernateFileLocation) {
8015 
8016     //if not a file dont worry about it
8017     File hibernateFile = new File(hibernateFileLocation);
8018 
8019     if (this.removeLegacyHibernatePropertiesDone.contains(hibernateFile)) {
8020       return;
8021     }
8022 
8023     this.removeLegacyHibernatePropertiesDone.add(hibernateFile);
8024 
8025     if (!hibernateFile.exists()) {
8026       System.out.println("Cant find grouper.hibernate.properties: " + hibernateFileLocation);
8027       return;
8028     }
8029     
8030     //see if its there
8031     Properties hibernateProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(hibernateFile);
8032     String current = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue(hibernateProperties, "hibernate.cache.region.factory_class");
8033     
8034     if (current == null) {
8035       //not there, we're good
8036       return;
8037     }
8038 
8039 
8040     removeRedundantProperties(hibernateFile, GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("hibernate.cache.region.factory_class"));
8041     System.out.println("File " + hibernateFile.getAbsolutePath() + " has property hibernate.cache.region.factory_class set to \"" + current + "\".  Removing since this is now in the grouper.hibernate.base.properties file.");
8042   }
8043   
8044   /**
8045    * @param log4jLocation
8046    */
8047   public void log4jDebugSql(String log4jLocation) {
8048 
8049     //if not a file dont worry about it
8050     File log4jFile = new File(log4jLocation);
8051 
8052     if (this.log4jDebugDone.contains(log4jFile)) {
8053       return;
8054     }
8055 
8056     this.log4jDebugDone.add(log4jFile);
8057 
8058     if (!log4jFile.exists()) {
8059       System.out.println("Cant find log4j.properties: " + log4jLocation);
8060       return;
8061     }
8062     
8063     //see if its already there
8064     Properties log4jProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(log4jFile);
8065     String currentAntEntry = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue(log4jProperties, "log4j.logger.org.apache.tools.ant");
8066     
8067     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(currentAntEntry), "DEBUG")
8068         || GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(currentAntEntry), "INFO")
8069         || GrouperInstallerUtils.equalsIgnoreCase(GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(currentAntEntry), "WARN")) {
8070       //we are already there
8071       return;
8072     }
8073 
8074     if (this.log4jDebugSql == null) {
8075       System.out.print("Do you want add log4j.logger.org.apache.tools.ant = WARN to " + log4jFile.getAbsolutePath() + " (recommended so you can see progress of SQL scripts) (t|f)? [t]: ");
8076       this.log4jDebugSql = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.log4jDebugSql");
8077     }
8078 
8079     if (this.log4jDebugSql) {
8080 
8081       editPropertiesFile(log4jFile, "log4j.logger.org.apache.tools.ant", "WARN", false);
8082 
8083     }
8084   }
8085 
8086   /**
8087    * 
8088    */
8089   public void downloadAndBuildClient() {
8090     //####################################
8091     //download the client
8092     File clientDir = downloadClient();
8093 
8094     //####################################
8095     //unzip/untar the client file
8096     File unzippedClientFile = unzip(clientDir.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalClientDownloadTarEtc");
8097     this.untarredClientDir = untar(unzippedClientFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalClientDownloadTarEtc", 
8098         new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString));
8099     
8100   }
8101 
8102   /**
8103    * 
8104    */
8105   private int tomcatHttpPort = -1;
8106   
8107   
8108   /**
8109    * 
8110    */
8111   private void configureTomcat() {
8112     
8113     System.out.print("Do you want to set the tomcat memory limit (t|f)? [t]: ");
8114     boolean setTomcatMemory = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setTomcatMemoryLimit");
8115     
8116     if (setTomcatMemory) {
8117       
8118       {
8119         File catalinaBatFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "catalina.bat");
8120         
8121         System.out.println("Editing file: " + catalinaBatFile.getAbsolutePath());
8122         
8123         Boolean edited = editFile(catalinaBatFile, "^\\s*set\\s+\"JAVA_OPTS\\s*=.*-Xmx([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "512M", "max memory");
8124         if (edited == null) {
8125           addToFile(catalinaBatFile, "\nset \"JAVA_OPTS=-server -Xmx512M -XX:MaxPermSize=256M\"\n", 65, "max memory");
8126         }
8127         if (null == editFile(catalinaBatFile, "^\\s*set\\s+\"JAVA_OPTS\\s*=.*-XX:MaxPermSize=([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "256M", "permgen memory")) {
8128           throw new RuntimeException("Why not edit permgen in file " + catalinaBatFile);
8129         }
8130       }
8131       
8132       {
8133         File catalinaShFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + "catalina.sh");
8134         
8135         System.out.println("Editing file: " + catalinaShFile.getAbsolutePath());
8136 
8137         Boolean edited = editFile(catalinaShFile, "^\\s*JAVA_OPTS\\s*=\".*-Xmx([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "512M", "max memory");
8138         if (edited == null) {
8139           addToFile(catalinaShFile, "\nJAVA_OPTS=\"-server -Xmx512M -XX:MaxPermSize=256M\"\n", 65, "max memory");
8140         }
8141         if (null == editFile(catalinaShFile, "^\\s*JAVA_OPTS\\s*=\".*-XX:MaxPermSize=([0-9mMgG]+)", null, null, "256M", "permgen memory")) {
8142           throw new RuntimeException("Why not edit permgen in file " + catalinaShFile);
8143         }
8144       }
8145     }      
8146     
8147     
8148     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows()) {
8149 
8150       System.out.print("Do you want to set tomcat scripts to executable (t|f)? [t]: ");
8151       boolean setTomcatFiles = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setTomcatScriptsToExecutable");
8152       
8153       //GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("catalina.sh", "startup.sh", "shutdown.sh");
8154       Set<String> shFileNames = new HashSet<String>();
8155 
8156       File binDir = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin");
8157 
8158       //get all sh files, doing wildcards doesnt work
8159       for (File file : binDir.listFiles()) {
8160         String fileName = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(file.getName());
8161         if (file.isFile() && fileName.endsWith(".sh")) {
8162           shFileNames.add(fileName);
8163         }
8164       }
8165 
8166       if (setTomcatFiles) {
8167       
8168         for (String command : shFileNames) {
8169           List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
8170           
8171           commands.add("chmod");
8172           commands.add("+x");
8173           //have to do * since all the  sh files need chmod
8174           commands.add(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + command);
8175     
8176           System.out.println("Making tomcat file executable with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
8177     
8178           CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
8179               GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
8180               new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "bin"), null, true);
8181           
8182           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
8183             System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
8184           }
8185           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
8186             System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
8187           }
8188         }
8189       }
8190       
8191       Set<File> shFiles = new LinkedHashSet<File>();
8192       for (String shFileName : shFileNames) {
8193         shFiles.add(new File(shFileName));
8194       }
8195       
8196       dos2unix(shFiles, "tomcat sh files", "OnTomcatFiles");
8197 
8198     }
8199       
8200     //see what the current ports are
8201     this.tomcatHttpPort = -1;
8202     
8203     File serverXmlFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
8204     
8205     int shutdownPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttributeInt(serverXmlFile, "/Server", "port", -1);
8206     
8207     int originalShutdownPort = shutdownPort;
8208     
8209     //  /Server/Service/Connector <Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" 
8210     this.tomcatHttpPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttributeInt(serverXmlFile, "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='HTTP/1.1']", "port", -1);
8211 
8212     int originalTomcatHttpPort = this.tomcatHttpPort;
8213 
8214     // <Connector port="8009" protocol="AJP/1.3" redirectPort="8443" />
8215     int jkPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttributeInt(serverXmlFile, "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='AJP/1.3']", "port", -1);
8216 
8217     int originalJkPort = jkPort;
8218     
8219     String portsCommaSeparated = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.tomcatPorts", false);
8220     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(portsCommaSeparated)) {
8221       
8222       String[] portsStrings = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(portsCommaSeparated, ",");
8223       
8224       if (portsStrings.length != 3) {
8225         throw new RuntimeException("Why is grouperInstaller.default.tomcatPorts from grouper.installer.properties not 3 ints comma separated? " + portsCommaSeparated);
8226       }
8227       
8228       this.tomcatHttpPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsStrings[0]);
8229       jkPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsStrings[1]);
8230       shutdownPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsStrings[2]);
8231       
8232     }
8233     
8234     while(true) {
8235       System.out.print("What ports do you want tomcat to run on (HTTP, JK, shutdown): [" + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", " + jkPort + ", " + shutdownPort + "]: ");
8236       
8237       String ports = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.tomcatPorts");
8238       
8239       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(ports)) {
8240         if (this.tomcatHttpPort == originalTomcatHttpPort && jkPort == originalJkPort && shutdownPort == originalShutdownPort) {
8241           break;
8242         }
8243       } else {
8244         String[] portsArray = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(ports, ",");
8245         if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(portsArray) == 3) {
8246           for (String portString : portsArray) {
8247             try {
8248               GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portString);
8249             } catch (Exception e) {
8250               continue;
8251             }
8252           }
8253         } else {
8254           continue;
8255         }
8256         //ok, we have three integer entries
8257         this.tomcatHttpPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsArray[0]);
8258         jkPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsArray[1]);
8259         shutdownPort = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(portsArray[2]);
8260       }
8261       
8262       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(this.tomcatHttpPort, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
8263         System.out.print("The tomcat HTTP port is in use or unavailable: " + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", do you want to pick different ports? (t|f): ");
8264         boolean pickDifferentPorts = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.pickDifferentPortIfInUse");
8265         if (pickDifferentPorts) {
8266           continue;
8267         }
8268       }
8269       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(jkPort, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
8270         System.out.print("The tomcat JK port is in use or unavailable: " + this.tomcatHttpPort + ", do you want to pick different ports? (t|f): ");
8271         boolean pickDifferentPorts = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.pickDifferentPortIfInUse");
8272         if (pickDifferentPorts) {
8273           continue;
8274         }
8275       }
8276       
8277       System.out.println("Editing tomcat config file: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
8278       //lets edit the file
8279       //<Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" 
8280       editFile(serverXmlFile, "port=\"([\\d]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"HTTP/1.1\""}, 
8281           new String[]{"SSLEnabled=\"true\""}, Integer.toString(this.tomcatHttpPort), "tomcat HTTP port");
8282       //<Connector port="8009" protocol="AJP/1.3" redirectPort="8443" />
8283       editFile(serverXmlFile, "port=\"([\\d]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"AJP/1.3\""}, null, Integer.toString(jkPort), "tomcat JK port");
8284       //<Server port="8005" shutdown="SHUTDOWN">
8285       editFile(serverXmlFile, "port=\"([\\d]+)\"", new String[]{"<Server", "shutdown=\"SHUTDOWN\""}, null, Integer.toString(shutdownPort), "tomcat shutdown port");
8286       break;
8287     }
8288 
8289     configureTomcatUriEncoding(serverXmlFile);
8290     
8291   }
8292   /**
8293    * @param serverXmlFile
8294    */
8295   public void configureTomcatUriEncoding(File serverXmlFile) {
8296     //set encoding for connectors
8297     //  /Server/Service/Connector <Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" 
8298     String uriEncodingHttp = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
8299         "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='HTTP/1.1']", "URIEncoding");
8300     
8301     // <Connector port="8009" protocol="AJP/1.3" redirectPort="8443" />
8302     String uriEncodingAjp = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
8303         "/Server/Service/Connector[@protocol='AJP/1.3']", "URIEncoding");
8304 
8305     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingAjp, "UTF-8") || !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingHttp, "UTF-8")) {
8306 
8307       boolean defaultSetUriEncoding = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.ui.setTomcatUriEncoding", true, false);
8308       System.out.print("Do you want to set URIEncoding to UTF-8 in tomcat server.xml <Connector> elements (t|f)? [" 
8309           + (defaultSetUriEncoding ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
8310       boolean assignUriEncoding = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultSetUriEncoding, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setUriEncodingToUtf8inServerXml");
8311 
8312       if (assignUriEncoding) {
8313         
8314         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingAjp, "UTF-8")) {
8315           editFile(serverXmlFile, "URIEncoding=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"AJP/1.3\""}, 
8316               new String[]{"SSLEnabled=\"true\""}, "UTF-8", "tomcat URIEncoding attribute for element <Connector AJP", true, "URIEncoding");
8317           
8318         }
8319         
8320         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(uriEncodingHttp, "UTF-8")) {
8321           editFile(serverXmlFile, "URIEncoding=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Connector", "protocol=\"HTTP/1.1\""}, 
8322               new String[]{"SSLEnabled=\"true\""}, "UTF-8", "tomcat URIEncoding attribute for element <Connector HTTP", true, "URIEncoding");
8323           
8324         }
8325       }
8326 
8327     }
8328   }
8329 
8330   /**
8331    * 
8332    * @param newEhcacheExampleFile
8333    * @param existingEhcacheExampleFile
8334    * @param existingEhcacheFile
8335    */
8336   public static void mergeEhcacheXmlFiles(File newEhcacheExampleFile, File existingEhcacheExampleFile, File existingEhcacheFile) {
8337     
8338     try {
8339       //lets get the differences of the existing ehcache file and the existing ehcache example file
8340       DocumentBuilderFactory domFactory = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlDocumentBuilderFactory();
8341       DocumentBuilder builder = domFactory.newDocumentBuilder();
8342       Document existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8343       Document existingEhcacheExampleDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheExampleFile);
8344 
8345       Element existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8346       Element existingExampleDocumentElement = existingEhcacheExampleDoc.getDocumentElement();
8347 
8348       Map<String, String> diskStoreDifferences = null;
8349       
8350       {
8351         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8352         Element existingExampleDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8353         diskStoreDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDiskStoreElement, existingDiskStoreElement);
8354       }
8355 
8356       Map<String, String> defaultCacheDifferences = null;
8357 
8358       {
8359         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8360         Element existingExampleDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8361         defaultCacheDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDefaultCacheElement, existingDefaultCacheElement);
8362         
8363       }
8364 
8365       XPath xpath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();
8366       
8367       //map of cache name to the differences in the attributes of the cache
8368       Map<String, Map<String, String>> cacheDifferencesByCacheName = new LinkedHashMap<String, Map<String, String>>();
8369       
8370       {
8371         NodeList existingCacheNodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("cache");
8372         
8373         //loop through all the caches
8374         for (int i=0;i<existingCacheNodeList.getLength(); i++) {
8375           
8376           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)existingCacheNodeList.item(i);
8377 
8378           String cacheName = existingCacheElement.getAttribute("name");
8379 
8380           //find the example cache
8381           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8382           Element existingExampleCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingExampleDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8383 
8384           //see if they differ
8385           Map<String, String> differences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleCacheElement, existingCacheElement);
8386           
8387           if (differences != null) {
8388             cacheDifferencesByCacheName.put(cacheName, differences);
8389           }
8390         }
8391         
8392         //note, dont worry if there were caches in the example that werent in the configured one
8393         
8394       }      
8395       
8396       //lets see if there are any other nodes
8397       Set<Element> otherNodes = new LinkedHashSet<Element>();
8398       {
8399         NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getChildNodes();
8400         
8401         for (int i=0;i<nodeList.getLength();i++) {
8402           Node node = nodeList.item(i);
8403           if (node instanceof Element) {
8404             Element nodeElement = (Element)node;
8405             String nodeName = nodeElement.getNodeName();
8406             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "cache")
8407                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "defaultCache")
8408                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "diskStore")) {
8409               otherNodes.add(nodeElement);
8410             }
8411           }
8412         }
8413       }
8414       
8415       //lets copy the new example to both the example and the configured ehcache file
8416       //assume this is already backed up
8417       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExampleFile, existingEhcacheExampleFile, true);
8418       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExampleFile, existingEhcacheFile, true);
8419 
8420       //now lets do our edits
8421       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8422         
8423         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8424 
8425           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8426 
8427           editXmlFileAttribute(existingEhcacheFile, "diskStore", null, attributeName, attributeValue, 
8428               "ehcache diskStore attribute '" + attributeName + "'");
8429           
8430         }
8431       }
8432       
8433       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8434         
8435         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8436           
8437           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8438 
8439           editXmlFileAttribute(existingEhcacheFile, "defaultCache", null, attributeName, attributeValue, 
8440               "ehcache defaultCache attribute '" + attributeName + "'");
8441 
8442         }
8443       }
8444 
8445       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
8446 
8447         existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8448         existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8449         
8450         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
8451 
8452           //see if the name exists
8453           //find the example cache
8454           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8455 
8456           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8457 
8458           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
8459 
8460           //it exists
8461           if (existingCacheElement != null) {
8462 
8463             Map<String, String> expectedAttribute = new HashMap<String, String>();
8464 
8465             expectedAttribute.put("name", cacheName);
8466             
8467             for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
8468 
8469               String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
8470 
8471               editXmlFileAttribute(existingEhcacheFile, "cache", expectedAttribute, attributeName, attributeValue, 
8472                   "ehcache cache name=" + cacheName + " attribute '" + attributeName + "'");
8473             }
8474           } else {
8475 
8476               String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingEhcacheFile);
8477 
8478               String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
8479 
8480               int lastTagStart = fileContents.lastIndexOf("</ehcache>");
8481               
8482               if (lastTagStart == -1) {
8483                 throw new RuntimeException("Why is </ehcache> not found???? " + fileContents);
8484               }
8485 
8486               String tag = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlElementToXml("cache", null, attributeMap);
8487 //              sdf
8488               String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, lastTagStart) + tag + newline 
8489                   + fileContents.substring(lastTagStart, fileContents.length());
8490 
8491               System.out.println(" - adding ehcache cache " + cacheName);
8492 
8493               GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingEhcacheFile, newFileContents);
8494 
8495           }
8496 
8497         }
8498       }
8499 
8500       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
8501         String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(existingEhcacheFile);
8502         
8503         String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
8504 
8505         StringBuilder otherNodesStringBuilder = new StringBuilder();
8506         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
8507           String elementString = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlToString(element);
8508           // take out the xml header: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
8509           
8510           int elementStart = elementString.indexOf("<" + element.getNodeName());
8511           
8512           elementString = elementString.substring(elementStart);
8513           
8514           otherNodesStringBuilder.append(elementString).append(newline);
8515           System.out.println(" - adding element " + element.getTagName());
8516         }
8517 
8518         int lastTagStart = fileContents.lastIndexOf("</ehcache>");
8519         
8520         if (lastTagStart == -1) {
8521           throw new RuntimeException("Why is </ehcache> not found???? " + fileContents);
8522         }
8523 
8524         String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, lastTagStart) + otherNodesStringBuilder.toString()
8525             + fileContents.substring(lastTagStart, fileContents.length());
8526 
8527         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingEhcacheFile, newFileContents);
8528 
8529       }
8530 
8531 
8532       // test the new file, look for things
8533       existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8534       existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8535 
8536       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8537         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8538         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8539           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8540           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDiskStoreElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8541             throw new RuntimeException("Why is diskStore attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8542                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8543           }
8544         }
8545       }
8546       
8547       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8548         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8549         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8550           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8551           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDefaultCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8552             throw new RuntimeException("Why is defaultCache attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8553                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8554           }
8555         }
8556       }
8557 
8558       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
8559         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
8560 
8561           //see if the name exists
8562           //find the example cache
8563           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8564           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8565 
8566           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
8567           
8568           for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
8569             
8570             String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
8571 
8572             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8573               throw new RuntimeException("Why is cache " + cacheName + " attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8574                   + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8575             }
8576             
8577           }
8578         }
8579       }
8580 
8581       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
8582         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
8583           
8584           NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName(element.getNodeName());
8585           if (nodeList == null || nodeList.getLength() == 0 ) {
8586             throw new RuntimeException("Why is new element not there? " + element.getTagName() + ", "
8587                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8588           }
8589         }
8590       }
8591 
8592     } catch (Exception e) {
8593       throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage(), e);
8594     }
8595   }
8596 
8597   /**
8598    * 
8599    * @param newEhcacheExampleFile
8600    * @param existingEhcacheExampleFile
8601    * @param existingEhcacheFile
8602    * @return hasMerging
8603    */
8604   @SuppressWarnings("unused")
8605   private static boolean mergeEhcacheXmlFiles_XML_NOT_USED(File newEhcacheExampleFile, File existingEhcacheExampleFile, 
8606       File existingEhcacheFile) {
8607     
8608     boolean hasMerging = false;
8609     
8610     try {
8611       //lets get the differences of the existing ehcache file and the existing ehcache example file
8612       DocumentBuilderFactory domFactory = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlDocumentBuilderFactory();
8613       DocumentBuilder builder = domFactory.newDocumentBuilder();
8614       Document existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8615       Document existingEhcacheExampleDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheExampleFile);
8616 
8617       Element existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8618       Element existingExampleDocumentElement = existingEhcacheExampleDoc.getDocumentElement();
8619 
8620       Map<String, String> diskStoreDifferences = null;
8621       
8622       {
8623         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8624         Element existingExampleDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8625         diskStoreDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDiskStoreElement, existingDiskStoreElement);
8626       }
8627 
8628       Map<String, String> defaultCacheDifferences = null;
8629 
8630       {
8631         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8632         Element existingExampleDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8633         defaultCacheDifferences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleDefaultCacheElement, existingDefaultCacheElement);
8634         
8635       }
8636 
8637       XPath xpath = XPathFactory.newInstance().newXPath();
8638       
8639       //map of cache name to the differences in the attributes of the cache
8640       Map<String, Map<String, String>> cacheDifferencesByCacheName = new LinkedHashMap<String, Map<String, String>>();
8641       
8642       {
8643         NodeList existingCacheNodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("cache");
8644         
8645         //loop through all the caches
8646         for (int i=0;i<existingCacheNodeList.getLength(); i++) {
8647           
8648           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)existingCacheNodeList.item(i);
8649 
8650           String cacheName = existingCacheElement.getAttribute("name");
8651 
8652           //find the example cache
8653           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8654           Element existingExampleCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingExampleDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8655 
8656           //see if they differ
8657           Map<String, String> differences = xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(existingExampleCacheElement, existingCacheElement);
8658           
8659           if (differences != null) {
8660             cacheDifferencesByCacheName.put(cacheName, differences);
8661           }
8662         }
8663         
8664         //note, dont worry if there were caches in the example that werent in the configured one
8665         
8666       }      
8667       
8668       //lets see if there are any other nodes
8669       Set<Element> otherNodes = new LinkedHashSet<Element>();
8670       {
8671         NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getChildNodes();
8672         
8673         for (int i=0;i<nodeList.getLength();i++) {
8674           Node node = nodeList.item(i);
8675           if (node instanceof Element) {
8676             Element nodeElement = (Element)node;
8677             String nodeName = nodeElement.getNodeName();
8678             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "cache")
8679                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "defaultCache")
8680                 && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(nodeName, "diskStore")) {
8681               otherNodes.add(nodeElement);
8682             }
8683           }
8684         }
8685       }
8686       
8687       //lets copy the new example to both the example and the configured ehcache file
8688       //assume this is already backed up
8689       GrouperInstallerUtils.copyFile(newEhcacheExampleFile, existingEhcacheExampleFile, true);
8690 
8691       //this is the new existing ehcache file
8692       existingEhcacheExampleDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheExampleFile);
8693       existingExampleDocumentElement = existingEhcacheExampleDoc.getDocumentElement();
8694 
8695       //now lets do our edits
8696       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8697         
8698         hasMerging = true;
8699 
8700         Element existingExampleDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8701 
8702         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8703 
8704           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8705 
8706           existingExampleDiskStoreElement.setAttribute(attributeName, attributeValue);
8707         }
8708       }
8709       
8710       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8711 
8712         hasMerging = true;
8713 
8714         Element existingExampleDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingExampleDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8715         
8716         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8717           
8718           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8719 
8720           existingExampleDefaultCacheElement.setAttribute(attributeName, attributeValue);
8721           
8722         }
8723       }
8724 
8725       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
8726         hasMerging = true;
8727         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
8728 
8729           //see if the name exists
8730           //find the example cache
8731           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8732           Element existingExampleCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingExampleDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8733 
8734           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
8735           
8736           //it exists
8737           if (existingExampleCacheElement != null) {
8738             
8739             for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
8740               
8741               String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
8742               existingExampleCacheElement.setAttribute(attributeName, attributeValue);
8743               
8744             }
8745           } else {
8746             
8747             Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8748             //move a cache from one document to another
8749             existingExampleDocumentElement.appendChild(existingCacheElement.cloneNode(true));
8750             
8751           }
8752           
8753         }
8754       }
8755 
8756       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
8757         hasMerging = true;
8758         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
8759           
8760           //move a cache from one document to another
8761           existingExampleDocumentElement.appendChild(element.cloneNode(true));
8762         }
8763       }
8764 
8765 //      System.out.println("Compare you old ehcache.xml with your new ehcache.xml file: " 
8766 //          + "\n  Old file: "
8767 //          + backedUpEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath()
8768 //          + "\n  New file: " + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8769 
8770       // save to file
8771       String xml = GrouperInstallerUtils.xmlToString(existingEhcacheExampleDoc);
8772       GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(existingEhcacheFile, xml);
8773       
8774       // test the new file, look for things
8775       existingEhcacheDoc = builder.parse(existingEhcacheFile);
8776       existingDocumentElement = existingEhcacheDoc.getDocumentElement();
8777 
8778       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(diskStoreDifferences) > 0) {
8779         Element existingDiskStoreElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("diskStore").item(0);
8780         for (String attributeName : diskStoreDifferences.keySet()) {
8781           String attributeValue = diskStoreDifferences.get(attributeName);
8782           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDiskStoreElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8783             throw new RuntimeException("Why is diskStore attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8784                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8785           }
8786         }
8787       }
8788       
8789       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(defaultCacheDifferences) > 0) {
8790         Element existingDefaultCacheElement = (Element)existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName("defaultCache").item(0);
8791         for (String attributeName : defaultCacheDifferences.keySet()) {
8792           String attributeValue = defaultCacheDifferences.get(attributeName);
8793           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingDefaultCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8794             throw new RuntimeException("Why is defaultCache attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8795                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8796           }
8797         }
8798       }
8799 
8800       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(cacheDifferencesByCacheName) > 0) {
8801         for (String cacheName : cacheDifferencesByCacheName.keySet()) {
8802 
8803           //see if the name exists
8804           //find the example cache
8805           XPathExpression expr = xpath.compile("cache[@name='" + cacheName + "']");
8806           Element existingCacheElement = (Element)expr.evaluate(existingDocumentElement, XPathConstants.NODE);
8807 
8808           Map<String, String> attributeMap = cacheDifferencesByCacheName.get(cacheName);
8809           
8810           for (String attributeName : attributeMap.keySet()) {
8811             
8812             String attributeValue = attributeMap.get(attributeName);
8813 
8814             if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(attributeValue, existingCacheElement.getAttribute(attributeName))) {
8815               throw new RuntimeException("Why is cache " + cacheName + " attribute " + attributeName + " not '" + attributeValue + "'" 
8816                   + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8817             }
8818             
8819           }
8820         }
8821       }
8822 
8823       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(otherNodes) > 0) {
8824         for (Element element : otherNodes) {
8825           
8826           NodeList nodeList = existingDocumentElement.getElementsByTagName(element.getNodeName());
8827           if (nodeList == null || nodeList.getLength() == 0 ) {
8828             throw new RuntimeException("Why is new element not there? " + element.getTagName() 
8829                 + existingEhcacheFile.getAbsolutePath());
8830           }
8831         }
8832       }
8833 
8834     } catch (Exception e) {
8835       throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage(), e);
8836     }
8837     return hasMerging;
8838   }
8839   /**
8840    * 
8841    * @param baseElement
8842    * @param configuredElement
8843    * @return the map of differences
8844    */
8845   public static Map<String, String> xmlNodeAttributeDifferences(Element baseElement, Element configuredElement) {
8846     NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = configuredElement.getAttributes();
8847     
8848     Map<String, String> result = null;
8849     
8850     //see which attributes are new or changed
8851     for (int i=0;i<configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength();i++) {
8852       Node configuredAttribute = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(i);
8853       Node baseAttribute = baseElement == null ? null : baseElement.getAttributeNode(configuredAttribute.getNodeName());
8854 
8855       String configuredValue = configuredAttribute.getNodeValue();
8856       String baseValue = baseAttribute == null ? null : baseAttribute.getNodeValue();
8857       
8858       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(configuredValue, baseValue)) {
8859         if (result == null) {
8860           result = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
8861         }
8862         result.put(configuredAttribute.getNodeName(), configuredValue);
8863       }
8864     }
8865     
8866     //see which ones are missing
8867     NamedNodeMap baseNamedNodeMap = baseElement == null ? null : baseElement.getAttributes();
8868     
8869     //see which attributes are new or changed
8870     for (int i=0;i<(baseNamedNodeMap == null ? 0 : baseNamedNodeMap.getLength());i++) {
8871       
8872       Node baseAttribute = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(0);
8873       Node configuredAttribute = configuredElement.getAttributeNode(baseAttribute.getNodeName());
8874 
8875       String baseValue = baseAttribute.getNodeValue();
8876       String configuredValue = configuredAttribute == null ? null : configuredAttribute.getNodeValue();
8877       
8878       if (configuredValue == null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(configuredValue, baseValue)) {
8879         if (result == null) {
8880           result = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
8881         }
8882         result.put(baseAttribute.getNodeName(), configuredValue);
8883       }
8884     }
8885     
8886     return result;
8887   }
8888   
8889   /**
8890    * 
8891    * @return the file of the directory of API
8892    */
8893   private File downloadApi() {
8894     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
8895     
8896     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
8897       urlToDownload += "/";
8898     }
8899     urlToDownload += "release/";
8900     String apiFileName = "grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
8901     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + apiFileName;
8902 
8903     File apiFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + apiFileName);
8904     
8905     downloadFile(urlToDownload, apiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
8906 
8907     return apiFile;
8908   }
8909 
8910   /**
8911    * 
8912    * @return the file of the directory of UI
8913    */
8914   private File downloadUi() {
8915     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
8916     
8917     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
8918       urlToDownload += "/";
8919     }
8920     urlToDownload += "release/";
8921 
8922     String uiFileName = "grouper.ui-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
8923     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + uiFileName;
8924 
8925     File uiFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + uiFileName);
8926     
8927     downloadFile(urlToDownload, uiFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalUiDownloadTarEtc");
8928 
8929     return uiFile;
8930   }
8931 
8932   /**
8933    * 
8934    * @return the file of the directory of WS
8935    */
8936   private File downloadWs() {
8937     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
8938     
8939     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
8940       urlToDownload += "/";
8941     }
8942     urlToDownload += "release/";
8943 
8944     String wsFileName = "grouper.ws-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
8945     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + wsFileName;
8946 
8947     File wsFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + wsFileName);
8948     
8949     downloadFile(urlToDownload, wsFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalWsDownloadTarEtc");
8950 
8951     return wsFile;
8952   }

8954   /**
8955    * 
8956    * @return the file of the directory of ant
8957    */
8958   private File downloadAnt() {
8959     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
8960     
8961     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
8962       urlToDownload += "/";
8963     }
8964 
8965     urlToDownload += "downloads/tools/apache-ant-1.8.2-bin.tar.gz";
8966     
8967     File antFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "apache-ant-1.8.2-bin.tar.gz");
8968     
8969     downloadFile(urlToDownload, antFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
8970 
8971     return antFile;
8972   }
