8975    * 
8976    * @return the file of the directory of maven
8977    */
8978   private File downloadMaven() {
8979     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
8980     
8981     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
8982       urlToDownload += "/";
8983     }
8984 
8985     urlToDownload += "downloads/tools/apache-maven-3.2.5-bin.tar.gz";
8986     
8987     File mavenFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "apache-maven-3.2.5-bin.tar.gz");
8988     
8989     downloadFile(urlToDownload, mavenFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
8990 
8991     return mavenFile;
8992   }

8994   /**
8995    * 
8996    * @return the file of the directory of tomcat
8997    */
8998   private File downloadTomcat() {
8999     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9000     
9001     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9002       urlToDownload += "/";
9003     }
9004 
9005     urlToDownload += "downloads/tools/apache-tomcat-6.0.35.tar.gz";
9006     
9007     File tomcatFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + "apache-tomcat-6.0.35.tar.gz");
9008     
9009     downloadFile(urlToDownload, tomcatFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalToolsDownloadTarEtc");
9010 
9011     return tomcatFile;
9012   }
9013 
9014   /**
9015    * add quick start subjects
9016    */
9017   private void addQuickstartSubjects() {
9018     
9019     System.out.print("Do you want to add quickstart subjects to DB (t|f)? [t]: ");
9020     boolean addQuickstartSubjects = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.addQuickstartSubjectsToDb");
9021     
9022     if (addQuickstartSubjects) {
9023 
9024       String url = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9025       
9026       if (!url.endsWith("/")) {
9027         url += "/";
9028       }
9029       url += "release/" + this.version + "/subjects.sql";
9030 
9031       String subjectsSqlFileName = this.untarredApiDir.getParent() + File.separator + "subjects.sql";
9032       File subjectsSqlFile = new File(subjectsSqlFileName);
9033       downloadFile(url, subjectsSqlFileName, "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
9034 
9035       List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9036       
9037       addGshCommands(commands);
9038       commands.add("-registry");
9039       commands.add("-runsqlfile");
9040       commands.add(subjectsSqlFile.getAbsolutePath());
9041       commands.add("-noprompt");
9042       
9043       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9044       System.out.println("Adding sample subjects with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9045       
9046       CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9047           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9048           this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9049       
9050       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9051         System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9052       }
9053       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9054         System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9055       }
9056       
9057       System.out.println("\nEnd adding sample subjects");
9058       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9059 
9060     }
9061   }
9062 
9063   /**
9064    * add quick start subjects
9065    */
9066   private void addQuickstartData() {
9067 
9068     System.out.print("Do you want to add quickstart data to registry (t|f)? [t] ");
9069     boolean addQuickstartData = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.addQuickstartData");
9070 
9071     if (addQuickstartData) {
9072       String url = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9073       
9074       if (!url.endsWith("/")) {
9075         url += "/";
9076       }
9077       url += "release/" + this.version + "/quickstart.xml";
9078       String quickstartFileName = this.untarredApiDir.getParent() + File.separator + "quickstart.xml";
9079       
9080       File quickstartFile = new File(quickstartFileName);
9081       downloadFile(url, quickstartFileName, "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalApiDownloadTarEtc");
9082 
9083       List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9084       
9085       addGshCommands(commands);
9086       commands.add("-xmlimportold");
9087       commands.add("GrouperSystem");
9088       commands.add(quickstartFile.getAbsolutePath());
9089       commands.add("-noprompt");
9090       
9091       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9092       System.out.println("Adding quickstart data with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9093       
9094       CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9095           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9096           this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9097       
9098       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9099         System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9100       }
9101       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9102 
9103         System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9104       }
9105       System.out.println("\nEnd adding quickstart data");
9106       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9107 
9108     }
9109   }
9110   
9111   /**
9112    * if commands have spaces, put quotes around...
9113    * @param commands
9114    * @return the command
9115    */
9116   private static String convertCommandsIntoCommand(List<String> commands) {
9117     StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();
9118     for (int i=0;i<GrouperInstallerUtils.length(commands); i++) {
9119       String command = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(commands.get(i));
9120       
9121       //if there is a space, put quotes around command
9122       if (command.contains(" ")) {
9123         result.append("\"").append(command).append("\"");
9124       } else {
9125         result.append(command);
9126       }
9127       if (i != GrouperInstallerUtils.length(commands)-1) {
9128         result.append(" ");
9129       }
9130     }
9131     return result.toString();
9132   }
9133   
9134   /**
9135    * 
9136    */
9137   private void initDb() {
9138     System.out.print("Do you want to init the database (delete all existing grouper tables, add new ones) (t|f)? ");
9139     boolean initdb = readFromStdInBoolean(null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.deleteAndInitDatabase");
9140     
9141     if (initdb) {
9142       List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9143       
9144       addGshCommands(commands);
9145       commands.add("-registry");
9146       commands.add("-drop");
9147       commands.add("-runscript");
9148       commands.add("-noprompt");
9149       
9150       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9151       System.out.println("Initting DB with command: " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9152       
9153       CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9154           GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9155           this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9156       
9157       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9158         System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9159       }
9160       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9161 
9162         System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9163       }
9164       System.out.println("\nEnd Initting DB");
9165       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9166       
9167       
9168     }
9169 
9170   }
9171   
9172   /**
9173    * 
9174    */
9175   private void startLoader() {
9176     System.out.print("Do you want to start the Grouper loader (daemons)?\n  (note, if it is already running, you need to stop it now, check " 
9177         + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows() ? "the task manager for java.exe" : "ps -ef | grep gsh | grep loader") + ") (t|f)? [f]: ");
9178     boolean startLoader = readFromStdInBoolean(false, "grouperInstaller.autorun.startGrouperDaemons");
9179     
9180     if (startLoader) {
9181       final List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9182       
9183       addGshCommands(commands);
9184       commands.add("-loader");
9185 
9186       System.out.println("\n##################################");
9187       System.out.println("Starting the Grouper loader (daemons): " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9188 
9189       //start in new thread
9190       Thread thread = new Thread(new Runnable() {
9191         
9192         @Override
9193         public void run() {
9194           GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
9195               true, true, null, GrouperInstaller.this.untarredApiDir, 
9196               GrouperInstaller.this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "grouperLoader", false);
9197         }
9198       });
9199       thread.setDaemon(true);
9200       thread.start();
9201       
9202       System.out.println("\nEnd starting the Grouper loader (daemons)");
9203       System.out.println("##################################\n");
9204       
9205     }
9206 
9207   }
9208 
9209   /**
9210    * gsh command fully qualified
9211    */
9212   private String gshCommand;
9213   
9214   /**
9215    * 
9216    * @return the gsh command
9217    */
9218   private String gshCommand() {
9219 
9220     if (this.gshCommand == null) {
9221 
9222       String gshDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString, 
9223           this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator);
9224       
9225       String gsh = gshDir + "bin" + File.separator 
9226           + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows() ? "gsh.bat" : "gsh.sh");
9227       
9228       if (new File(gsh).exists()) {
9229         this.gshCommand = gsh;
9230         return gsh;
9231       }
9232 
9233       gsh = gshDir + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator 
9234           + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isWindows() ? "gsh.bat" : "gsh.sh");
9235 
9236       if (new File(gsh).exists()) {
9237         this.gshCommand = gsh;
9238         return gsh;
9239       }
9240       
9241       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find gsh: " + gshDir);
9242     }
9243 
9244     return this.gshCommand;
9245   }
9246 
9247   /**
9248    * 
9249    */
9250   private void checkDatabaseConnection() {
9251     System.out.println("Checking database with query: " + this.giDbUtils.checkConnectionQuery());
9252     Exception exception = this.giDbUtils.checkConnection();
9253     if (exception == null) {
9254       System.out.println("Successfully tested database connection");
9255     } else {
9256       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.getFullStackTrace(exception).contains(ClassNotFoundException.class.getName())) {
9257         System.out.println("Cannot check connection since driver is not in classpath of installer, this is fine but not sure if connection details work or not");
9258       } else {
9259         System.out.println("Error: could not connect to the database: ");
9260         exception.printStackTrace();
9261       }
9262     }
9263   }
9264 
9265   /**
9266    * get hsql port
9267    * @return port
9268    */
9269   private int hsqlPort() {
9270     //get right port
9271     int port = 9001;
9272     
9273     //match this, get the port: jdbc:hsqldb:hsql://localhost:9001/grouper
9274     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("jdbc:hsqldb:.*:(\\d+)/.*");
9275     Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(this.dbUrl);
9276     if (matcher.matches()) {
9277       port = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(1));
9278     }
9279     return port;
9280   }
9281   
9282   /**
9283    * 
9284    */
9285   private void startHsqlDb() {
9286     System.out.print("Do you want this script to start the hsqldb database (note, it must not be running in able to start) (t|f)? [t]: ");
9287     boolean startdb = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.startHsqlDatabase");
9288     if (startdb) {
9289       
9290       shutdownHsql();
9291 
9292       //get right port
9293       int port = hsqlPort();
9294       
9295       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.portAvailable(port, this.defaultIpAddress)) {
9296         System.out.println("This port does not seem available, even after trying to stop the DB! " + port + "...");
9297         if (!shouldContinue("grouperInstaller.autorun.continueAfterPortNotAvailable")) {
9298           throw new RuntimeException("This port is not available, even after trying to stop the DB! " + port);
9299         }
9300       }
9301       
9302       final List<String> command = new ArrayList<String>();
9303 
9304       command.add(GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand());
9305       command.add("-cp");
9306       command.add(this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator 
9307           + "hsqldb.jar");
9308       //-cp lib\jdbcSamples\hsqldb.jar org.hsqldb.Server -database.0 file:grouper -dbname.0 grouper -port 9001
9309       command.addAll(GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList("org.hsqldb.Server -database.0 file:" 
9310           + this.untarredApiDir + File.separator + "grouper -dbname.0 grouper -port " + port, " "));
9311 
9312 //        System.out.println("Starting DB with command: java -cp grouper.apiBinary-" + this.version + File.separator 
9313 //            + "lib" + File.separator + "jdbcSamples" + File.separator 
9314 //            + "hsqldb.jar org.hsqldb.Server -database.0 file:grouper -dbname.0 grouper");
9315 
9316       System.out.println("Starting DB with command: " + GrouperInstallerUtils.join(command.iterator(), " "));
9317 
9318       //start in new thread
9319       Thread thread = new Thread(new Runnable() {
9320         
9321         @Override
9322         public void run() {
9323           GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(command, String.class),
9324               true, true, null, null, 
9325               GrouperInstaller.this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "hsqlDb", false, false);
9326         }
9327       });
9328       thread.setDaemon(true);
9329       thread.start();
9330       
9331     }
9332     
9333     //lets sleep for a bit to let it start
9334     GrouperInstallerUtils.sleep(2000);
9335     
9336   }
9337 
9338   /** gi db utils */
9339   private GiDbUtils giDbUtils = null;
9340   
9341   /**
9342    * 
9343    */
9344   private void shutdownHsql() {
9345     
9346     try {
9347       this.giDbUtils.executeUpdate("SHUTDOWN", null, false);
9348       System.out.println("Shutting down HSQL before starting it by sending the SQL: SHUTDOWN");
9349     } catch (Exception e) {
9350       //e.printStackTrace();
9351       System.out.println("HSQL was not detected to be running (did not successfully stop it)");
9352     }
9353   }
9354 
9355   /**
9356    * 
9357    */
9358   private void configureTomcatUiWebapp() {
9359     
9360     File serverXmlFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() 
9361         + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
9362     
9363     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.ui-2.0.2\dist\grouper
9364     //
9365     //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9366     //Server
9367     //Service
9368     //Engine
9369     //Host
9370 
9371     System.out.print("Enter the URL path for the UI [grouper]: ");
9372     this.tomcatUiPath = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.urlPathForUi");
9373     
9374     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.tomcatUiPath)) {
9375       this.tomcatUiPath = "grouper";
9376     }
9377 
9378     if (this.tomcatUiPath.endsWith("/") || this.tomcatUiPath.endsWith("\\")) {
9379       this.tomcatUiPath = this.tomcatUiPath.substring(0, this.tomcatUiPath.length()-1);
9380     }
9381     if (this.tomcatUiPath.startsWith("/") || this.tomcatUiPath.startsWith("\\")) {
9382       this.tomcatUiPath = this.tomcatUiPath.substring(1, this.tomcatUiPath.length());
9383     }
9384     
9385     String currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9386         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "']", "docBase");
9387 
9388     String shouldBeDocBase = grouperUiBuildToDirName();
9389 
9390     System.out.println("Editing tomcat config file: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
9391     
9392     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(currentDocBase)) {
9393 
9394       //need to add it
9395       //<Host appBase="webapps" autoDeploy="true" name="localhost" unpackWARs="true" xmlNamespaceAware="false" xmlValidation="false">
9396       //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9397       addToXmlFile(serverXmlFile, ">", new String[]{"<Host "}, 
9398           "<Context docBase=\"" + shouldBeDocBase + "\" path=\"/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>", "tomcat context for UI");
9399 
9400     } else {
9401 
9402       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9403         
9404         //lets edit the file
9405         //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9406         editFile(serverXmlFile, "docBase=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Context", "path=\"/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "\""}, 
9407             null, shouldBeDocBase, "tomcat context for UI");
9408 
9409       } else {
9410         
9411         System.out.println("  - Context is already set for Grouper UI");
9412         
9413       }
9414       
9415       
9416     }
9417     
9418     currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9419         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatUiPath + "']", "docBase");
9420     
9421     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9422       System.out.println("Tried to edit server.xml but it didnt work, should have context of: '" 
9423           + shouldBeDocBase + "', but was: '" + currentDocBase + "'");
9424     }
9425     
9426   }
9427 
9428   /**
9429    * 
9430    * @return grouper ui build to name
9431    */
9432   private String grouperUiBuildToDirName() {
9433     return this.untarredUiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper";
9434   }
9435 
9436   /**
9437    * @param isInstallNotUpgrade
9438    */
9439   private void buildWs(boolean isInstallNotUpgrade) {
9440     
9441     File grouperWsBuildToDir = new File(this.grouperWsBuildToDirName());
9442     
9443     if (grouperWsBuildToDir.exists()) {
9444 
9445       boolean rebuildWs = true;
9446       
9447       boolean defaultRebuild = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.ws.rebuildIfBuilt", true, false);
9448       System.out.print("The Grouper WS has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [" 
9449           + (defaultRebuild ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
9450       rebuildWs = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultRebuild, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildWsIfBuiltAlready");
9451   
9452       if (!rebuildWs) {
9453         return;
9454       }
9455     }
9456     
9457     if (isInstallNotUpgrade) {
9458       //stop tomcat
9459       try {
9460         tomcatBounce("stop");
9461       } catch (Throwable e) {
9462         System.out.println("Couldnt stop tomcat, ignoring...");
9463       }
9464     }
9465     
9466     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9467     
9468     addAntCommands(commands);
9469     commands.add("dist");
9470     
9471     System.out.println("\n##################################");
9472     System.out.println("Building WS with command:\n" + this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + "> " 
9473         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9474     
9475     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
9476         true, true, null, new File(this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws"), null, true);
9477     
9478     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9479       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9480     }
9481     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9482       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9483     }
9484 
9485     if (isInstallNotUpgrade) {
9486       System.out.print("Do you want to set the log dir of WS (t|f)? [t]: ");
9487       boolean setLogDir = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.setWsLogDir");
9488       
9489       if (setLogDir) {
9490         
9491         ////set the log dir
9492         //C:\apps\grouperInstallerTest\grouper.ws-2.0.2\grouper-ws\build\dist\grouper-ws\WEB-INF\classes\log4j.properties
9493         //
9494         //${grouper.home}logs
9495   
9496         String defaultLogDir = this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "logs" + File.separator + "grouperWs";
9497         System.out.print("Enter the WS log dir: [" + defaultLogDir + "]: ");
9498         String logDir = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.wsLogDir");
9499         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(logDir, defaultLogDir);
9500         
9501         //lets replace \\ with /
9502         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logDir, "\\\\", "/");
9503         //lets replace \ with /
9504         logDir = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(logDir, "\\", "/");
9505   
9506         File log4jFile = new File(grouperWsBuildToDirName() + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes"
9507             + File.separator + "log4j.properties");
9508         
9509         System.out.println("Editing file: " + log4jFile.getAbsolutePath());
9510         
9511         editFile(log4jFile, "log4j\\.\\S+\\.File\\s*=\\s*([^\\s]+logs)/grouper_[^\\s]+\\.log", null, 
9512             null, logDir, "WS log directory");
9513         
9514         File logDirFile = new File(defaultLogDir);
9515         if (!logDirFile.exists()) {
9516           System.out.println("Creating log directory: " + logDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
9517           GrouperInstallerUtils.mkdirs(logDirFile);
9518         }
9519         //test log dir
9520         File testLogDirFile = new File(logDirFile.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "testFile" + GrouperInstallerUtils.uniqueId() + ".txt");
9521         GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(testLogDirFile, "test");
9522         if (!testLogDirFile.delete()) {
9523           throw new RuntimeException("Cant delete file: " +  testLogDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
9524         }
9525         System.out.println("Created and deleted a test file successfully in dir: " + logDirFile.getAbsolutePath());
9526       }
9527     }
9528     
9529     System.out.println("\nEnd building Ws");
9530     System.out.println("##################################\n");
9531   
9532     
9533   }
9534 
9535   /**
9536    * 
9537    */
9538   private void configureTomcatWsWebapp() {
9539     
9540     File serverXmlFile = new File(this.untarredTomcatDir.getAbsolutePath() 
9541         + File.separator + "conf" + File.separator + "server.xml");
9542     
9543     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.ui-2.0.2\dist\grouper
9544     //
9545     //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9546     //Server
9547     //Service
9548     //Engine
9549     //Host
9550   
9551     System.out.print("Enter the URL path for the WS [grouper-ws]: ");
9552     this.tomcatWsPath = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.wsUrlPath");
9553     
9554     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.tomcatWsPath)) {
9555       this.tomcatWsPath = "grouper-ws";
9556     }
9557   
9558     if (this.tomcatWsPath.endsWith("/") || this.tomcatWsPath.endsWith("\\")) {
9559       this.tomcatWsPath = this.tomcatWsPath.substring(0, this.tomcatWsPath.length()-1);
9560     }
9561     if (this.tomcatWsPath.startsWith("/") || this.tomcatWsPath.startsWith("\\")) {
9562       this.tomcatWsPath = this.tomcatWsPath.substring(1);
9563     }
9564     
9565     String currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9566         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "']", "docBase");
9567   
9568     //grouper.ws-2.0.2\grouper-ws\build\dist\grouper-ws
9569     
9570     String shouldBeDocBase = grouperWsBuildToDirName();
9571   
9572     System.out.println("Editing tomcat config file: " + serverXmlFile.getAbsolutePath());
9573     
9574     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(currentDocBase)) {
9575   
9576       //need to add it
9577       //<Host appBase="webapps" autoDeploy="true" name="localhost" unpackWARs="true" xmlNamespaceAware="false" xmlValidation="false">
9578       //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9579       addToXmlFile(serverXmlFile, ">", new String[]{"<Host "}, 
9580           "<Context docBase=\"" + shouldBeDocBase + "\" path=\"/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "\" reloadable=\"false\"/>", "tomcat context for WS");
9581   
9582     } else {
9583   
9584       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9585         
9586         //lets edit the file
9587         //<Context docBase="C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-ws_trunk\webapp" path="/grouper-ws" reloadable="false"/>
9588         editFile(serverXmlFile, "docBase=\"([^\"]+)\"", new String[]{"<Context", "path=\"/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "\""}, 
9589             null, shouldBeDocBase, "tomcat context for WS");
9590   
9591       } else {
9592         
9593         System.out.println("  - Context is already set for Grouper WS");
9594         
9595       }
9596       
9597       
9598     }
9599     
9600     currentDocBase = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluateAttribute(serverXmlFile, 
9601         "Server/Service/Engine/Host/Context[@path='/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "']", "docBase");
9602     
9603     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentDocBase, shouldBeDocBase)) {
9604       System.out.println("Tried to edit server.xml but it didnt work, should have context of: '" 
9605           + shouldBeDocBase + "', but was: '" + currentDocBase + "'");
9606     }
9607     
9608   }
9609 
9610   /**
9611    * @return grouper ws build to dir name
9612    */
9613   private String grouperWsBuildToDirName() {
9614     return this.untarredWsDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator 
9615       + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws";
9616   }
9617 
9618   /**
9619      * 
9620      */
9621     private void configureClient() {
9622       //properties file
9623       File localGrouperClientPropertiesFile = new File(this.untarredClientDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator 
9624           + "grouper.client.properties");
9625       
9626       //set the grouper property
9627       System.out.println("Editing " + localGrouperClientPropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + ": ");
9628       editPropertiesFile(localGrouperClientPropertiesFile, "grouperClient.webService.url", "http://localhost:" 
9629           + this.tomcatHttpPort + "/" + this.tomcatWsPath + "/servicesRest", false);
9630       editPropertiesFile(localGrouperClientPropertiesFile, "grouperClient.webService.login", "GrouperSystem", false);
9631       editPropertiesFile(localGrouperClientPropertiesFile, "grouperClient.webService.password", this.grouperSystemPassword, false);
9632       
9633       
9634 //      grouperClient.webService.url = http://localhost:8200/grouper-ws/servicesRest
9635 //
9636 //      # kerberos principal used to connect to web service
9637 //      grouperClient.webService.login = GrouperSystem
9638 //
9639 //      # password for shared secret authentication to web service
9640 //      # or you can put a filename with an encrypted password
9641 //      grouperClient.webService.password = myNewPass
9642 
9643       
9644     }
9645 
9646   /**
9647    * 
9648    * @return the file of the directory of WS
9649    */
9650   private File downloadClient() {
9651     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
9652     
9653     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
9654       urlToDownload += "/";
9655     }
9656     urlToDownload += "release/";
9657   
9658     String clientFileName = "grouper.clientBinary-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
9659     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + clientFileName;
9660   
9661     File clientFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + clientFileName);
9662     
9663     downloadFile(urlToDownload, clientFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalClientDownloadTarEtc");
9664 
9665     return clientFile;
9666   }
9667 
9668   /**
9669    * 
9670    */
9671   private void addGrouperSystemWsGroup() {
9672 
9673     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper-installer\grouper.apiBinary-2.0.2\bin>gsh -runarg "grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\nwsGroup = new GroupSave(grouperSession).assignName(\"etc:webServiceClientUsers\").assignCreateParentStemsIfNotExist(true).save();\nwsGroup.addMember(SubjectFinder.findRootSubject(), false);"
9674 
9675     //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
9676     //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
9677     StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
9678     gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
9679     gshCommands.append("wsGroup = new GroupSave(grouperSession).assignName(\"etc:webServiceClientUsers\").assignCreateParentStemsIfNotExist(true).save();\n");
9680     gshCommands.append("wsGroup.addMember(SubjectFinder.findRootSubject(), false);\n");
9681     
9682     File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshAddGrouperSystemWsGroup.gsh");
9683     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
9684     
9685     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9686 
9687     addGshCommands(commands);
9688     commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
9689 
9690     System.out.println("\n##################################");
9691     System.out.println("Adding user GrouperSystem to grouper-ws users group with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9692 
9693     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9694         GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9695         this.untarredApiDir, null, true);
9696 
9697     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9698       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9699     }
9700     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9701       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9702     }
9703 
9704 
9705   }
9706 
9707   /**
9708    * 
9709    */
9710   private void runChangeLogTempToChangeLog() {
9711 
9712     boolean defaultBoolean = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.default.api.runChangeLogToChangeLogTemp", true, false);
9713     System.out.print("Is it ok to run a script that copies change log temp records to the change log (recommended) (t|f)? [" 
9714         + (defaultBoolean ? "t" : "f") + "]: ");
9715     boolean runScript = readFromStdInBoolean(defaultBoolean, "grouperInstaller.autorun.runChangeLogTempToChangeLog");
9716 
9717     
9718     if (!runScript) {
9719       return;
9720     }
9721     
9722     //running with command on command line doenst work on linux since the args with whitespace translate to 
9723     //save the commands to a file, and runt he file
9724     StringBuilder gshCommands = new StringBuilder();
9725     gshCommands.append("grouperSession = GrouperSession.startRootSession();\n");
9726     gshCommands.append("loaderRunOneJob(\"CHANGE_LOG_changeLogTempToChangeLog\");\n");
9727     
9728     File gshFile = new File(this.untarredApiDir.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "gshChangeLogTempToChangeLog.gsh");
9729     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(gshFile, gshCommands.toString());
9730     
9731     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
9732 
9733     addGshCommands(commands);
9734     commands.add(gshFile.getAbsolutePath());
9735 
9736     System.out.println("\n##################################");
9737     System.out.println("Copying records from change log temp to change log with command:\n  " + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
9738 
9739     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
9740         GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class), true, true, null, 
9741        new File(this.gshCommand()).getParentFile(), null, true);
9742 
9743     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9744       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9745     }
9746     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9747       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9748     }
9749 
9750 
9751   }
9752 
9753   /**
9754    * 
9755    */
9756   private void runClientCommand() {
9757     System.out.println("##################################");
9758     System.out.println("Running client command:");
9759     System.out.println(this.untarredClientDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " + GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand() 
9760         + " -jar grouperClient.jar --operation=getMembersWs --groupNames=etc:webServiceClientUsers");
9761     
9762     final List<String> command = new ArrayList<String>();
9763 
9764     command.add(GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand());
9765     command.add("-jar");
9766     command.addAll(GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrimToList(
9767         "grouperClient.jar --operation=getMembersWs --groupNames=etc:webServiceClientUsers", " "));
9768             
9769     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(command, String.class), 
9770         true, true, null, this.untarredClientDir, null, true);
9771 
9772     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
9773       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
9774     }
9775     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
9776       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
9777     }
9778     System.out.println("Success running client command:");
9779     System.out.println("##################################");
9780 
9781   }
9782 
9783   /**
9784    * edit a property in a property file
9785    * @param file
9786    * @param valueRegex 
9787    * @param lineMustHaveRegexes 
9788    * @param lineCantHaveRegexes 
9789    * @param newValue 
9790    * @param description of change for sys out print
9791    * @return true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
9792    */
9793   public static Boolean editFile(File file, String valueRegex, String[] lineMustHaveRegexes, 
9794       String[] lineCantHaveRegexes, String newValue, String description) {
9795     return editFile(file, valueRegex, lineMustHaveRegexes, lineCantHaveRegexes, newValue, description, false, null);
9796   }
9797 
9798   /**
9799    * edit a property in a property file
9800    * @param file
9801    * @param valueRegex 
9802    * @param lineMustHaveRegexes 
9803    * @param lineCantHaveRegexes 
9804    * @param newValue 
9805    * @param description of change for sys out print
9806    * @param addAttributeIfNotExists if attribute isnt there, then if true, then add the attribute
9807    * @param newAttributeName if adding new attribute, this is the name
9808    * @return true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
9809    */
9810   public static Boolean editFile(File file, String valueRegex, String[] lineMustHaveRegexes, 
9811       String[] lineCantHaveRegexes, String newValue, String description, boolean addAttributeIfNotExists, String newAttributeName) {
9812     
9813     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(newAttributeName) != addAttributeIfNotExists) {
9814       throw new RuntimeException("newAttributeName cant be null if addAttributeIfNotExists, and must be null if not addAttributeIfNotExists");
9815     }
9816     
9817     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
9818       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
9819           + file.getAbsolutePath());
9820     }
9821     
9822     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
9823     
9824     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
9825     
9826     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
9827     
9828     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(valueRegex);
9829     
9830     Pattern[] lineMustHavePatterns = new Pattern[GrouperInstallerUtils.length(lineMustHaveRegexes)];
9831     
9832     {
9833       int index = 0;
9834       for (String lineMustHaveRegex : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(lineMustHaveRegexes, String.class)) {
9835         Pattern lineMustHavePattern = Pattern.compile(lineMustHaveRegex);
9836         lineMustHavePatterns[index] = lineMustHavePattern;
9837         
9838         index++;
9839       }
9840     }    
9841   
9842     Pattern[] lineCantHavePatterns = new Pattern[GrouperInstallerUtils.length(lineCantHaveRegexes)];
9843     
9844     {
9845       int index = 0;
9846       for (String lineCantHaveRegex : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(lineCantHaveRegexes, String.class)) {
9847         Pattern lineCantHavePattern = Pattern.compile(lineCantHaveRegex);
9848         lineCantHavePatterns[index] = lineCantHavePattern;
9849         
9850         index++;
9851       }
9852     }    
9853   
9854     StringBuilder newfile = new StringBuilder();
9855     
9856     boolean madeChange = false;
9857     boolean noChangeNeeded = false;
9858     
9859     OUTER: for (String line : lines) {
9860       line = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(line);
9861       
9862       //lets see if it satisfies all
9863       for (Pattern lineMustHavePattern : lineMustHavePatterns) {
9864         if (!lineMustHavePattern.matcher(line).find()) {
9865           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
9866           continue OUTER;
9867         }
9868       }
9869       
9870       //lets see if it doesnt have these
9871       for (Pattern lineCantHavePattern : lineCantHavePatterns) {
9872         if (lineCantHavePattern.matcher(line).find()) {
9873           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
9874           continue OUTER;
9875         }
9876       }
9877       
9878       //see if satisfies current
9879       Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
9880       if (!matcher.find()) {
9881         
9882         if (addAttributeIfNotExists) {
9883           
9884           System.out.println(" - adding " + description + " with value: '" + newValue + "'");
9885           
9886           line = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimEnd(line);
9887           
9888           boolean endsWithCloseTag = false;
9889           boolean endElement = false;
9890           
9891           if (line.endsWith("/>")) {
9892             line = line.substring(0, line.length()-2);
9893             line = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimEnd(line);
9894             endsWithCloseTag = true;
9895           } else if (line.endsWith(">")) {
9896             line = line.substring(0, line.length()-1);
9897             line = GrouperInstallerUtils.trimEnd(line);
9898             endElement = true;
9899           }
9900           
9901           newfile.append(line).append(" ").append(newAttributeName).append("=\"").append(newValue).append("\"");
9902           
9903           if (endsWithCloseTag) {
9904             newfile.append(" />");
9905           } else if (endElement) {
9906             newfile.append(" >");
9907           }
9908           
9909           newfile.append(newline);
9910           madeChange = true;
9911           
9912         } else {
9913         
9914           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
9915         }
9916         continue;
9917       }
9918       
9919       String oldValue = matcher.group(1);
9920       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(newValue, oldValue)) {
9921         System.out.println(" - old " + description + " value is same as new value: " + newValue);
9922         noChangeNeeded = true;
9923         newfile.append(line).append(newline);
9924         continue;
9925       }
9926       
9927       //we need to change the value
9928       System.out.println(" - changing " + description + " from: '" + oldValue + "' to: '" + newValue + "'");
9929       newfile.append(line.substring(0, matcher.start(1)));
9930       newfile.append(newValue);
9931       newfile.append(line.substring(matcher.end(1), line.length()));
9932       newfile.append(newline);
9933       madeChange = true;
9934       continue;
9935     }
9936     
9937     if (!madeChange) {
9938       //true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
9939       if (noChangeNeeded) {
9940         return false;
9941       }
9942       return null;
9943     }
9944     
9945     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newfile.toString());
9946     
9947     return true;
9948   }
9949 
9950   /**
9951    * add a line to a file.  will replace \n with whatever newline is
9952    * @param file
9953    * @param line (not ending in newline)
9954    * @param lineNumber 1 indexed.  If not exist, add to end of file
9955    * @param description is a description of what was just changed
9956    */
9957   public static void addToFile(File file, String line, int lineNumber, String description) {
9958     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
9959       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
9960           + file.getAbsolutePath());
9961     }
9962     
9963     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
9964     
9965     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
9966     
9967     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
9968 
9969     line = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(line, "\n", newline);
9970     
9971     line += newline;
9972     
9973     StringBuilder newfile = new StringBuilder();
9974     
9975     boolean madeChange = false;
9976     
9977     int index = 0;
9978     
9979     for (String fileLine : lines) {
9980       fileLine = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(fileLine);
9981       newfile.append(fileLine).append(newline);
9982       index++;
9983       
9984       if (index >= lineNumber  && !madeChange) {
9985 
9986         System.out.println("Adding " + description + " to file at line number: " + lineNumber);        
9987         
9988         newfile.append(line);
9989         madeChange = true;
9990       }
9991     }
9992     
9993     if (!madeChange) {
9994       System.out.println("Appending " + description + " to end of file");        
9995       newfile.append(line);
9996     }
9997     
9998     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newfile.toString());
9999     
10000   }
10001 
10002   /** tomcat ui path */
10003   private String tomcatUiPath = null;
10004 
10005   /** tomcat ws path */
10006   private String tomcatWsPath = null;
10007 
10008   /** untarred dir, this does NOT end in file.separator */
10009   private File untarredClientDir;
10010   
10011   /**
10012    * 
10013    */
10014   private static void validateJavaVersion() {
10015     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
10016         GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand(), 
10017         new String[]{"-version"}, true);
10018     String javaResult = commandResult.getOutputText();
10019     if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(javaResult)) {
10020       javaResult = commandResult.getErrorText();
10021     }
10022     if (!validJava(javaResult)) {
10023       throw new RuntimeException("Expecting Java 6+, but received: " + javaResult + ", run the installer jar with a jdk v6");
10024     }
10025     
10026     //try javac
10027     try {
10028       commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(
10029           GrouperInstallerUtils.javaCommand() + "c", 
10030           new String[]{"-version"}, true);
10031       javaResult = commandResult.getOutputText();
10032       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(javaResult)) {
10033         javaResult = commandResult.getErrorText();
10034       }
10035       if (!validJava(javaResult)) {
10036         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting Java 6+, but received: " + javaResult + ", run the installer jar with a jdk v6");
10037       }
10038     } catch (Exception e) {
10039       throw new RuntimeException("This needs to be run from a jdk, but it is detected to be running from a JRE...  run the installed from a JDK!");
10040     }
10041   }
10042 
10043   /**
10044    * see if install, upgrade, patch, etc
10045    * @return true if install, or false if upgrade
10046    */
10047   private GrouperInstallerMainFunction grouperInstallerMainFunction() {
10048 
10049 //    if (GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValueBoolean("grouperInstaller.checkJavaVersion", true, false)) {
10050 //      String javaVersion = System.getProperty("java.version");
10051 //      if (javaVersion != null && !javaVersion.startsWith("1.6") && !javaVersion.startsWith("1.7")) {
10052 //        System.out.println("Error: Java should be version 6 or 7 (1.6 or 1.7), but is detected as: " + javaVersion);        
10053 //        System.out.println("Press <enter> to continue...");
10054 //        readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.wrongJavaContinue");
10055 //      }
10056 //    }
10057 
10058     String input = null;
10059     String defaultAction = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.installOrUpgrade", false);
10060     defaultAction = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(defaultAction, "install");
10061     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
10062       System.out.print("Do you want to 'install' a new installation of grouper, 'upgrade' an existing installation,\n"
10063           + "  'patch' an existing installation, 'admin' utilities, or 'createPatch' for Grouper developers\n" 
10064           + "  (enter: 'install', 'upgrade', 'patch', 'admin', 'createPatch' or blank for the default) ["
10065           + defaultAction + "]: ");
10066       input = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.actionEgInstallUpgradePatch");
10067       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(input)) {
10068         input = defaultAction;
10069       }
10070       GrouperInstallerMainFunction theGrouperInstallerMainFunction = GrouperInstallerMainFunction.valueOfIgnoreCase(input, false);
10071       if (theGrouperInstallerMainFunction != null) {
10072         return theGrouperInstallerMainFunction;
10073       }
10074       System.out.println("Please enter 'install', 'upgrade', 'patch', 'admin', 'createPatch', or blank for default (which is " + defaultAction + ")");
10075     }
10076     throw new RuntimeException("Expecting 'install', 'upgrade', 'patch', 'admin', or 'createPatch' but was: '" + input + "'");
10077   }
10078 
10079 
10080   
10081   /**
10082    * 
10083    * @return install directory
10084    */
10085   private static String grouperInstallDirectory() {
10086     String grouperInstallDirectoryString;
10087     {
10088       File grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File("");
10089       String defaultDirectory = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.installDirectory", false);
10090       System.out.print("Enter in the Grouper install directory (note: better if no spaces or special chars) [" 
10091           + (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory) ? grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath() : defaultDirectory) + "]: ");
10092       String input = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.installDirectory");
10093       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(input)) {
10094         grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(input);
10095         if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10096           System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + input + "'");
10097           System.exit(1);
10098         }
10099       } else {
10100         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory)) {
10101           grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(defaultDirectory);
10102           if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10103             System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + input + "'");
10104             System.exit(1);
10105           }
10106         }
10107       }
10108       grouperInstallDirectoryString = grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath();
10109       if (!grouperInstallDirectoryString.endsWith(File.separator)) {
10110         grouperInstallDirectoryString += File.separator;
10111       }
10112     }
10113     return grouperInstallDirectoryString;
10114   }
10115 
10116   /**
10117    * 
10118    * @return upgrade directory
10119    */
10120   private String grouperUpgradeTempDirectory() {
10121     String localGrouperInstallDirectoryString = null;
10122     {
10123       File grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(new File("").getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + "tarballs");
10124       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString)) {
10125         grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(this.grouperInstallDirectoryString + "tarballs");
10126       }
10127       String defaultDirectory = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.tarballDirectory", false);
10128       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory)) {
10129         defaultDirectory = grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath();
10130       }
10131       System.out.print("Enter in a Grouper temp directory to download tarballs (note: better if no spaces or special chars) [" 
10132           + defaultDirectory + "]: ");
10133       localGrouperInstallDirectoryString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.tarballDirectory");
10134       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(localGrouperInstallDirectoryString)) {
10135         grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(localGrouperInstallDirectoryString);
10136         if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10137           System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath() + "'");
10138           System.exit(1);
10139         }
10140       } else {
10141         localGrouperInstallDirectoryString = defaultDirectory;
10142       }
10143       if (!localGrouperInstallDirectoryString.endsWith(File.separator)) {
10144         localGrouperInstallDirectoryString += File.separator;
10145       }
10146     }
10147     return localGrouperInstallDirectoryString;
10148   }
10149 
10150   /**
10151    * 
10152    * @return see if operating on a source directory or deployed directory
10153    */
10154   @SuppressWarnings("unused")
10155   private GrouperInstallType sourceOrDeployed() {
10156 
10157     if (this.grouperDirectories.getGrouperInstallType() == null) {
10158              
10159     }
10160     
10161     return this.grouperDirectories.getGrouperInstallType();
10162   }
10163 
10164 
10165   
10166   /**
10167    * 
10168    * @return directory where existing installation exists
10169    */
10170   private String upgradeExistingDirectory() {
10171 
10172     //get the directory where the existing installation is
10173     String tempUpgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10174 
10175     String errorMessage = "Cant find Grouper " + this.appToUpgrade.name() + " properties files or libs, looked in the directory, "
10176         + "/classes/ , /conf/ , /WEB-INF/classes/ , /lib/ , /WEB-INF/lib/ , /lib/grouper/ , /dist/lib/ ";
10177 
10178     try {
10179       String upgradeExistingDirectoryString = null;
10180       for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
10181         File grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File("");
10182         String defaultDirectory = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.existingInstalledDirectory", false);
10183         System.out.print("Where is the grouper " + this.appToUpgrade.name() + " installed? " +
10184           (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(defaultDirectory) ? "" : ("[" + defaultDirectory + "]: ")));
10185         upgradeExistingDirectoryString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.grouperWhereInstalled");
10186         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(upgradeExistingDirectoryString)) {
10187           grouperInstallDirectoryFile = new File(upgradeExistingDirectoryString);
10188           if (!grouperInstallDirectoryFile.exists() || !grouperInstallDirectoryFile.isDirectory()) {
10189             System.out.println("Error: cant find directory: '" + grouperInstallDirectoryFile.getAbsolutePath() + "'");
10190             continue;
10191           }
10192         } else {
10193           upgradeExistingDirectoryString = defaultDirectory;
10194         }
10195         upgradeExistingDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(upgradeExistingDirectoryString);
10196 
10197         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = upgradeExistingDirectoryString;
10198 
10199         //make sure directory is where the app is
10200         if (!this.appToUpgrade.validateExistingDirectory(this)) {
10201           System.out.println(errorMessage);
10202           continue;
10203         }
10204         //find the resources dir
10205         {
10206           File resourcesDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "classes" + File.separator);
10207           if (resourcesDirFile.exists()) {
10208             this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = resourcesDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10209           } else {
10210             resourcesDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "conf" + File.separator);
10211             if (resourcesDirFile.exists()) {
10212               this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = resourcesDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10213             } else {
10214               resourcesDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator);
10215               if (resourcesDirFile.exists()) {
10216                 this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = resourcesDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10217               } else {
10218                 this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10219               }            
10220             }
10221           }
10222           this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString);
10223         }
10224         
10225         //find the lib dir
10226         {
10227           File libDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator + "grouper" + File.separator);
10228           if (libDirFile.exists()) {
10229             this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = libDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10230           } else {
10231             libDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator);
10232             if (libDirFile.exists()) {
10233               this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = libDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10234             } else {
10235               libDirFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "lib" + File.separator);
10236               if (libDirFile.exists()) {
10237                 this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = libDirFile.getAbsolutePath();
10238               } else {
10239                 this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10240               }            
10241             }
10242           }
10243           this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString = GrouperInstallerUtils.fileAddLastSlashIfNotExists(this.upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString);
10244         }        
10245                 
10246         return upgradeExistingDirectoryString;
10247       }
10248       
10249       throw new RuntimeException(errorMessage);
10250       
10251     } finally {
10252       //set this back
10253       this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString = tempUpgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString;
10254     }
10255   }
10256 
10257   /**
10258    * where classes are in the upgrade directory, ends in file separator
10259    */
10260   private String upgradeExistingClassesDirectoryString;
10261   
10262   /**
10263    * where jars are in the upgrade directory, ends in file separator
10264    */
10265   private String upgradeExistingLibDirectoryString;
10266   
10267   /**
10268    * 
10269    * @param action upgrade or patch
10270    * @return what we are upgrading
10271    */
10272   private AppToUpgrade grouperAppToUpgradeOrPatch(String action) {
10273 
10274     String appToUpgradeString = null;
10275     String defaultAppToUpgrade = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("grouperInstaller.default.appToUpgrade", false);
10276     defaultAppToUpgrade = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultIfBlank(defaultAppToUpgrade, AppToUpgrade.API.name().toLowerCase());
10277     
10278     for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
10279       System.out.print("What do you want to " + action + "?  api, ui, ws, pspng, or psp? [" + defaultAppToUpgrade + "]: ");
10280       appToUpgradeString = readFromStdIn("grouperInstaller.autorun.appToUpgrade");
10281       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(appToUpgradeString)) {
10282         appToUpgradeString = defaultAppToUpgrade;
10283       }
10284       try {
10285         return AppToUpgrade.valueOfIgnoreCase(appToUpgradeString, true);
10286       } catch (Exception e) {
10287         System.out.print("Error: please enter: 'api', 'ui', 'ws', 'pspng', 'psp', or blank for default [" + defaultAppToUpgrade + "]");
10288       }
10289     }
10290     throw new RuntimeException("Expecting api, ui, ws, pspng, or psp but was: '" + appToUpgradeString + "'");
10291   }
10292 
10293   /**
10294    * 
10295    * @param javaResult
10296    * @return if valid
10297    */
10298   private static boolean validJava(String javaResult) {
10299     //C:\mchyzer\grouper\trunk\grouper\bin>java -version
10300     //java version "1.6.0_21"
10301     //Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_21-b07)
10302     //Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 17.0-b17, mixed mode, sharing)
10303     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile("(\\d+)\\.(\\d+)\\.\\d+_?\\d*");
10304     Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(javaResult);
10305     if (matcher.find()) {
10306       int majorVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(1));
10307       int minorVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.intValue(matcher.group(2));
10308       if (majorVersion == 1 && minorVersion >= 6) {
10309         return true;
10310       }
10311       return majorVersion >= 6;
10312     }
10313     return false;
10314   }
10315   
10316   /**
10317    * add something to an xml file
10318    * @param file
10319    * @param addAfterThisRegex 
10320    * @param mustPassTheseRegexes 
10321    * @param newValue 
10322    * @param description of change for sys out print
10323    */
10324   public static void addToXmlFile(File file, String addAfterThisRegex, String[] mustPassTheseRegexes, String newValue, String description) {
10325     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
10326       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
10327           + file.getAbsolutePath());
10328     }
10329     
10330     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
10331     
10332     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
10333     
10334     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(addAfterThisRegex);
10335 
10336     String[] lines = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitLines(fileContents);
10337     
10338     Pattern[] lineMustPassThesePatterns = new Pattern[GrouperInstallerUtils.length(mustPassTheseRegexes)];
10339     
10340     boolean[] hasPassedTheseRegexes = new boolean[lineMustPassThesePatterns.length];
10341     
10342     for (int i=0;i<hasPassedTheseRegexes.length;i++) {
10343       hasPassedTheseRegexes[i] = false;
10344     }
10345     
10346     {
10347       int index = 0;
10348       for (String lineMustHaveRegex : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(mustPassTheseRegexes, String.class)) {
10349         Pattern lineMustHavePattern = Pattern.compile(lineMustHaveRegex);
10350         lineMustPassThesePatterns[index] = lineMustHavePattern;
10351         
10352         index++;
10353       }
10354     }    
10355 
10356     StringBuilder newfile = new StringBuilder();
10357 
10358     boolean madeChange = false;
10359 
10360     OUTER: for (String line : lines) {
10361       line = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(line);
10362       
10363       //lets see if it satisfies all
10364       for (int i=0;i<lineMustPassThesePatterns.length;i++) {
10365         Pattern lineMustHavePattern = lineMustPassThesePatterns[i];
10366         if (lineMustHavePattern.matcher(line).find()) {
10367           hasPassedTheseRegexes[i] = true;
10368         }
10369       }
10370       
10371       //see if we have passed all the prefixes
10372       for (int i=0;i<hasPassedTheseRegexes.length;i++) {
10373         if (!hasPassedTheseRegexes[i]) {
10374           newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10375           continue OUTER;
10376         }
10377       }
10378       
10379       //see if satisfies current, and only add once
10380       Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(line);
10381       if (!matcher.find() || madeChange) {
10382         newfile.append(line).append(newline);
10383         continue;
10384       }
10385 
10386       //we need to change the value
10387       System.out.println(" - adding " + description + " line: '" + newValue + "'");
10388       newfile.append(line);
10389       newfile.append(newline);
10390       newfile.append(newValue);
10391       newfile.append(newline);
10392       madeChange = true;
10393     }
10394     if (!madeChange) {
10395       throw new RuntimeException("Couldnt find place to add to server.xml!  Are there newlines that werent there before or something?");
10396     }
10397     
10398     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newfile.toString());
10399     
10400   }
10401 
10402   
10403   /**
10404    * edit a property in a property file
10405    * @param file
10406    * @param propertyName
10407    * @param propertyValue
10408    * @param createFileIfNotExist 
10409    */
10410   public static void editPropertiesFile(File file, String propertyName, String propertyValue, boolean createFileIfNotExist) {
10411     if (!file.exists()) {
10412       if (createFileIfNotExist) {
10413         System.out.println("Creating file: " + (file == null ? null : file.getAbsolutePath()));
10414         GrouperInstallerUtils.fileCreate(file);
10415       } else {
10416         throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
10417             + file.getAbsolutePath());
10418       }
10419     }
10420     
10421     propertyValue = GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString(propertyValue);
10422     
10423     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
10424     
10425     String newline = GrouperInstallerUtils.newlineFromFile(fileContents);
10426     
10427     //if it starts with it, add a newline to start so the regexes work
10428     if (!fileContents.startsWith(newline)) {
10429       fileContents = newline + fileContents;
10430     }
10431     
10432     //lets look for property in file
10433     //this is a newline or form feed then some optional whitespace, and the property name
10434     //then some optional whitespace then an equals, then optional whitespace, then some text
10435     String propertyNameRegex = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(propertyName, ".", "\\.");
10436     String regex = "[\\n\\r][ \\t]*" + propertyNameRegex + "[ \\t]*=[ \\t]*([^\\n\\r]*)";
10437     Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(regex, Pattern.DOTALL);
10438     Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(fileContents);
10439 
10440     if (matcher.find()) {
10441       String previousValue = matcher.group(1);
10442       
10443       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.trimToEmpty(previousValue).equals(GrouperInstallerUtils.trim(propertyValue))) {
10444         System.out.println(" - property " + propertyName + " already was set to: " + propertyValue + ", not changing file");
10445         return;
10446       }
10447       
10448       int startIndex = matcher.start(1);
10449       
10450       int endIndex = matcher.end(1);
10451       
10452       String newContents = fileContents.substring(0, startIndex) + propertyValue;
10453       
10454       //if not the last char
10455       if (endIndex < fileContents.length()-1) {
10456         newContents += fileContents.substring(endIndex, fileContents.length());
10457       }
10458 
10459       //if there is another match, there is a problem
10460       if (matcher.find()) {
10461         throw new RuntimeException("Why are there multiple matches for " + propertyName + " in propertyFile: " + file.getAbsolutePath() + "??????");
10462       }
10463 
10464       System.out.println(" - set property: " 
10465           + propertyName + " from: " + previousValue + " to: " + propertyValue);
10466       GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newContents);
10467       return;
10468     }
10469     
10470     //lets see if it is in a comment
10471     //this is a newline or form feed then some optional whitespace, hash, optional whitespace, and the property name
10472     //then some optional whitespace then an equals, then optional whitespace, then some text
10473     regex = ".*[\\n\\r]([ \\t]*#[ \\t]*)" + propertyNameRegex + "[ \\t]*=[ \\t]*([^\\n\\r]*).*";
10474     pattern = Pattern.compile(regex, Pattern.DOTALL);
10475     matcher = pattern.matcher(fileContents);
10476 
10477     if (matcher.matches()) {
10478       String previousValue = matcher.group(2);
10479       
10480       int startIndexHash = matcher.start(1);
10481       
10482       int endIndexHash = matcher.end(1);
10483 
10484       int startIndex = matcher.start(2);
10485       
10486       int endIndex = matcher.end(2);
10487       
10488       String newContents = fileContents.substring(0, startIndexHash) + fileContents.substring(endIndexHash, startIndex)
10489         + propertyValue;
10490       
10491       //if not the last char
10492       if (endIndex < fileContents.length()-1) {
10493         newContents += fileContents.substring(endIndex, fileContents.length());
10494       }
10495       System.out.println(" - uncommented property: " 
10496           + propertyName + " from: " + previousValue + " to: " + propertyValue);
10497       GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newContents);
10498       
10499       return;
10500     }
10501     
10502     //it must have not existed
10503     //add a newline..
10504     //add to end in case it was already there, now it will be overwritten
10505     String newContents = fileContents + newline + "# added by grouper-installer" + newline + propertyName + " = " + propertyValue + newline;
10506     GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newContents);
10507 
10508     System.out.println(" - added to end of property file: " + propertyName + " = " + propertyValue);
10509     
10510   }
10511 
10512   /**
10513    * untar a file to a dir
10514    * @param fileName
10515    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10516    * @param dirToUntarTo or null to keep in same dir as tarfile
10517    * @return the directory where the files are (assuming has a single dir the same name as the archive)
10518    */
10519   private static File untar(final String fileName, final String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal,
10520       File dirToUntarTo) {
10521 
10522     if (!fileName.endsWith(".tar")) {
10523       throw new RuntimeException("File doesnt end in .tar: " + fileName);
10524     }
10525     String untarredFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".tar".length());
10526     
10527     //ant has -bin which is annoying
10528     if (untarredFileName.endsWith("-bin")) {
10529       untarredFileName = untarredFileName.substring(0, untarredFileName.length() - "-bin".length());
10530     }
10531 
10532     if (dirToUntarTo == null) {
10533       dirToUntarTo = new File(untarredFileName).getParentFile();
10534     }
10535     
10536     File untarredFile = new File(dirToUntarTo.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + new File(untarredFileName).getName());
10537     untarredFileName = untarredFile.getAbsolutePath();
10538     
10539     if (untarredFile.exists()) {
10540       
10541       System.out.print("Untarred dir exists: " + untarredFileName + ", use untarred dir (t|f)? [t]: ");
10542       boolean useUnzippedFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10543       if (useUnzippedFile) {
10544         return untarredFile;
10545       }
10546       
10547       System.out.println("Deleting: " + untarredFileName);
10548       GrouperInstallerUtils.deleteRecursiveDirectory(untarredFileName);
10549     }
10550     
10551     System.out.println("Expanding: " + fileName + " to " + untarredFile.getAbsolutePath());
10552     
10553     final File[] result = new File[1];
10554     
10555     final File DIR_TO_UNTAR_TO = dirToUntarTo;
10556     
10557     Runnable runnable = new Runnable() {
10558 
10559       public void run() {
10560         result[0] = untarHelper(fileName, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal, DIR_TO_UNTAR_TO);
10561       }
10562     };
10563 
10564     GrouperInstallerUtils.threadRunWithStatusDots(runnable, true);
10565 
10566     return result[0];
10567 
10568   }
10569 
10570   /**
10571    * untar a file to a dir
10572    * @param fileName
10573    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10574    * @param dirToUntarTo or null to keep in same dir as tarfile
10575    * @return the directory where the files are (assuming has a single dir the same name as the archive)
10576    */
10577   @SuppressWarnings("resource")
10578   private static File untarHelper(String fileName, String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal, File dirToUntarTo) {
10579     TarArchiveInputStream tarArchiveInputStream = null;
10580     
10581     String untarredFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".tar".length());
10582     
10583     //ant has -bin which is annoying
10584     if (untarredFileName.endsWith("-bin")) {
10585       untarredFileName = untarredFileName.substring(0, untarredFileName.length() - "-bin".length());
10586     }
10587     
10588     if (dirToUntarTo == null) {
10589       dirToUntarTo = new File(untarredFileName).getParentFile();
10590     }
10591 
10592     File untarredFile = new File(dirToUntarTo.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + new File(untarredFileName).getName());
10593 
10594     try {
10595 
10596       tarArchiveInputStream = new TarArchiveInputStream(new FileInputStream(fileName));
10597       
10598       while (true) {
10599   
10600         TarArchiveEntry tarArchiveEntry = tarArchiveInputStream.getNextTarEntry();
10601         if (tarArchiveEntry == null) {
10602           break;
10603         }
10604         
10605         //System.out.println("Entry: " + tarArchiveEntry.getName()
10606         //    + ", isDirectory: " + tarArchiveEntry.isDirectory()
10607         //    + ", isFile: " + tarArchiveEntry.isFile());
10608         String fileEntryName = dirToUntarTo.getAbsolutePath() + File.separator + tarArchiveEntry.getName();
10609         File tarEntryFile = new File(fileEntryName);
10610         
10611         if (tarArchiveEntry.isDirectory()) {
10612           if (!tarEntryFile.exists() && !tarEntryFile.mkdirs()) {
10613             throw new RuntimeException("Cant create dirs: " + tarEntryFile.getAbsolutePath());
10614           }
10615           continue;
10616         }
10617         
10618         byte[] content = new byte[(int)tarArchiveEntry.getSize()];
10619 
10620         int size = tarArchiveInputStream.read(content, 0, content.length);
10621         
10622         //for some reason we get an error when 0 bytes...
10623         if (size != content.length && (!(size == -1 && content.length == 0))) {
10624           throw new RuntimeException("Didnt read the right amount of bytes: " + size 
10625               + ", should have been: " + content.length + " on entry: " + tarArchiveEntry.getName());
10626         }
10627         
10628         ByteArrayInputStream byteArrayInputStream = null;
10629         FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = null;
10630         
10631         try {
10632           
10633           //create parent directories
10634           if (!tarEntryFile.getParentFile().exists() && !tarEntryFile.getParentFile().mkdirs()) {
10635             throw new RuntimeException("Cant create dirs: " + tarEntryFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath());
10636           }
10637 
10638           fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(tarEntryFile);
10639           byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(content);
10640           GrouperInstallerUtils.copy(byteArrayInputStream, fileOutputStream);
10641           
10642         } catch (Exception e) {
10643           throw new RuntimeException("Problem with entry: " + tarArchiveEntry.getName(), e);
10644         } finally {
10645           GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(byteArrayInputStream);
10646           GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(fileOutputStream);
10647         }
10648         
10649       }
10650     } catch (Exception e) {
10651       throw new RuntimeException("Error untarring: " + fileName, e);
10652     } finally {
10653       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(tarArchiveInputStream);
10654     }
10655     return untarredFile;
10656   }
10657 
10658   /**
10659    * unzip a file, this is for .zip files
10660    * @param fileName
10661    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10662    * @return the unzipped file
10663    */
10664   private static File unzipFromZip(final String fileName, final String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
10665 
10666     if (!fileName.endsWith(".zip")) {
10667       throw new RuntimeException("File doesnt end in .zip: " + fileName);
10668     }
10669     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".zip".length());
10670 
10671     File unzippedDir = new File(unzippedFileName);
10672 
10673     if (unzippedDir.exists()) {
10674       
10675       System.out.print("Unzipped dir exists: " + unzippedFileName + ", use unzipped dir (t|f)? [t]: ");
10676       boolean useUnzippedFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10677       if (useUnzippedFile) {
10678         return unzippedDir;
10679       }
10680       System.out.println("Deleting: " + unzippedFileName);
10681       GrouperInstallerUtils.deleteRecursiveDirectory(unzippedFileName);
10682     } else {
10683       if (!unzippedDir.mkdir()) {
10684         throw new RuntimeException("Cant make dir: " + unzippedDir.getAbsolutePath());
10685       }
10686     }
10687 
10688     System.out.println("Unzipping: " + fileName);
10689 
10690     final File[] result = new File[1];
10691     
10692     Runnable runnable = new Runnable() {
10693 
10694       public void run() {
10695         result[0] = unzipFromZipHelper(fileName, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10696       }
10697     };
10698 
10699     GrouperInstallerUtils.threadRunWithStatusDots(runnable, true);
10700 
10701     return result[0];
10702 
10703   }
10704 
10705   /**
10706    * unzip a file, this is for .zip files
10707    * @param fileName
10708    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10709    * @return the unzipped file
10710    */
10711   private static File unzipFromZipHelper(String fileName, String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
10712 
10713     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".zip".length());
10714 
10715     File unzippedDir = new File(unzippedFileName);
10716 
10717     ZipFile zipFile = null;
10718     try {
10719       zipFile = new ZipFile(fileName);
10720       Enumeration<? extends ZipEntry> entries = zipFile.entries();
10721       while (entries.hasMoreElements()) {
10722         ZipEntry entry = entries.nextElement();
10723         File entryDestination = new File(unzippedDir, entry.getName());
10724         if (entry.isDirectory()) {
10725           entryDestination.mkdirs();
10726         } else {
10727           entryDestination.getParentFile().mkdirs();
10728           InputStream in = zipFile.getInputStream(entry);
10729           OutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(entryDestination);
10730           try {
10731             IOUtils.copy(in, out);
10732           } finally {
10733             GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(in);
10734             GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(out);
10735           }
10736         }
10737       }
10738     } catch (IOException ioe) {
10739       throw new RuntimeException(ioe);
10740     } finally {
10741       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(zipFile);
10742     }
10743 
10744     return unzippedDir;
10745 
10746   }
10747 
10748   /**
10749    * unzip a file to another file, this is for .gz files
10750    * @param fileName
10751    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10752    * @return the unzipped file
10753    */
10754   private static File unzip(final String fileName, final String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
10755 
10756     if (!fileName.endsWith(".gz")) {
10757       throw new RuntimeException("File doesnt end in .gz: " + fileName);
10758     }
10759     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".gz".length());
10760     
10761     File unzippedFile = new File(unzippedFileName);
10762     if (unzippedFile.exists()) {
10763       
10764       System.out.print("Unzipped file exists: " + unzippedFileName + ", use unzipped file (t|f)? [t]: ");
10765       boolean useUnzippedFile = readFromStdInBoolean(true, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10766       if (useUnzippedFile) {
10767         return unzippedFile;
10768       }
10769       System.out.println("Deleting: " + unzippedFileName);
10770       if (!unzippedFile.delete()) {
10771         throw new RuntimeException("Cant delete file: " + unzippedFileName);
10772       }
10773     }
10774 
10775     System.out.println("Unzipping: " + fileName);
10776     
10777     final File[] result = new File[1];
