10778     
10779     Runnable runnable = new Runnable() {
10780 
10781       public void run() {
10782         result[0] = unzipHelper(fileName, autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal);
10783       }
10784     };
10785 
10786     GrouperInstallerUtils.threadRunWithStatusDots(runnable, true);
10787 
10788     return result[0];
10789 
10790   }
10791 
10792   /**
10793    * unzip a file to another file, this is for .gz files
10794    * @param fileName
10795    * @param autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal key in properties file to automatically fill in a value
10796    * @return the unzipped file
10797    */
10798   private static File unzipHelper(String fileName, String autorunPropertiesKeyIfFileExistsUseLocal) {
10799 
10800     String unzippedFileName = fileName.substring(0, fileName.length() - ".gz".length());
10801     File unzippedFile = new File(unzippedFileName);
10802 
10803     GzipCompressorInputStream gzipCompressorInputStream = null;
10804     FileOutputStream fileOutputStream = null;
10805     try {
10806       gzipCompressorInputStream = new GzipCompressorInputStream(new BufferedInputStream(new FileInputStream(new File(fileName))));
10807       fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(unzippedFile);
10808       GrouperInstallerUtils.copy(gzipCompressorInputStream, fileOutputStream);
10809     } catch (Exception e) {
10810       throw new RuntimeException("Cant unzip file: " + fileName, e);
10811     } finally {
10812       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(gzipCompressorInputStream);
10813       GrouperInstallerUtils.closeQuietly(fileOutputStream);
10814     }
10815     return unzippedFile;
10816   }
10817 
10818   /**
10819    * 
10820    * @return the file of the directory of the psp
10821    */
10822   private File downloadPsp() {
10823     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
10824     
10825     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
10826       urlToDownload += "/";
10827     }
10828     urlToDownload += "release/";
10829 
10830     String pspFileName = "grouper.psp-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
10831     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + pspFileName;
10832 
10833     File pspFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + pspFileName);
10834     
10835     downloadFile(urlToDownload, pspFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspDownloadTarEtc");
10836 
10837     return pspFile;
10838   }
10839   
10840   /**
10841    * 
10842    * @return the file of the directory of the psp
10843    */
10844   private File downloadPspng() {
10845     String urlToDownload = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesValue("download.server.url", true);
10846     
10847     if (!urlToDownload.endsWith("/")) {
10848       urlToDownload += "/";
10849     }
10850     urlToDownload += "release/";
10851 
10852     String pspFileName = "grouper.pspng-" + this.version + ".tar.gz";
10853     urlToDownload += this.version + "/" + pspFileName;
10854 
10855     File pspFile = new File(this.grouperTarballDirectoryString + pspFileName);
10856     
10857     downloadFile(urlToDownload, pspFile.getAbsolutePath(), "grouperInstaller.autorun.useLocalPspngDownloadTarEtc");
10858 
10859     return pspFile;
10860   }
10861   
10862   /**
10863    * upgrade the ws
10864    */
10865   private void upgradeWs() {
10866   
10867     this.upgradeApiPreRevertPatch();
10868 
10869     System.out.println("You need to revert all patches to upgrade");
10870     this.patchRevertWs();
10871     
10872     this.upgradeApiPostRevertPatch();
10873     
10874     System.out.println("\n##################################");
10875     System.out.println("Upgrading WS\n");
10876     
10877     //copy the jars there
10878     System.out.println("\n##################################");
10879     System.out.println("Upgrading WS jars\n");
10880   
10881     this.upgradeJars(new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + 
10882         "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
10883         + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "lib" + File.separator));
10884   
10885     System.out.println("\n##################################");
10886     System.out.println("Upgrading WS files\n");
10887   
10888     //copy files there
10889     this.copyFiles(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + 
10890         "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
10891         + File.separator,
10892         this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString,
10893         GrouperInstallerUtils.toSet("WEB-INF/lib", "WEB-INF/web.xml", "WEB-INF/classes",
10894             "WEB-INF/bin/gsh", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.bat", "WEB-INF/bin/gsh.sh"));
10895 
10896     {
10897       boolean hadChange = false;
10898       for (String gshName : new String[]{"gsh", "gsh.bat", "gsh.sh"}) {
10899         File newGshFile = new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + "grouper-ws" + File.separator 
10900             + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
10901             + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" 
10902             + File.separator + gshName);
10903   
10904         File existingGshFile = new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
10905             + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "bin" + File.separator + gshName);
10906   
10907         if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.contentEquals(newGshFile, existingGshFile)) {
10908           this.backupAndCopyFile(newGshFile, existingGshFile, true);
10909           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals("gsh.bat", gshName)) {
10910             hadChange = true;
10911           }
10912         }
10913         
10914       }
10915       if (hadChange) {
10916         //set executable and dos2unix
10917         gshExcutableAndDos2Unix(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString + "WEB-INF" 
10918             + File.separator + "bin" 
10919             + File.separator);
10920       }
10921     }
10922     
10923     upgradeWebXml(new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + "grouper-ws" 
10924         + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
10925         + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"),
10926             new File(this.upgradeExistingApplicationDirectoryString 
10927                 + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "web.xml"));
10928     
10929     System.out.println("\n##################################");
10930     System.out.println("Upgrading WS config files\n");
10931 
10932     this.compareUpgradePropertiesFile(this.grouperWsBasePropertiesFile, 
10933         new File(this.untarredWsDir + File.separator + 
10934             "grouper-ws" + File.separator + "build" + File.separator + "dist" + File.separator + "grouper-ws"
10935             + File.separator + "WEB-INF" + File.separator + "classes" + File.separator + "grouper-ws.base.properties"),
10936         this.grouperWsPropertiesFile,
10937         this.grouperWsExamplePropertiesFile, null, "grouperInstaller.autorun.removeRedundantPropetiesFromGrouperWsProperties"
10938       );
10939 
10940     //patch it
10941     this.patchWs();
10942 
10943   }
10944   /**
10945    * get the patches available to apply that are not already applied
10946    * @param thisAppToUpgrade app to upgrade to check
10947    * @return true if up to date, false if not
10948    */
10949   private boolean patchStatus(AppToUpgrade thisAppToUpgrade) {
10950   
10951     if (thisAppToUpgrade == AppToUpgrade.CLIENT) {
10952       throw new RuntimeException("Cant get status on " + thisAppToUpgrade);
10953     }
10954     
10955     Properties patchesExistingProperties = patchExistingProperties();
10956     
10957     String grouperVersion = this.grouperVersionOfJar().toString();
10958     
10959     grouperVersion = GrouperInstallerUtils.replace(grouperVersion, ".", "_");
10960     
10961     boolean foundNewPatch = false;
10962     
10963     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<1000;i++) {
10964       
10965       //grouper_v2_2_1_api_patch_0.state
10966       String keyBase = "grouper_v" + grouperVersion + "_" + thisAppToUpgrade.name().toLowerCase() + "_patch_" + i;
10967       System.out.println("\n################ Checking patch " + keyBase);
10968       String key = keyBase + ".state";
10969   
10970       String value = patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(key);
10971 
10972       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(value)) {
10973 
10974         GrouperInstallerPatchStatus grouperInstallerPatchStatus = GrouperInstallerPatchStatus.valueOfIgnoreCase(value, true, true);
10975 
10976         switch (grouperInstallerPatchStatus) {
10977           case applied:
10978             
10979             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was applied on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
10980             break;
10981             
10982           case skippedPermanently:
10983             
10984             foundNewPatch = true;
10985             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped permanently on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
10986             break;
10987             
10988           case skippedTemporarily:
10989   
10990             foundNewPatch = true;
10991             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was skipped termporarily on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
10992             break;
10993   
10994           case reverted:
10995   
10996             foundNewPatch = true;
10997             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": was reverted on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
10998             break;
10999   
11000           case error:
11001   
11002             foundNewPatch = true;
11003             System.out.println("Patch: " + keyBase + ": had an error installing on: " + patchesExistingProperties.getProperty(keyBase + ".date"));
11004             break;
11005   
11006           default:
11007             throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting: " + grouperInstallerPatchStatus);
11008         }
11009         
11010       }
11011   
11012       //lets see if it exists on the server
11013       File patchUntarredDir = downloadAndUnzipPatch(keyBase);
11014       
11015       //if no more patches
11016       if (patchUntarredDir == null) {
11017         System.out.println("");
11018         break OUTER;
11019       }
11020       
11021       //lets get the description:
11022       //  # will show up on screen so user knows what it is
11023       //  description = This patch fixes GRP-1080: browse folders refresh button only works in chrome, not other browsers
11024       //
11025       //  # patches that this patch is dependant on (comma separated)
11026       //  dependencies = 
11027       //
11028       //  # low, medium, or high risk to applying the patch
11029       //  risk = low
11030       //
11031       //  # is this is a security patch (true or false)
11032       //  security = false
11033       //
11034       //  # if this patch requires restart of processes (true or false)
11035       //  requiresRestart = false
11036       Properties patchProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(new File(patchUntarredDir.getAbsoluteFile() + File.separator + keyBase + ".properties"));
11037   
11038       foundNewPatch = true;
11039   
11040       // check dependencies
11041       {
11042         String[] dependencies = GrouperInstallerUtils.splitTrim(patchProperties.getProperty("dependencies"), ",");
11043   
11044         for (String dependency : GrouperInstallerUtils.nonNull(dependencies, String.class)) {
11045           if (!this.patchesInstalled.contains(dependency)) {
11046             System.out.println("Cannot install patch " + keyBase + " since it is dependent on a patch which is not installed: " + dependency);
11047           }
11048         }
11049       }
11050       
11051       boolean securityRelated = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("security"), false);
11052       boolean requiresRestart = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanValue(patchProperties.getProperty("requiresRestart"), true);
11053       
11054       //print description
11055       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + " is " + patchProperties.getProperty("risk") + " risk, "
11056           + (securityRelated ? "is a security patch" : "is not a security patch"));
11057       System.out.println("Patch " + keyBase + (requiresRestart ? " requires" : " does not require") + " a restart");
11058       System.out.println(patchProperties.getProperty("description") + "\n");      
11059     }
11060   
11061     if (!foundNewPatch) {
11062       System.out.println("There are no new " + thisAppToUpgrade + " patches to install");
11063       return true;
11064     }
11065     
11066     return false;
11067   }
11068   /**
11069    * build PSPNG
11070    * @param pspngDir
11071    */
11072   private void buildPspng(File pspngDir) {
11073 
11074     if (!pspngDir.exists() || pspngDir.isFile()) {
11075       throw new RuntimeException("Cant find psp: " + pspngDir.getAbsolutePath());
11076     }
11077     
11078     File pspngBuildToDir = new File(pspngDir.getAbsolutePath() 
11079         + File.separator + "target" + File.separator + "classes");
11080     
11081     boolean rebuildPspng = true;
11082     
11083     if (pspngBuildToDir.exists()) {
11084       System.out.print("The PSPNG has been built in the past, do you want it rebuilt? (t|f) [t]: ");
11085       rebuildPspng = readFromStdInBoolean(true, "grouperInstaller.autorun.rebuildPspngAfterHavingBeenBuilt");
11086     }
11087     
11088     if (!rebuildPspng) {
11089       return;
11090     }
11091     
11092     List<String> commands = new ArrayList<String>();
11093     
11094 //    \bin\mvn compile -DskipTests
11095     addMavenCommands(commands);
11096 
11097     //put 'compile -DskipTests' in there so it wont run tests which we dont want to do
11098     // dependency:copy-dependencies package -DskipTests
11099     //not compile
11100     commands.add("dependency:copy-dependencies");
11101     commands.add("package");
11102     commands.add("-DskipTests");
11103     commands.add("-Drat.ignoreErrors=true");
11104     commands.add("-Dlicense.skip=true");
11105         
11106     System.out.println("\n##################################");
11107     System.out.println("Building PSPNG with command:\n" + pspngDir.getAbsolutePath() + "> " 
11108         + convertCommandsIntoCommand(commands) + "\n");
11109 
11110     CommandResult commandResult = GrouperInstallerUtils.execCommand(GrouperInstallerUtils.toArray(commands, String.class),
11111         true, true, null, new File(pspngDir.getAbsolutePath()), null, true);
11112     
11113     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getErrorText())) {
11114       System.out.println("stderr: " + commandResult.getErrorText());
11115     }
11116     if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.isBlank(commandResult.getOutputText())) {
11117       System.out.println("stdout: " + commandResult.getOutputText());
11118     }
11119 
11120     System.out.println("\nEnd building PSPNG");
11121     System.out.println("##################################\n");
11122     
11123   }
11124 
11125   /**
11126    * 
11127    * @param grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile 
11128    * @param grouperCachePropertiesFile
11129    * @param ehcacheXmlUrl
11130    */
11131   public static void convertEhcacheXmlToProperties(File grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile, File grouperCachePropertiesFile, URL ehcacheXmlUrl) {
11132 
11133     //look at base properties
11134     Properties grouperCacheProperties = grouperCachePropertiesFile.exists() ? 
11135         GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(grouperCachePropertiesFile) : new Properties();
11136 
11137     if (!grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile.exists()) {
11138       throw new RuntimeException(grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + " must exist and does not!");
11139     }
11140     
11141     if (grouperCacheProperties.size() > 0) {
11142       throw new RuntimeException(grouperCachePropertiesFile.getAbsolutePath() + " exists and must not.  Delete the file and run this again!");
11143     }
11144 
11145     if (!grouperCachePropertiesFile.getParentFile().exists() || !grouperCachePropertiesFile.getParentFile().isDirectory()) {
11146       throw new RuntimeException(grouperCachePropertiesFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() + " must exist and must be a directory");
11147     }
11148     
11149     //look at base properties
11150     Properties grouperCacheBaseProperties = GrouperInstallerUtils.propertiesFromFile(grouperCacheBasePropertiesFile);
11151     
11152     StringBuilder grouperEhcachePropertiesContents = new StringBuilder();
11153     
11154     grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append(
11155               "# Copyright 2016 Internet2\n"
11156             + "#\n"
11157             + "# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n"
11158             + "# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\n"
11159             + "# You may obtain a copy of the License at\n"
11160             + "#\n"
11161             + "#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n"
11162             + "#\n"
11163             + "# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n"
11164             + "# distributed under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n"
11165             + "# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n"
11166             + "# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\n"
11167             + "# limitations under the License.\n"
11168             + "\n"
11169             + "#\n"
11170             + "# Grouper Cache Configuration\n"
11171             + "#\n"
11172             + "\n"
11173             + "# The grouper cache config uses Grouper Configuration Overlays (documented on wiki)\n"
11174             + "# By default the configuration is read from grouper.cache.base.properties\n"
11175             + "# (which should not be edited), and the grouper.cache.properties overlays\n"
11176             + "# the base settings.  See the grouper.cache.base.properties for the possible\n"
11177             + "# settings that can be applied to the grouper.cache.properties\n\n"
11178         );
11179 
11180     {
11181       // <diskStore path="java.io.tmpdir"/>
11182       NodeList diskStoreNodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(ehcacheXmlUrl, "/ehcache/diskStore");
11183       if (diskStoreNodeList.getLength() != 1) {
11184         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting one diskStore element");
11185       }
11186   
11187       Element element = (Element)diskStoreNodeList.item(0);
11188 
11189       NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = element.getAttributes();
11190       if (configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength() != 1 || !"path".equals(configuredNamedNodeMap.item(0).getNodeName())) {
11191         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting one diskStore attribute: path");
11192       }
11193       
11194       String path = element.getAttribute("path");
11195       
11196       if (!"java.io.tmpdir".equals(path)) {
11197         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("grouper.cache.diskStorePath = " + path + "\n\n");
11198       }
11199       
11200     }    
11201 
11202     {
11203       //  <defaultCache
11204       //    maxElementsInMemory="1000"
11205       //    eternal="false"
11206       //    timeToIdleSeconds="10"
11207       //    timeToLiveSeconds="10"
11208       //    overflowToDisk="false"
11209       //    statistics="false"
11210       //  />
11211       
11212       NodeList diskStoreNodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(ehcacheXmlUrl, "/ehcache/defaultCache");
11213       if (diskStoreNodeList.getLength() != 1) {
11214         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting one defaultCache element");
11215       }
11216   
11217       Element element = (Element)diskStoreNodeList.item(0);
11218 
11219       NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = element.getAttributes();
11220       
11221       if (configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength() != 6) {
11222         throw new RuntimeException("Expecting defaultCache with these attributes: maxElementsInMemory, "
11223             + "eternal, timeToIdleSeconds, timeToLiveSeconds, overflowToDisk, statistics");
11224       }
11225 
11226       boolean madeChanges = false;
11227       
11228       for (int i=0;i<configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength(); i++) {
11229         
11230         String attributeName = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(i).getNodeName();
11231         String value = element.getAttribute(attributeName);
11232 
11233         if ("maxElementsInMemory".equals(attributeName)) {
11234           if (!"1000".equals(value)) {
11235             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.maxElementsInMemory = " + value + "\n");
11236             madeChanges = true;
11237           }
11238         } else if ("eternal".equals(attributeName)) {
11239           if (!"false".equals(value)) {
11240             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.eternal = " + value + "\n");
11241             madeChanges = true;
11242           }
11243         } else if ("timeToIdleSeconds".equals(attributeName)) {
11244           if (!"10".equals(value)) {
11245             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.timeToIdleSeconds = " + value + "\n");
11246             madeChanges = true;
11247           }
11248           
11249         } else if ("timeToLiveSeconds".equals(attributeName)) {
11250           if (!"10".equals(value)) {
11251             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.timeToLiveSeconds = " + value + "\n");
11252             madeChanges = true;
11253           }
11254           
11255         } else if ("overflowToDisk".equals(attributeName)) {
11256           if (!"false".equals(value)) {
11257             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.overflowToDisk = " + value + "\n");
11258             madeChanges = true;
11259           }
11260           
11261         } else if ("statistics".equals(attributeName)) {
11262           if (!"false".equals(value)) {
11263             grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.defaultCache.statistics = " + value + "\n");
11264             madeChanges = true;
11265           }
11266           
11267         } else {
11268           throw new RuntimeException("Not expecting attribuet defaultCache " + attributeName);
11269         }
11270       }
11271 
11272       if (madeChanges) {
11273         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("\n");
11274       }
11275       
11276     }
11277     
11278     NodeList nodeList = GrouperInstallerUtils.xpathEvaluate(ehcacheXmlUrl, "/ehcache/cache");
11279     
11280     Set<String> usedKeys = new HashSet<String>();
11281     
11282     for (int i=0;i<nodeList.getLength();i++) {
11283       
11284       Element element = (Element)nodeList.item(i);
11285 
11286       //  <cache  name="edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao.hib3.Hib3MemberDAO.FindBySubject"
11287       //      maxElementsInMemory="5000"
11288       //      eternal="false"
11289       //      timeToIdleSeconds="5"
11290       //      timeToLiveSeconds="10"
11291       //      overflowToDisk="false"  
11292       //      statistics="false"
11293       //  />
11294       
11295       String name = element.getAttribute("name");
11296       Integer maxElementsInMemory = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("maxElementsInMemory"), true);
11297       Boolean eternal = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("eternal"));
11298       Integer timeToIdleSeconds = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("timeToIdleSeconds"), true);
11299       Integer timeToLiveSeconds = GrouperInstallerUtils.intObjectValue(element.getAttribute("timeToLiveSeconds"), true);
11300       Boolean overflowToDisk = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("overflowToDisk"));
11301       Boolean statistics = GrouperInstallerUtils.booleanObjectValue(element.getAttribute("statistics"));
11302 
11303       //any attributes we dont expect?
11304       NamedNodeMap configuredNamedNodeMap = element.getAttributes();
11305       //see which attributes are new or changed
11306       for (int j=0;j<configuredNamedNodeMap.getLength();j++) {
11307         Node configuredAttribute = configuredNamedNodeMap.item(j);
11308         if (!configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("name")
11309             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("maxElementsInMemory")
11310             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("eternal")
11311             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("timeToIdleSeconds")
11312             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("timeToLiveSeconds")
11313             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("overflowToDisk")
11314             && !configuredAttribute.getNodeName().equals("statistics")) {
11315           throw new RuntimeException("Cant process attribute: '" + configuredAttribute.getNodeName() + "'");
11316         }
11317       }
11318       
11319       String key = convertEhcacheNameToPropertiesKey(name, usedKeys);
11320       
11321       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.name = edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.internal.dao.hib3.Hib3GroupDAO
11322       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.maxElementsInMemory = 500
11323       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.eternal = false
11324       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.timeToIdleSeconds = 1
11325       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.timeToLiveSeconds = 1
11326       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.overflowToDisk = false
11327       //  cache.name.edu_internet2_middleware_grouper_internal_dao_hib3_Hib3GroupDAO.statistics = false
11328 
11329       boolean madeChanges = false;
11330       
11331       if (maxElementsInMemory != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".maxElementsInMemory")).equals(maxElementsInMemory.toString())) {
11332         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".maxElementsInMemory = " + maxElementsInMemory + "\n");
11333         madeChanges = true;
11334       }
11335       if (eternal != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".eternal")).equals(eternal.toString())) {
11336         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".eternal = " + eternal + "\n");
11337         madeChanges = true;
11338       }
11339       if (timeToIdleSeconds != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".timeToIdleSeconds")).equals(timeToIdleSeconds.toString())) {
11340         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".timeToIdleSeconds = " + timeToIdleSeconds + "\n");
11341         madeChanges = true;
11342       }
11343       if (timeToLiveSeconds != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".timeToLiveSeconds")).equals(timeToLiveSeconds.toString())) {
11344         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".timeToLiveSeconds = " + timeToLiveSeconds + "\n");
11345         madeChanges = true;
11346       }
11347       if (overflowToDisk != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".overflowToDisk")).equals(overflowToDisk.toString())) {
11348         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".overflowToDisk = " + overflowToDisk + "\n");
11349         madeChanges = true;
11350       }
11351       if (statistics != null && !GrouperInstallerUtils.defaultString((String)grouperCacheBaseProperties.get("cache.name." + key + ".statistics")).equals(statistics.toString())) {
11352         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("cache.name." + key + ".statistics = " + statistics + "\n");
11353         madeChanges = true;
11354       }
11355       if (madeChanges) {
11356         grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.append("\n");
11357       }
11358     }
11359   
11360     GrouperInstallerUtils.saveStringIntoFile(grouperCachePropertiesFile, grouperEhcachePropertiesContents.toString());
11361   }
11362 
11363   /**
11364    * edit an xml file attribute in a xml file
11365    * @param file
11366    * @param elementName
11367    * @param elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue
11368    * @param newValue
11369    * @param description of change for sys out print
11370    * @param newAttributeName if adding new attribute, this is the name
11371    * @return true if edited file, or false if not but didnt need to, null if not found
11372    */
11373   public static Boolean editXmlFileAttribute(File file, String elementName, Map<String, String> elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue, 
11374       String newAttributeName, String newValue, String description) {
11375 
11376     if (!file.exists() || file.length() == 0) {
11377       throw new RuntimeException("Why does " + file.getName() + " not exist and have contents? " 
11378           + file.getAbsolutePath());
11379     }
11380     
11381     String fileContents = GrouperInstallerUtils.readFileIntoString(file);
11382     
11383     boolean inComment = false;
11384     
11385     //lets parse the file and get to the element
11386     OUTER: for (int i=0;i<fileContents.length();i++) {
11387       
11388       //look for start element
11389       char curChar = fileContents.charAt(i);
11390 
11391       Character nextChar = (i+1) < fileContents.length() ? fileContents.charAt(i+1) : null;
11392       Character nextNextChar = (i+2) < fileContents.length() ? fileContents.charAt(i+2) : null;
11393       Character nextNextNextChar = (i+3) < fileContents.length() ? fileContents.charAt(i+3) : null;
11394       
11395       //if we are in comment, see when we are out of comment
11396       if (inComment) {
11397         if (curChar == '-' && nextChar != null && nextChar == '-' && nextNextChar != null && nextNextChar == '>') {
11398           inComment = false;
11399         }
11400         continue;
11401         
11402       }
11403 
11404       //look for a tag or comment
11405       if (curChar != '<') {
11406         continue;
11407       }
11408       
11409       //see if this is a comment
11410       if (nextChar != null && nextChar == '!' && nextNextChar != null && nextNextChar == '-' && nextNextNextChar != null && nextNextNextChar == '-') {
11411         inComment = true;
11412         continue;
11413       }
11414 
11415       //get tagName
11416       String currentElementName = _internalXmlTagName(fileContents, i+1);
11417       
11418       //not the right tag
11419       if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentElementName, elementName)) {
11420         continue;
11421       }
11422       
11423       int tagNameStart = fileContents.indexOf(currentElementName, i+1);
11424       
11425       //get the attributes
11426       int tagAttributesStart = tagNameStart + currentElementName.length();
11427       XmlParseAttributesResult xmlParseAttributesResult = _internalXmlParseAttributes(fileContents, tagAttributesStart);
11428       Map<String, String> currentAttributes = xmlParseAttributesResult.getAttributes();
11429       
11430       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.length(elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue) > 0) {
11431         for (String attributeName : elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue.keySet()) {
11432           String expectedValue = elementMustHaveAttributeAndValue.get(attributeName);
11433           String hasValue = currentAttributes.get(attributeName);
11434 
11435           //if we dont have that value, then keep going
11436           if (!GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(expectedValue, hasValue)) {
11437             continue OUTER;
11438           }
11439         }
11440       }
11441       
11442       //we have the tag and it has the expected attributes
11443 
11444       //see if the attribute is even there...
11445       if (!currentAttributes.containsKey(newAttributeName)) {
11446         System.out.println(" - adding " + description + " with value: '" + newValue + "'");
11447         String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, tagAttributesStart) + " " + newAttributeName + "=\"" + newValue + 
11448             "\" " + fileContents.substring(tagAttributesStart, fileContents.length());
11449         GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newFileContents);
11450         return true;
11451       }
11452 
11453       //does it already have the value?
11454       String currentValue = currentAttributes.get(newAttributeName);
11455       
11456       //value is already there
11457       if (GrouperInstallerUtils.equals(currentValue, newValue)) {
11458         return false;
11459       }
11460 
11461       //it has the wrong value
11462       int startQuote = xmlParseAttributesResult.getAttributeStartIndex().get(newAttributeName);
11463       int endQuote = xmlParseAttributesResult.getAttributeEndIndex().get(newAttributeName);
11464 
11465       System.out.println(" - changing " + description + " from old value: '" + currentValue 
11466           + "' to new value: '" + newValue + "'");
11467 
11468       String newFileContents = fileContents.substring(0, startQuote+1)  + newValue + 
11469           fileContents.substring(endQuote, fileContents.length());
11470       GrouperInstallerUtils.writeStringToFile(file, newFileContents);
11471       return true;
11472 
11473     }
11474 
11475     return null;
11476 
11477   }
11478 
11479   /**
11480    * 
11481    * @param fileContents
11482    * @param tagIndexStart
11483    * @return the tag name
11484    */
11485   private static String _internalXmlTagName(String fileContents, int tagIndexStart) {
11486     StringBuilder tagName = new StringBuilder();
11487     for (int i=tagIndexStart; i<fileContents.length(); i++) {
11488       char curChar = fileContents.charAt(i);
11489       if (tagName.length() == 0 && Character.isWhitespace(curChar)) {
11490         continue;
11491       }
11492       if (Character.isWhitespace(curChar) || '/' == curChar || '>' == curChar) {
11493         return tagName.toString();
11494       }
11495       tagName.append(curChar);
11496     }
11497     throw new RuntimeException("How did I get here???? '" + tagName.toString() + "'");
11498   }
11499   
11500   /**
11501    * xml parse attribute result
11502    */
11503   private static class XmlParseAttributesResult {
11504 
11505     /**
11506      * attributes name to value
11507      */
11508     private Map<String, String> attributes;
11509     
11510     /**
11511      * attribute name to startIndex (of quote)
11512      */
11513     private Map<String, Integer> attributeStartIndex;
11514 
11515     /**
11516      * attribute name to endIndex (of quote)
11517      */
11518     private Map<String, Integer> attributeEndIndex;
11519 
11520     
11521     /**
11522      * attributes name to value
11523      * @return the attributes
11524      */
11525     public Map<String, String> getAttributes() {
11526       return this.attributes;
11527     }
11528 
11529     
11530     /**
11531      * attributes name to value
11532      * @param attributes1 the attributes to set
11533      */
11534     public void setAttributes(Map<String, String> attributes1) {
11535       this.attributes = attributes1;
11536     }
11537 
11538     
11539     /**
11540      * attribute name to startIndex (of quote)
11541      * @return the attributeStartIndex
11542      */
11543     public Map<String, Integer> getAttributeStartIndex() {
11544       return this.attributeStartIndex;
11545     }
11546     
11547     /**
11548      * attribute name to startIndex (of quote)
11549      * @param attributeStartIndex1 the attributeStartIndex to set
11550      */
11551     public void setAttributeStartIndex(Map<String, Integer> attributeStartIndex1) {
11552       this.attributeStartIndex = attributeStartIndex1;
11553     }
11554     
11555     /**
11556      * attribute name to endIndex (of quote)
11557      * @return the attributeEndIndex
11558      */
11559     public Map<String, Integer> getAttributeEndIndex() {
11560       return this.attributeEndIndex;
11561     }
11562     
11563     /**
11564      * attribute name to endIndex (of quote)
11565      * @param attributeEndIndex1 the attributeEndIndex to set
11566      */
11567     public void setAttributeEndIndex(Map<String, Integer> attributeEndIndex1) {
11568       this.attributeEndIndex = attributeEndIndex1;
11569     }
11570     
11571   }
11572   
11573   /**
11574    * parse attributes
11575    * @param fileContents
11576    * @param tagAttributesStart is the index where the attributes start
11577    * @return the map of attribute names and values
11578    */
11579   private static XmlParseAttributesResult _internalXmlParseAttributes(String fileContents, int tagAttributesStart) {
11580 
11581     XmlParseAttributesResult xmlParseAttributesResult = new XmlParseAttributesResult();
11582 
11583     Map<String, String> attributes = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
11584     Map<String, Integer> attributeStartIndex = new LinkedHashMap<String, Integer>();
11585     Map<String, Integer> attributeEndIndex = new LinkedHashMap<String, Integer>();
11586 
11587     xmlParseAttributesResult.setAttributes(attributes);
11588     xmlParseAttributesResult.setAttributeStartIndex(attributeStartIndex);
11589     xmlParseAttributesResult.setAttributeEndIndex(attributeEndIndex);
11590     
11591     boolean inAttributeStartValue = false;
11592     boolean inAttributeStartName = true;
11593     boolean inAttributeName = false;
11594     boolean inAttributeValue = false;
11595     
11596     StringBuilder attributeName = null;
11597     StringBuilder attributeValue = null;
11598     
11599     for (int i=tagAttributesStart; i<fileContents.length(); i++) {
11600       char curChar = fileContents.charAt(i);
11601       boolean isWhitespace = Character.isWhitespace(curChar);
11602 
11603       //waiting for the attribute
11604       if ((inAttributeStartValue || inAttributeStartName) && isWhitespace) {
11605         continue;
11606       }
11607 
11608       //if waiting for value and equals, keep looking
11609       if (inAttributeStartValue && curChar == '=') {
11610         continue;
11611       }
11612 
11613       //waiting to start an attribute name, its not whitespace so do it
11614       if (inAttributeStartName) {
11615         
11616         //we done if we got to this character
11617         if (curChar == '/' || curChar == '>') {
11618           return xmlParseAttributesResult;
11619         }
11620         
11621         inAttributeStartName = false;
11622         inAttributeName = true;
11623         attributeName = new StringBuilder();
11624       }
11625 
11626       //if in an attribute name and whitespace or equals, then we are done
11627       if (inAttributeName && (isWhitespace || curChar == '=' )) {
11628         inAttributeName = false;
11629         inAttributeStartValue = true;
11630         continue;
11631       }
11632 
11633       //getting the attribute name
11634       if (inAttributeName) {
11635         attributeName.append(curChar);
11636         continue;
11637       }
11638 
11639       //if waiting for start value and found quote
11640       if (inAttributeStartValue && curChar == '"') {
11641         inAttributeStartValue = false;
11642         inAttributeValue = true;
11643         attributeValue = new StringBuilder();
11644         attributeStartIndex.put(attributeName.toString(), i);
11645         continue;
11646       }
11647 
11648       //if in attribute value and not quote, append the char
11649       if (inAttributeValue && curChar != '"') {
11650         attributeValue.append(curChar);
11651         continue;
11652       }
11653 
11654       //done with attribute value
11655       if (inAttributeValue && curChar == '"') {
11656         inAttributeValue = false;
11657         inAttributeStartName = true;
11658         if (attributes.containsKey(attributeName.toString())) {
11659           throw new RuntimeException("Duplicate attribute: " + attributeName.toString());
11660         }
11661         attributes.put(attributeName.toString(), attributeValue.toString());
11662         attributeEndIndex.put(attributeName.toString(), i);
11663         continue;
11664       }
11665 
11666       throw new RuntimeException("Why are we here? " + i + ", " + fileContents);
11667     }
11668     return xmlParseAttributesResult;
11669   }
11670   
11671 }
Copyright © 2016 Internet2. All rights reserved.
